Our goal is to provide support for questions regarding the MementoMori app.
Please make sure to read the FAQ below before contacting us.

Our goal is to provide support for questions regarding the MementoMori app.
If you have problems or questions even after checking the in-app Help and Notices, please enter the required information and contact us.

Each email will be sent an automatic reply notifying that it has been received.
If you do not receive an automatic reply, it may be due to your email settings, etc., or the automatic reply may have been sent to your spam folder.
Please check your spam folder, and whether your device’s email settings allow you to receive emails from
[@mememori-game.com].
If you contact us using multiple email addresses, you may miss our replies.
Please contact us using a single email address.

■Please be sure to read the following■
We accept inquiries via email 24 hours a day, but the basic timeframe which we correspond to them is
[10:00~18:00 JST].
Depending on the content of your inquiry, or the condition in which it was received, sending a reply may either take time, or not be possible.
We cannot reply to individual inquiries regarding game strategies, information about future updates, or administrative opinions. That kind of information will be announced via notices, etc.
In general, we do not reply to feedback, requests, or reports, but after checking the contents of your inquiry, we may reply depending on the situation.
We cannot answer any inquiries regarding the investigative results of your report, the measures we take, or what kinds of actions qualify as Prohibited Matters.
Please note in advance that we may not be able to correspond to a problem if a long time has passed since it occurred.
We do not accept any inquiries by telephone. Please contact us via email.
Once you have agreed to all the items described above, please submit your inquiry.

Text:
When Streamer Mode is switched to ON, music which would be subject to copyright claims on video broadcasting platforms, such as YouTube, will not be used. Part of the game’s presentation will be different, but we strongly recommend switching Streamer Mode to ON when broadcasting gameplay footage.

Additionally, if gameplay footage is broadcast while Streamer Mode is left on OFF, problems may occur that prevent the footage from being broadcast, etc. However, Bank of Innovation shall bear no responsibility for any occurrences of problems thereof. We thank you in advance for your understanding.

The purchase of a product cannot be canceled if 7 days have passed since it was made, or if the product has been claimed and used. Payments made by minors without their legal guardian’s consent can be canceled. [Details]

Going to [Restore Purchases] after paying at the convenience store
will complete your purchase and allow you to claim your items.

・After payment is completed, please make sure to use the [Restore Purchases] feature from the Home Screen Menu.

・[Restore Purchases] can be performed from the device that was used to purchase the corresponding product.

・After restoring your purchases, it may take up to 10 minutes for your item to be claimable on the Home Screen.

・If the product has a purchase limit, the purchase will count towards it when payment has been completed and the item has been claimed. Therefore, if the product’s purchase limit is reset before you claim the purchased item, the purchase will count towards the new purchase limit, so please be careful.

・The purchase will be applied to all purchase bonuses, such as the 1st Purchase Bonus and Diamond Purchase Bonus, when payment is completed and the item has been claimed.

・Please visit Google Play for more details regarding payments.

If an error occurred when you made a purchase, and your item, etc., was not given to you,
this feature will allow you to retry the process to obtain your item, etc.

the item, etc., will not be applied to your account unless you restore your purchases.

Text: Deals 1 physical attack equal to 105% of her ATK to 1 random enemy. With her devotion to her duties, Monica takes care of friends who are hurt, restoring HP equal to 60% of her ATK to 3 random allies.

Monica’s love for her friends at the estate becomes her power to heal, restoring HP equal to 80% of her ATK to the ally with the lowest current HP. She provides more help as a handmaiden, increasing the target’s DEF by 20% for 2 turns.
The power buried deep inside Illya’s heart makes her sword shine bright red, dealing 1 physical attack equal to 390% of her ATK to 1 random enemy, and inflicting [Fainted] on them for 2 turns.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 410% of her ATK.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 430% of her ATK.
Illya draws power from the depths of her soul and pours it into her sword, dealing 1 physical attack equal to 420% of her ATK to 1 random enemy.
Additionally deals 1 direct attack equal to 150% of her STR to the target.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 540% of her ATK.
The direct attack’s damage becomes equal to 180% of her STR.
Iris’s heartfelt loyalty to the Duke empowers her, dealing 1 physical attack equal to 320% of her ATK to 3 random enemies.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 350% of her ATK.
The targets of this skill become 5 random enemies.

Iris’s sword is filled with the determination to protect the Duke, dealing 1 physical attack equal to 340% of her ATK to 3 random enemies. Her determination becomes a magic power that impairs the enemy, inflicting [Bleed] on all targets for 2 turns. Each turn, at the start of the action phase, [Bleed] deals damage equal to 20% of Iris’s ATK.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 360% of her ATK.
The damage from [Bleed] becomes equal to 35% of her ATK.
The targets of this skill become 5 random enemies.

Loki asks, “Care to dance with me?” and deals 1 physical attack equal to 350% of her ATK to the enemy with the highest ATK. She then whispers, “This is our little secret,” and has a 30% chance to inflict [Silence] on the target for 1 turn.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 370% of her ATK.
Loki’s infallible tarot cards predict that a “fate of calamity” is coming, dealing 1 physical attack equal to 380% of her ATK to the enemy with the lowest current HP.
Additionally, if the target is defeated by this skill, it grants Loki [Shield] equal to 200% of her ATK for 4 turns.
The size of [Shield] becomes equal to 300% of her ATK.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 420% of her ATK.

Soltina sends a rush of cold air that envelops the enemy, dealing 1 magical attack equal to 420% of her ATK to 2 random enemies. Their frozen minds are overwhelmed by severe drowsiness. If this attack deals a critical hit to a target, it decreases that target’s chance to deal a critical hit by 80% and inflicts [Sleep] on them for 1 turn. [Sleep] is dispelled when the target is attacked.
The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 460% of her ATK.
The targets of this skill become 3 random enemies.

Rosalie taught Soltina magic that allows her to weave a blade of ice using the enemy’s magic power. Deals 1 magical attack equal to 520% of her ATK to the enemy with the highest ATK. The magical ice freezes the enemy to their very soul. If the target’s MAG is lower than Soltina’s MAG, this skill has a 70% chance to inflict [Fainted] on them for 1 turn.
The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 600% of her ATK.
The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 780% of her ATK.

Amleth unleashes a strike to the enemy with enough force to shatter cursed crystals, dealing 1 physical attack equal to 350% of her ATK to 3 random enemies. Her blade is filled with the strength to tear magic power to pieces. If a target’s type is Sorcerer, the physical attack’s damage to that target is multiplied by 1.5.
Additionally increases the damage all targets take by 10% for 2 turns.
The targets of this skill become 4 random enemies.

A series of attacks unleashed by Amleth’s perfect swordsmanship. Deals 4 physical attacks equal to 310% of her ATK to enemies at random. Amleth never misses an opening, and each time she attacks, she has a 30% chance to deal 1 additional physical attack equal to 360% of her ATK.
The additional attack’s damage becomes equal to 380% of her ATK.

Additionally, if a target is defeated by this skill, restores HP equal to 10% of Amleth’s max HP to her. Each time a target is defeated by this skill, the amount Amleth’s HP is restored by increases by 10% of her max HP.
The initial physical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 330% of her ATK.

Fenrir focuses her magic power and pours all her strength into this attack. Deals 1 magical attack equal to 490% of her ATK to 1 random enemy. A warm kindness then blankets her friends and pushes those courageous enough to step forward, decreasing 1 adjacent ally’s skill cooldown time by 1.
The targets whose skill cooldown times are decreased become 2 adjacent allies.
The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 720% of her ATK.

Determined to no longer let anyone get hurt, Fenrir devastates the enemy with a freezing blizzard, and bathes her allies in a rain of light. Deals 1 magical attack equal to 230% of Fenrir’s ATK to 5 random enemies, and dispels 2 debuffs each from both her and 1 adjacent ally.
The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 290% of her ATK.
The targets whose debuffs are dispelled become Fenrir and 2 adjacent allies.
The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 380% of her ATK.

Florence’s lance emits a sharp, scarlet light, dealing 3 physical attacks equal to 460% of her ATK to enemies at random. The more enemies she defeats, the more motivated she becomes. Each time Florence deals a critical hit, the number of attacks this skill deals increases by 1 (6 total attacks max).
The number of initial physical attacks becomes 4, and the max total number of attacks becomes 8.
The physical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 480% of her ATK.

Florence charges onto the battlefield as if she were dancing gracefully, dealing 1 physical attack equal to 480% of her ATK to 5 random enemies. Florence yells, “Give it all you’ve got until the very end!” If a target is defeated by this skill, it deals 1 physical attack equal to 520% of Florence’s ATK to the enemy with the lowest current HP.
The additional attack’s damage becomes equal to 560% of her ATK.
The initial physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 510% of her ATK.
The number of additional attacks becomes 2.

Sonya brings down a heavy strike that roars like thunder. Deals 1 physical attack equal to 400% of her ATK to the enemy with the highest current HP. Because Sonya’s Viking spirit will not let any tough enemies get away, if the target’s remaining HP percentage is 60% or higher, this attack is guaranteed to deal a critical hit.
Additionally deals 1 direct attack equal to 250% of her DEX to the target (if the target has already been defeated, this direct attack will not activate).
Additionally, if the target is not defeated by this skill, it reactivates (1 reactivation max).

Sonya unleashes a swift assault that tears through enemies like a whirlwind. Deals 1 physical attack equal to 400% of her ATK to the enemy with the lowest current HP. Because Sonya’s Viking instincts do not condone enemies for being weak, if the target’s remaining HP percentage is 60% or lower, this attack is guaranteed to deal a critical hit.
Additionally deals 1 direct attack equal to 250% of her DEX to the target (if the target has already been defeated, this direct attack will not activate).
The direct attack’s damage becomes equal to 280% of her DEX.
Additionally, if the target is defeated by this skill, it reactivates (1 reactivation max).

By calling on the souls that have been led to their deaths, Moddey deals 1 magical attack equal to 380% of her ATK to 4 random enemies, and inflicts [Poison] on all targets for 2 turns. Each turn, at the start of the action phase, [Poison] deals damage equal to 3% of a target’s current HP.
Additionally, if this skill deals a critical hit to a target, dispels 1 buff from that target.
The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 420% of her ATK.

Moddey becomes possessed by an evil spirit that bears a strong grudge, dealing 3 magical attacks equal to 350% of her ATK to enemies at random. If a target is afflicted with [Poison], this skill also inflicts [Blight] on that target for 3 turns.
The number of magical attacks becomes 4.
The magical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 380% of her ATK.
The number of turns of [Blight] becomes 4.

Charlotte’s other self breaks free, dealing 1 physical attack equal to 130% of her ATK to 1 random enemy. As her other self continues to rampage, she causes the enemy to lose their will to fight, decreasing the target’s ATK by 20% for 2 turns.

Charlotte was holding back on hurting the enemies more than she needed to. But the moment she gets hurt, her other self breaks free and rampages. Deals 3 physical attacks equal to 120% of her ATK to enemies at random.

Arianrhod’s belief that knights are the embodiment of justice fills her with power, dealing 2 physical attacks equal to 320% of her ATK to enemies at random. Her sense of justice is strong enough to crush evil, and if a target is afflicted with a debuff, the physical attack’s damage to that target is multiplied by 1.5.
The number of physical attacks becomes 3.
If a target is afflicted with a debuff, the damage to that target is multiplied by 2.

Filled with the spirit of a knight, Arianrhod unflinchingly faces off against the strong enemies who challenge her, dealing 1 physical attack equal to 290% of her ATK to 2 random enemies. If a target’s ATK is higher than Arianrhod’s ATK, this skill decreases that target’s ATK by 40% for 2 turns.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 320% of her ATK.
The targets of this skill become 3 random enemies.
Additionally, if a target’s ATK is lower than Arianrhod’s ATK, inflicts [Blight] on that target for 2 turns.

Mustering up her courage gives Theodora the power to carve out her own destiny, dealing 1 magical attack equal to 420% of her ATK to the enemy with the highest current HP. Her power begins to overflow when the scales tip in her favor, inflicting [Bleed] on the target for 3 turns. Each turn, at the start of the action phase, [Bleed] deals damage equal to 5% of Theodora’s ATK.
The damage from [Bleed] becomes equal to 7% of her ATK.
The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 480% of her ATK.

Theodora’s heart has done away with all hesitation and now fills her with power, dealing 1 magical attack equal to 390% of her ATK to the 2 enemies with the highest current HP. With her enemies becoming unnerved, this skill also has a 50% chance to decrease all targets’ DEF by 20% for 2 turns.
The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 410% of her ATK.
The chance to decrease a target’s DEF becomes 70%.
The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 450% of her ATK.

Petra attacks with her claws to shake off the fear she carries in her heart. Deals damage equal to 10% of her current HP to herself, and deals 1 physical attack equal to 480% of her ATK to the enemy with the lowest current HP.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 520% of her ATK.
Additionally, if the target is defeated by this skill, restores HP equal to 30% of Petra’s max HP to her.
With the pain of being a witch tormenting her, Petra deals damage equal to 10% of her current HP to herself, and increases her ATK by 10% of her remaining HP percentage for 4 turns.
The amount her ATK increases by becomes equal to 15% of her remaining HP percentage.
The amount her ATK increases by becomes equal to 20% of her remaining HP percentage.
The amount her ATK increases by becomes equal to 30% of her remaining HP percentage.

Like a bolt of lightning, Sabrina uses her shining blue rapier to deliver a flurry of rapid strikes, dealing 5 physical attacks equal to 390% of her ATK to enemies at random. She screams, “One moment of hesitation can mean life or death!” With her eyes locked on the enemy’s openings, Sabrina strikes with everything she has. If this skill deals a critical hit to a target, its remaining attacks are guaranteed to also deal critical hits.
Additionally, if she deals 4 or more critical hits, increases her DEF by 70% for 2 turns.
The physical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 420% of her ATK.

“Hold your head high, and cast away all of your doubts!” yells Sabrina, her vigor as a soldier causing the enemy to lose their will to fight. Deals 3 physical attacks equal to 420% of her ATK to enemies at random, and has a 30% chance to decrease all targets’ SPD by 10% for 1 turn. If a target is afflicted with [Decreased SPD], the physical attack’s damage to that target is multiplied by 1.5.
The physical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 480% of her ATK.
The amount a target’s SPD decreases by becomes 15%.
The physical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 520% of her ATK.
Freesia sends a strong gust of wind blowing towards her enemies, dealing 1 magical attack equal to 260% of her ATK to 3 random enemies.
Additionally deals 1 direct attack equal to 20% of this skill’s total damage to the enemy with the lowest remaining HP percentage.
The initial magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 280% of her ATK.
A gentle wind filled with the fragrance of flowers envelops Freesia’s wounded allies. Restores HP equal to 250% of her MAG to the 3 allies with the lowest remaining HP percentages.
Before restoring HP, if a target’s remaining HP percentage is 15% or lower, the amount that target’s HP is restored by is multiplied by 1.5.
Before restoring HP, if a target’s remaining HP percentage is 15% or lower, additionally increases that target’s DEF by 20% for 2 turns.
The amount a target’s HP is restored by becomes equal to 270% of Freesia’s MAG.

Amour’s fixation on the one she loves turns into an obsession towards her rivals. Deals 2 physical attacks equal to 300% of her ATK to the enemy with the lowest remaining HP percentage. If the target is defeated by this skill, it also deals 1 physical attack equal to 300% of her ATK to the remaining 4 enemies.
The initial physical attacks’ and additional attack’s damage each become equal to 350% of her ATK.
The number of initial physical attacks becomes 3.

Once Amour’s thorns embrace someone, they don’t let go, leaving barbs lodged in the scars of their victims. Deals 1 physical attack equal to 460% of her ATK to 3 random enemies, and inflicts [Blight] on all targets for 3 turns.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 510% of her ATK.
Additionally, after attacking, decreases the damage she takes by 50% and increases her Counter by 100% for 2 turns.
The targets of this skill become 4 random enemies.

Raising her shining crimson blade, Rean deals 3 physical attacks equal to 400% of her ATK to enemies at random. If this skill deals a critical hit to a target, it increases Rean’s ATK by 30% for 1 turn. Each time this skill deals another critical hit to a target, it increases Rean’s ATK for 1 more turn.
The number of physical attacks becomes 4.
The physical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 460% of her ATK.

Rean’s courage transforms the luster of her blade, dealing 1 physical attack equal to 350% of her ATK to 4 random enemies. If a target is defeated by this skill, it deals 1 additional physical attack equal to 480% of her ATK to the enemy with the lowest remaining HP percentage. Each time a target is defeated by this skill, the number of additional physical attacks it deals increases by 1.
Additionally restores HP equal to 50% of this skill’s total damage to her.
The targets of this skill become 5 random enemies.
The initial physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 550% of her ATK.
All strong bad foes will burn to the ground. The intense flames spewing from Belle’s staff deal 4 magical attacks equal to 340% of her ATK to the enemy with the highest ATK.

Additionally, if the target’s remaining HP percentage is above 50%, inflicts [Bleed] on them for 2 turns. Each turn, at the start of the action phase, [Bleed] deals damage equal to 10% of Belle’s ATK. If the target’s remaining HP percentage is 50% or lower, dispels 1 buff from them.
The magical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 420% of her ATK.

Belle unleashes a raging fire that roars like a dragon, incinerating the enemy. Deals 5 magical attacks equal to 280% of her ATK to the enemy with the lowest remaining HP percentage. These attacks are guaranteed to hit.
Additionally, if the target is defeated by this skill, increases the number of magical attacks by 1.
The number of initial magical attacks becomes 6.
Additionally, if 2 targets are defeated by this skill, the increased number of magical attacks becomes 2.

Dian sees precisely where the enemies’ weak points are and fires. Deals 1 physical attack equal to 380% of her ATK to 3 random enemies, and inflicts [Bleed] on all targets for 3 turns. Each turn, at the start of the action phase, [Bleed] deals damage equal to 25% of Dian’s ATK.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 410% of her ATK.
Additionally grants [Regeneration] to her for 3 turns. Each turn, at the start of the action phase, [Regeneration] restores HP equal to 5% of Dian’s max HP to her.

As Dian researches cursed creatures, she also gains their power. Activates when her remaining HP percentage is higher than 40%. Dian deals damage equal to 35% of her max HP to herself, and deals 1 direct attack equal to 60% of the depleted HP to 2 random enemies. If Dian does not fulfill the activation requirement, she instead deals a basic attack.
The direct attack’s damage becomes equal to 75% of the depleted HP.
The direct attack’s damage becomes equal to 85% of the depleted HP.
The direct attack’s damage becomes equal to 100% of the depleted HP.
Shizu draws her great katana at blinding speed, dealing 1 physical attack equal to 130% of her ATK to 3 random enemies.
Shizu focuses all of her power into using the full weight of her great katana to cut the enemy down, dealing 1 physical attack equal to 200% of her ATK to 1 random enemy.
Focusing all of her strength, Zara deals 1 physical attack equal to 480% of her ATK to the enemy directly in front of her, and has a 50% chance to inflict [Fainted] on them for 1 turn.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 520% of her ATK.
Zara’s magical power propels her at high speeds towards the enemy, dealing 1 physical attack equal to 410% of her ATK to the enemy directly in front of her and the 2 enemies adjacent to that target.
Additionally has a 50% chance to decrease all targets’ SPD by 10% for 3 turns.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 480% of her ATK.
The amount a target’s SPD decreases by becomes 20%.

Rosalie takes the staff she inherited from her old master and releases its power, dealing 1 magical attack equal to 290% of her ATK to 4 random enemies. This ancient magic steals the enemies’ life force, restoring HP equal to 10% of this skill’s total damage to Rosalie.
The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 320% of her ATK.
The targets of this skill become 5 random enemies.

The power of Rosalie’s old master that dwells within her awakens, dealing 1 magical attack equal to 420% of her ATK to 2 random enemies. Her old master’s will to protect her grants [Invulnerable] to Rosalie for 1 turn.
Additionally has a 60% chance to inflict [Bleed] on all targets for 2 turns. Each turn, at the start of the action phase, [Bleed] deals damage equal to 10% of Rosalie’s ATK.
The targets of the magical attack become 3 random enemies.
The number of turns of [Invulnerable] becomes 2.

This maiden in love takes aim and shoots the enemy down. Libra’s love becomes her power, dealing 1 physical attack equal to 410% of her ATK to the enemy with the lowest current HP. If the target’s remaining HP percentage is 50% or lower, this attack is guaranteed to hit.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 430% of her ATK.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 450% of her ATK.

This maiden in love’s power inspires her to take action. When Libra parted ways with her envy-filled past, an immense power begins to stir within her, dealing 1 physical attack equal to 380% of her ATK to 3 random enemies. This fierce attack driven by love has a 70% chance to decrease all targets’ DEF by 50% for 2 turns.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 410% of her ATK.
The amount a target’s DEF decreases by becomes 65%.
The chance to inflict [Decreased DEF] becomes 100%.

“Go get ’em, Emma!” yells Ivy. Deals 1 physical attack equal to 420% of her ATK to 3 random enemies. “Hmm, they’re not really red, huh? I’ll go and stain them!” she says. Deals 1 direct attack equal to 320% of Ivy’s DEX to the enemy with the highest remaining HP percentage.
Additionally, if her remaining HP percentage is 35% or lower, the direct attack’s damage is multiplied by 2.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 530% of her ATK.

Ivy gives red dresses to old dolls as presents. Deals 1 physical attack equal to 420% of her ATK to the enemy with the lowest remaining HP percentage. The number of attacks this skill deals increases by 1 for each buff Ivy is enhanced with (3 total attacks max). She says “You need more red.” If the target is afflicted with a debuff, the physical attack’s damage is multiplied by 1.5.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 540% of her ATK.
The max total number of physical attacks becomes 5.
The physical attacks become guaranteed to hit.

Merlyn remembers the lessons her master taught her and saves her friends—just like her master did for her long ago. If the ally with the highest ATK is afflicted with a debuff, this skill dispels 1 debuff from them.
Additionally, if the target is not afflicted with a debuff, increases their ATK by 30% for 2 turns.
The amount the target’s ATK increases by becomes 40%.

Merlyn unleashes a stream of ivy at the enemy and sweeps them away. Anyone entangled in its vines has their power drained away. Dispels 1 buff each from the 2 enemies with the highest remaining HP percentages, and deals 1 magical attack to equal to 320% of Merlyn’s ATK to all targets.
Additionally restores HP equal to 15% of this skill’s total damage to the ally with the lowest remaining HP percentage.
The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 380% of her ATK.
The targets of the magical attack become the 3 enemies with the highest remaining HP percentages.
Cordie’s quick shot performance is a specialty among specialties. Deals 4 physical attacks equal to 420% of her ATK to enemies at random.
Additionally, if a target is defeated by this skill, increases Cordie’s ATK by 50% for 1 turn.
The physical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 570% of her ATK.

With its blinding speed, Cordie’s rapid-fire shooting has now reached the level of an acrobatic performance. Deals 1 physical attack equal to 390% of her ATK to 5 random enemies. The thrill she experiences greatly boosts her focus, and if Cordie’s remaining HP percentage is 50% or lower, the physical attack’s damage is multiplied by 1.5.
Additionally, if a target is afflicted with a debuff, this skill is guaranteed to deal a critical hit to that target.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 520% of her ATK.
The physical attack’s damage is multiplied by 2.

When a lost child starts crying, they won’t stop. Nina throws a tantrum, dealing 1 physical attack equal to 305% of her ATK to 5 random enemies. She cries, “I’m not lost!” Before dealing the physical attack, if a target is enhanced with a buff, this skill has a 60% chance to dispel 1 buff from that target. If successful, this skill grants the dispelled buff’s effect to Nina. If the target is not enhanced with a buff, this skill decreases that target’s chance to inflict a debuff by 40% for 2 turns.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 380% of her ATK.
The chance to dispel 1 buff from a target and grant it to Nina becomes 80%.

Nina cries, “Stop it!” Deals 1 physical attack equal to 305% of her ATK to 5 random enemies. She then says, “This is what bad kids get!” Before dealing the physical attack, if a target’s DEX is lower than Nina’s DEX, this skill dispels 1 debuff from Nina, and has a 80% chance to inflict the dispelled debuff’s effect on that target.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 380% of her ATK.
The chance to dispel her debuff and inflict it on a target becomes 100%.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 480% of her ATK.

Mertillier will use any power she can to protect A.A.—even the power of demons. Deals 1 magical attack equal to 290% of her ATK to 4 random enemies, and grants Mertillier [Shield] equal to 25% of this skill’s total damage for 3 turns.
The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 350% of her ATK.
The size of [Shield] becomes equal to 40% of this skill’s total damage.

If there’s anything wrong with A.A., no matter how slight the change is, Mertillier won’t fail to see it. She understands “life” more than anyone else and utilizes her expertise, decreasing the skill cooldown time of the ally with the highest ATK by 1.
Additionally increases the target’s ATK by 65% for 3 turns.
Additionally, if the target is afflicted with a debuff, all their debuffs are dispelled.
The amount the target’s skill cooldown time decreases by becomes 2.

Although Luke follows a different path, her pride has not changed. In the end, she will bring death to her foes with one blow. Deals 1 physical attack equal to 460% of Luke’s ATK to 5 random enemies. If a target’s STR is lower than Luke’s STR, this attack is guaranteed to deal a critical hit to that target. Luke also deals 1 direct attack equal to 150% of her STR to the enemy with the highest STR.
Additionally decreases the ATK of the enemy with the highest STR by 50% for 1 turn (this decrease is calculated towards the target’s ATK at the time of this skill’s activation).
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 540% of her ATK.

Swearing on her knight’s pride, Luke pours her entire soul into this strike. Dispels every [Shield] from 1 random enemy, and deals 1 direct attack equal to 400% of Luke’s STR to them. This attack ignores [Invulnerable], [Shield], and [Multi-Barrier].
The direct attack’s damage becomes equal to 480% of her STR.
Additionally, before dispelling [Shield], if the target is not enhanced with [Shield], the direct attack’s damage is multiplied by 1.5.
The direct attack’s damage becomes equal to 520% of her STR.

Using a secret skill inherited from the previous chief, Garmr deals 1 physical attack equal to 130% of her ATK to 1 random enemy. This special bandit’s arrow is laced with a toxin that prevents blood from clotting, and has a 50% chance to inflict [Bleed] on the target for 2 turns. Each turn, at the start of the action phase, [Bleed] deals damage equal to 20% of Garmr’s ATK.

Garmr shoots down enemies who are targeting her allies, dealing 1 physical attack equal to 110% of her ATK to 3 random enemies. She continues firing arrows to hold the enemies back, decreasing all targets’ SPD by 20% for 2 turns.

Skuld uses a strange liquid created from a failed attempt at developing a new elixir, dealing 1 magical attack equal to 320% of her ATK to 1 random enemy. Hazardous side effects decrease the target’s ATK by 10% for 2 turns.
The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 360% of her ATK.
The amount the target’s ATK decreases by becomes 20%.
Skuld uses a therapeutic aroma to treat her allies’ fatigue, restoring HP equal to 210% of her MAG to the 2 allies with the lowest current HP.
The amount a target’s HP is restored by becomes equal to 230% of Skuld’s MAG.
Additionally increases all targets’ SPD by 20% for 2 turns.
The targets of this skill become the 3 allies with the lowest current HP.
Paint enriched with magic power spatters from the tip of Cherna’s brush, dealing 5 magical attacks equal to 210% of her ATK to enemies at random.
The magical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 230% of her ATK.
Additionally, each time this skill deals a critical hit, increases Cherna’s ATK by 10% for 1 turn (50% max).

With the desire to fill her canvas with layers upon layers of brilliance, Cherna deals 1 magical attack equal to 360% of her ATK to 1 random enemy. Her magic-enriched brushwork also has a 50% chance to inflict [Fainted] and [Bleed] on the target for 1 turn. Each turn, at the start of the action phase, [Bleed] deals damage equal to 10% of Cherna’s ATK.
The targets of this skill become 2 random enemies.
The chance to inflict [Fainted] and [Bleed] becomes 70%.
The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 390% of her ATK.
“Eeny meeny miny moe!” chants Soteira while aimlessly firing off some magic. Deals 6 magical attacks equal to 160% of her ATK to enemies at random.
The number of magical attacks becomes 8.
The magical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 190% of her ATK.

Soteira yells, “Look!” and points to the sky. But, she sure fooled them—there’s nothing there! Deals 1 magical attack equal to 390% of her ATK to the enemy with the highest SPD, and decreases their SPD by 20% for 3 turns.
The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 420% of her ATK.
The amount the target’s SPD decreases by becomes 30%.
The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 480% of her ATK.

Mimi moves as quick as a stray cat, dealing 4 physical attacks equal to 275% of her ATK to enemies at random. The more enemies Mimi defeats, the more her animal instincts are awakened. Each time a target is defeated by this skill, the number of attacks it deals increases by 1 (8 total attacks max).
The physical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 315% of her ATK.
The number of initial physical attacks becomes 5, and the max total number of attacks becomes 9.

Mimi copies the purr-ty dancer she admires, and performs the dance moves she just memorized. Deals 1 physical attack equal to 260% of her ATK to 3 random enemies. The physical attack’s damage increases by 40% of Mimi’s ATK for each buff she is enhanced with (420% of her ATK max). This skill grants Mimi [Shield] equal to 20% of this skill’s total damage for 4 turns.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 290% of her ATK, and the increase in damage for each buff she is enhanced with becomes equal to 60% of her ATK (530% of her ATK max).
The targets of this skill become 5 random enemies.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 350% of her ATK (590% of her ATK max).

A number of knives surround the enemy, but who’s being targeted? And which knife is real? There is only one way to find out. Deals 1 magical attack equal to 260% of Tropon’s ATK to 5 random enemies. She has the insight of a swindler, and can easily figure out her enemies’ weak points. Each time Tropon uses this skill, it increases the magical attack’s damage by 70% of her ATK.
Additionally restores HP equal to 20% of this skill’s total damage to her.
The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 310% of her ATK.

Deception is a swindler’s way of life. Deals 1 magical attack equal to 270% of Tropon’s ATK to 5 random enemies. A hidden knife then flies out of the shadows, dealing 1 direct attack equal to 260% of her MAG to 1 random enemy.
Additionally, if a target is defeated by this skill, increases the number of turns of every buff Tropon is enhanced with by 2.
The direct attack’s damage becomes equal to 320% of her MAG.
The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 350% of her ATK.

Hathor approaches the enemy while performing a dance that mimics a butterfly. She moves in a way that bewitches anyone watching. Deals 1 physical attack equal to 560% of her ATK to the 2 enemies with the highest current HP, and has a 20% chance to decrease all targets’ ATK by 50% for 2 turns.
The chance to decrease all targets’ ATK becomes 50%.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 720% of her ATK.

The beautiful Hathor performs this war dance on the battlefield, dealing 1 physical attack equal to 370% of her ATK to 5 random enemies. The ones captivated by her dance are then invited to the world of dreams. If a target is afflicted with a debuff, this skill has a 20% chance to inflict [Fainted] on that target for 1 turn.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 500% of her ATK.
The chance to inflict [Fainted] becomes 40%. Additionally restores HP equal to 15% of this skill’s total damage to Hathor.

Additionally, if a target is not afflicted with a debuff, inflicts [Erosion] on that target for 2 turns. Each turn, at the start of the action phase, [Erosion] deals damage equal to 20% of this skill’s total damage.
Olivia prays that all the brave souls who stand up and fight receive God’s blessing. Increases all allies’ ATK by 15% of Olivia’s ATK for 2 turns.
Additionally increases all allies’ DEF by 15% of Olivia’s DEF for 2 turns.
The amounts all targets’ DEF increase by become equal to 30% of Olivia’s DEF. The amounts all targets’ ATK increase by become equal to 30% of Olivia’s ATK.

Olivia charges and pierces through the enemy vanguard, dealing 4 physical attacks equal to 350% of her ATK to enemies at random. This act of bravery calls for God’s blessing, granting all allies [Shield] equal to 40% of this skill’s total damage.
The physical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 390% of her ATK.
Additionally, if a target is defeated by this skill, increases the critical hit damage of the ally with the highest ATK by 30% for 2 turns.
The number of physical attacks becomes 5.

A songstress’s melody creates new worlds. Primavera’s voice invokes visions of the battlefield, dealing 2 physical attacks equal to 360% of her ATK to the enemy directly in front of her. The heart of the one who hears her song is stolen away, and if the target’s SPD is lower than Primavera’s SPD, this skill has a 15% chance to inflict [Fainted] on them for 1 turn.
The physical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 410% of her ATK.
The number of physical attacks becomes 4.

Upon hearing Primavera’s song, her little bird flies in for a surprise attack. Deals 1 physical attack equal to 455% of Primavera’s ATK to the enemy directly in front of her. As she sings, wishing for peace, the enemy loses their will to fight. If this skill deals a critical hit to the target, it inflicts [Buff Immunity] on them for 3 turns.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 520% of her ATK.
The targets of this skill become the enemy directly in front of Primavera and the 2 enemies adjacent to that target.
If this skill deals a critical hit, additionally decreases all targets’ DEF by 20% for 3 turns.

Anyone who touches the wings of the butterflies fluttering around Carol will briefly lose their memories. Deals 1 magical attack equal to 490% of Carol’s ATK to 2 random enemies, and has a 20% chance to inflict [Silence] on all targets for 1 turn.
The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 540% of her ATK.
The targets of this skill become 3 random enemies.

Using her butterflies and their memory-stealing scales, Carol dispels 2 buffs from 3 random enemies. She strikes as the enemies stagger, dealing 1 magical attack equal to 410% of her ATK to all targets.
The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 480% of her ATK.
Additionally, before dispelling buffs, if a target is not enhanced with a buff, decreases that target’s DEF by 40% for 2 turns.
The targets of this skill become 5 random enemies.

Flowers for mourning the deceased have become a Curse that also mourn the living. Natasha deals 3 physical attacks equal to 550% of her ATK to enemies at random. The flowers seek out the living, twining around their bodies to consume them. If a target’s STR is lower than Natasha’s STR, this skill has a 50% chance to inflict [Fainted] on that target for 1 turn.
The physical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 595% of her ATK.
The number of physical attacks becomes 5.

Natasha believes that if the world was filled with a bunch of pretty flowers, everyone will be happy. So, she starts to cover the land with them. Deals 1 physical attack equal to 510% of her ATK to 3 random enemies.
Additionally, if a target’s remaining HP percentage is below 20%, deals 1 direct attack equal to 340% of Natasha’s STR to that target.
The targets of this skill become 5 random enemies.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 530% of her ATK.

Fortina prays for the safety of her friends with all her heart, granting all allies [Shield] equal to 120% of Fortina’s ATK and [Regeneration] for 1 turn. Each turn, at the start of the action phase, [Regeneration] restores HP equal to 7% of a target’s max HP to them.
The size of [Shield] becomes equal to 150% of her ATK.
The numbers of turns of [Shield] and [Regeneration] each become 2.

Countless swords of light deliver God’s judgement. Deals 1 physical attack equal to 340% of her ATK to the enemy with the lowest remaining HP percentage. The swords then emit a light of healing, restoring HP equal to 80% of this skill’s total damage to the ally with the lowest remaining HP percentage.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 380% of her ATK. The amount the target’s HP is restored by becomes equal to 120% of this skill’s total damage.
Additionally, after dealing the physical attack, deals 1 direct attack equal to 125% of her STR to the target.
Additionally, if the target is not defeated by this skill, before restoring HP, the physical attack and direct attack reactivate (1 reactivation max).

Cerberus’s uncontrollable lightning power deals 3 physical attacks equal to 350% of her ATK to enemies at random. Her merciless beast claws completely tears through the powerless—armor and all. If a target’s STR is lower than Cerberus’s STR, this skill decreases that target’s P. DEF by 50% for 1 turn.
The number of physical attacks becomes 6.
The physical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 480% of her ATK.
Cerberus shoots bolts of her cursed lightning at the weakened enemy, dealing 3 physical attacks equal to 380% of her ATK to the enemy with the lowest remaining HP percentage.

Additionally, if the target is not defeated by this skill’s physical attacks, their remaining HP percentage is 15% or lower, and their current HP is lower than 1500% of Cerberus’s ATK, they are immediately defeated.
The number of physical attacks becomes 5.
The physical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 480% of her ATK.

Rusalka summons a spirit from the bottom of the sea, sending down a cursed rain that putrefies anything it touches. Deals 1 magical attack equal to 320% of Rusalka’s ATK to 5 random enemies, and has a 50% chance of decreasing the damage all targets deal by 10% for 1 turn. If a target’s MAG is lower than Rusalka’s MAG, the chance to inflict [Decreased Damage Dealing] on that target becomes 100%.
The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 480% of her ATK.
The decrease in damage a target deals becomes 15%.

Rusalka summons a savage water spirit from the dark depths of the sea, and sends them to attack. Deals 3 magical attacks equal to 400% of Rusalka’s ATK to enemies at random. If a target is afflicted with a debuff, the magical attack’s damage to that target is multiplied by 1.5.
The number of magical attacks becomes 4.
The magical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 470% of her ATK.
If a target is afflicted with a debuff, the magical attack’s damage to that target is multiplied by 2.

Lunalynn’s weak spirit causes her heart to succumb to despair, creating a coffin of ice. The chilling air of the underworld begins overwhelming the enemy, dealing 1 magical attack equal to 245% of Lunalynn’s ATK to 5 random enemies. The chilling air freezes the hearts of the cowardly, and if it deals a critical hit to a target, it inflicts [Silence] on that target for 1 turn.
The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 265% of her ATK.
The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 300% of her ATK.

The freezing ice of Lunalynn’s snowy illusions deals 1 magical attack equal to 220% of her ATK to 5 random enemies. The bodies of anyone seized by the ice’s despair are consumed by the Curse. If a target’s MAG is lower than Lunalynn’s MAG, this skill inflicts [Poison] on that target for 2 turns. Each turn, at the start of the action phase, [Poison] deals damage equal to 10% of a target’s current HP.
The damage from [Poison] becomes equal to 15% of a target’s current HP.
The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 285% of her ATK.
The number of turns of [Poison] becomes 3.

Valeriede’s once dormant thirst for revenge ignites a flame that reduces everything to ashes. Deals 8 physical attacks equal to 195% of her ATK to 1 random enemy, and restores HP equal to 15% of this skill’s total damage to Valeriede.
The physical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 205% of her ATK.
The physical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 215% of her ATK. The amount her HP is restored by becomes equal to 25% of this skill’s total damage.

Valeriede’s feelings of rage buried in the depths of her heart awaken, dealing 3 physical attacks equal to 460% of her ATK to the enemy with the lowest remaining HP percentage. If the target is defeated by this skill, it deals 1 physical attack equal to 460% of Valeriede’s ATK to the remaining 4 enemies.
The physical attacks’ damage to the enemy with the lowest remaining HP percentage becomes equal to 480% of her ATK.
The physical attack’s damage to the remaining 4 enemies becomes equal to 480% of her ATK.

Additionally, if the target is not defeated by the initial 3 physical attacks, deals 3 physical attacks equal to 480% of Valeriede’s ATK to them (once the target is defeated, the additional 3 physical attacks end).
As A.A. effortlessly swings her saberwings, rust begins to overflow from them. Deals 3 magical attacks equal to 520% of her ATK to enemies at random.
The magical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 710% of her ATK.
The number of magical attacks becomes 4.

Hidden inside A.A.’s man-made body is an immense magic power. By merely releasing it, rust covers, attaches to, and consumes everything around her. Deals 1 direct attack equal to 200% of her MAG to 4 random enemies, and restores HP equal to 15% of this skill’s total damage to A.A.
The direct attack’s damage becomes equal to 300% of her MAG.
The amount her HP is restored by becomes equal to 20% of this skill’s total damage.
The direct attack’s damage becomes equal to 420% of her MAG.
Ophelia takes her blade, filled with the power of her cursed crystals, and deals 1 physical attack equal to 300% of her ATK to 5 random enemies.
Additionally restores HP equal to 20% of Ophelia’s max HP to her.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 380% of her ATK.

Ophelia sends out a shockwave from her blade, dealing 1 physical attack equal to 560% to 1 random enemy. The fallen crystals she has created consume the enemy’s power, decreasing the target’s ATK by 25% for 2 turns.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 760% of her ATK.
The number of turns of [Decreased ATK] becomes 3.
The amount the target’s ATK decreases by becomes 40%.
Armstrong sends her army of specters to decend upon the enemy, dealing 1 physical attack equal to 500% of Armstrong’s ATK to the 2 enemies with the highest ATK.
Additionally, if a target is not defeated by this skill, it reactivates (1 reactivation max).
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 600% of her ATK.

Armstrong commands her specters to initiate volley fire against the enemy, dealing 6 physical attacks equal to 250% of Armstrong’s ATK to enemies at random. If a target’s remaining HP percentage is 50% or higher, the physical attack’s damage to that target is multiplied by 1.5.
Additionally, if a target’s remaining HP percentage is below 50%, the attack to that target is guaranteed to hit.
The number of physical attacks becomes 8.
If a target’s remaining HP percentage is 50% or higher, the physical attack’s damage to that target is multiplied by 2.

After calmly assessing how the battle is progressing, Sophia says to the enemy, “Your problem’s right here.” Increases her ATK by 15% for 1 turn, and deals 4 physical attacks equal to 450% of her ATK to the enemy with the lowest remaining HP percentage.
The number of physical attacks becomes 5.
The amount her ATK increases by becomes 30%.
Miss Sophia does not tolerate any ruffians who dare hurt her students. With her expertly trained swordsmanship, Sophia deals 6 physical attacks equal to 360% of her ATK to enemies at random.
Additionally, after attacking, if her remaining HP percentage is below 60%, restores HP equal to 20% of this skill’s total damage to all allies.
The number of physical attacks becomes 7.
The amount a target’s HP is restored by becomes 35% of this skill’s total damage.

The sword awakens, growing stronger as more and more dangers come for its master. Increases the damage Sivi deals by 20% for 4 turns. The increase in damage she deals becomes 36%, 48%, 56%, or 60%, growing higher according to the number of times she was attacked this turn (4 times max). Afterwards, Sivi deals 1 physical attack equal to 980% of her ATK to the enemy with the highest ATK, and restores HP equal to 30% of this skill’s total damage to Sivi.
The targets of [Increased Damage Dealing] become Sivi and the 2 allies with the lowest SPD.

The increase in damage all targets deal becomes 25%. The increase in damage each target deals becomes 45%, 60%, 70%, or 75%, growing higher according to the number of times they were attacked this turn (4 times max).

The ebony blade steals the enemy’s life force, then shares it with its master’s comrades. Deals 1 physical attack equal to 310% of Sivi’s ATK to 3 random enemies, and restores HP equal to 15% of this skill’s total damage to the ally with the lowest SPD.
Additionally dispels all debuffs from the ally with the lowest SPD.
The targets whose HP are restored and whose debuffs are dispelled become the 3 allies with the lowest SPD.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 530% of her ATK.

Veela calls on her water maiden friend and asks her to fight. Deals 1 magical attack equal to 430% of her ATK to 3 random enemies. The water maiden steals the vigor of those she touches, and has a 60% chance to decrease all targets’ ATK by 15% for 1 turn. If a target’s MAG is lower than Veela’s MAG, the number of turns of [Decreased ATK] on that target becomes 2.
The amount a target’s ATK decreases by becomes 35%.
The chance to decrease all targets’ ATK becomes 100%.

Veela makes a wish, asking a water sprite to fight. Deals 3 magical attacks equal to 310% of her ATK to enemies at random. The water envelops the enemies and slows their movements down, decreasing all targets’ SPD by 15% for 5 turns (3 times max).
The number of magical attacks becomes 4, and the max number of times [Decreased SPD] can be stacked becomes 4.
If an enemy afflicted with [Decreased SPD] becomes a target, the magical attack’s damage to that target is multiplied by 1.5.
The magical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 380% of her ATK. Additionally restores HP equal to 30% of this skill’s total damage to Veela.
“Bow-Wow-WOW!” With these magic words, Chiffon helps her friends out. Increases all allies’ DEF by 50% for 4 turns.
Additionally increases all targets’ ATK by 10% for 4 turns.
Additionally grants all targets [Shield] equal to 100% of Chiffon’s ATK for 2 turns.

“Spirit’s Aegis...huh? Th-This is the wrong magic spell!” After conjuring this magic spell by mistake, Chiffon has no idea what will happen next. This skill selects 5 random targets out of all enemies and allies. If an ally is a target, this skill restores HP equal to 50% of Chiffon’s ATK to them. If an enemy is a target, this skill deals 1 magical attack equal to 200% of Chiffon’s ATK to them, decreasing their chance to resist a critical hit by 30% and inflicting [Sleep] on them for 1 turn. [Sleep] is dispelled when the target is attacked. This skill ignores [Taunt] and [Stealth].
If an ally is a target, additionally increases their critical hit damage by 15% for 1 turn.
The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 300% of her ATK.
The amount a target’s HP is restored by becomes equal to 100% of Chiffon’s ATK, and the number of turns of [Increased Critical Hit Damage] becomes 2.

Lea flies into a rage and frantically swings her weapon. After decreasing the chance to evade of the enemy with the highest ATK by 30% for 2 turns, she deals 1 physical attack equal to 700% of her ATK to them. Afterwards, this skill has an 80% chance to inflict [Fainted] on the target for 1 turn.

Additionally, after the decision to inflict [Fainted] has been made, if the target is not afflicted with [Fainted], this skill deals 1 physical attack equal to 900% of Lea’s ATK to them (if the target has already been defeated, this additional attack will not activate). This attack is guaranteed to hit.
Additionally, if the target is not defeated by this skill, it reactivates (1 reactivation max).

Lea’s riled emotions will not wane until she kills her opponent. Deals 1 physical attack equal to 800% of her ATK to the enemy with the highest ATK. If the target is afflicted with [Decreased Chance to Evade], the physical attack’s damage is multiplied by 1.5.
Additionally, if the target is not afflicted with [Decreased Chance to Evade], this attack is guaranteed to hit.
Additionally, the lower her HP is decreased, the more the physical attack’s damage is increased (1200% of her ATK max).
The max amount the physical attack’s damage can increase by becomes 1600% of her ATK.

“As the supreme ruler of darkness, I hereby command you...to perish!” Chanting a spell of her own creation, Stella deals 1 physical attack equal to 300% of her ATK to the 2 enemies with the lowest remaining HP percentages, and has a 20% chance to inflict [Silence] on all targets for 1 turn. “Please go down, please go down, please go down...!” The power in Stella’s words turns into a curse that stops enemies in their tracks. If a target’s STR is lower than Stella’s STR, the chance to inflict [Silence] to that target becomes 40%.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 400% of her ATK.
The targets of this skill become the 3 enemies with the lowest remaining HP percentages.

“It appears that the time to remove this seal has come at last!” The great power that Stella had sealed beneath her eyepatch is set free. Deals 1 physical attack equal to 800% of her ATK to the enemy with the highest ATK, and restores HP equal to 25% of this skill’s total damage to the ally with the lowest remaining HP percentage.
The amount the target’s HP is restored by becomes 50% of this skill’s total damage.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 1000% of her ATK.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 1200% of her ATK.

Artie yells, “It’s do-or-die. Fight back!” From her magic circle, she summons swords that have performed miracles across a great number of battlefields, and rains them all down onto her opponents. Deals 1 magical attack equal to 350% of Artie’s ATK to 5 random enemies. “I’ll make sure you have no way to defend against this...!” There are times when the simple desire to protect lives greatly turns the tide of battle. Before dealing the magical attack, this skill decreases all targets’ M. DEF by 20% and increases the damage they take by 10% for 2 turns.

Additionally, if Artie is enhanced with Evil Sword’s Creator’s [Increased Chance to Resist a Critical Hit], this skill grants her a buff that increases her chance to resist a critical hit by 10% 2 times. If Artie is not enhanced with Evil Sword’s Creator’s [Increased Chance to Resist a Critical Hit], this skill grants her the buff 3 times (10 times max) (cannot be dispelled).
The numbers of turns of [Decreased M. DEF] and [Increased Damage Taken] each become 4.

“If I can end the fighting...!” Artie uses her magic to create a copy of the evil sword, dealing 5 magical attacks equal to 170% of her ATK to enemies at random. There are times when the desire to bring an end to war will distort one’s ray of hope. Before dealing the magical attacks, if a target’s remaining HP percentage is lower than Artie’s remaining HP percentage, the magical attack’s damage to that target is multiplied by 1.5.
Additionally, before dealing the magical attacks, if a target is afflicted with a debuff, this skill is guaranteed to deal a critical hit to that target.
The number of magical attacks becomes 7. Additionally restores HP equal to 20% of this skill’s total damage to Artie.
Before dealing the magical attacks, if a target’s remaining HP percentage is lower than Artie’s remaining HP percentage, the magical attack’s damage to that target is multiplied by 2.

The curse of eternal life sometimes steals someone else’s life force, and makes it one with Fia’s. Increases her HP Drain by 20% for 2 turns, and deals 1 physical attack equal to 380% of her ATK to 3 random enemies.
The number of turns of [Increased HP Drain] becomes 3, and the amount her HP Drain increases by becomes 40%.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 480% of her ATK.

Life and death are two sides of the same coin. But, the curse of eternal life severs death from that coin, delivering retribution upon Fia’s enemies. Deals 1 direct attack equal to 10% of the total damage taken by her over the past 20 turns to 2 random enemies.
The direct attack’s damage becomes equal to 15% of the total damage taken by her over the past 20 turns.
The targets of this skill become 3 random enemies.
The direct attack’s damage becomes equal to 20% of the total damage taken by her over the past 20 turns.

“Time for some special service!♪” No one’s as thoroughly equipped as this battlefield merchant. Richesse prepares her allies for battle by unveiling a plethora of secret tools of the trade that will protect them. Grants Richesse and the ally with the lowest SPD [Shield] equal to 300% of Richesse’s ATK for 1 turn.
Additionally increases all targets’ chance to resist a debuff by 50% for 1 turn.
The numbers of turns of [Shield] and [Increased Chance to Resist a Debuff] each become 3.

“Go get ’em!” On Richesse’s signal, the captain of the flabbycatties, FlabbyCaptain, charges in for the attack. Deals 1 physical attack equal to 490% of Richesse’s ATK to 2 random enemies. While FlabbyCaptain’s stuck onto the enemies’ faces, this skill has a 20% chance to inflict [Silence] on all targets for 1 turn.
The targets of this skill become 3 random enemies.
The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 540% of her ATK.

“Pierce the sea and sky!” yells Sabrina as she swiftly thrusts her blade, leaving the enemy with no time to even catch their breath. Deals 1 physical attack equal to 350% of her ATK to 4 random enemies. The summer breeze then turns violent, robbing the enemy of their consciousness. This skill takes the enemy with the highest remaining HP percentage among the targets of the physical attack, and inflicts [Fainted] on them for 1 turn (if all targets of the physical attack have already been defeated, the infliction of [Fainted] will not activate).
The number of turns of [Fainted] becomes 2.
Additionally, before dealing the physical attack, decreases all targets’ chance to resist a critical hit by 40% for 4 turns.

“Sink to the abyss!” screams Sabrina as she delivers a barrage of strikes, sending the enemy to the depths of the sea. Deals 5 physical attacks equal to 200% of her ATK to enemies at random. If Sabrina deals a critical hit, this skill’s remaining attacks are guaranteed to also deal critical hits. The sharp summer breeze then cuts through the water and chases the enemy down. If Sabrina deals 4 or more critical hits, this skill takes the enemy with the lowest remaining HP percentage among the targets of the physical attacks, dispels 1 of their buffs, and deals 1 physical attack equal to 400% of Sabrina’s ATK to them (if all targets of the physical attacks have already been defeated, the physical attack and the dispelling of the buff will not activate).
Additionally, each time an enemy is defeated by this skill, the number of additional attacks it deals increases by 1 (5 total additional attacks max).
The number of buffs that are dispelled becomes 2.
The additional attack’s damage becomes equal to 600% of her ATK.

Spirits sleeping in eternal paradise awaken, dealing 1 magical attack equal to 330% of Moddey’s ATK to 3 random enemies. The anger the spirits feel from having their slumber disturbed transforms into a hex, inflicting [Poison] on all targets for 2 turns. Each turn, at the start of the action phase, [Poison] deals damage equal to 3% of a target’s current HP.

Additionally, after the decision to inflict [Poison] has been made, this skill takes the enemy with the highest ATK among all targets afflicted with [Poison], and Moddey absorbs 15% of that target’s ATK into her own ATK.
The number of turns of [Poison] becomes 4.

Waterfronts are places where wandering spirits can easily make their way to. Once they spot a living being, the spirits form a swarm and rush in for the attack. Deals 3 magical attacks equal to 210% of Moddey’s ATK to enemies at random.
Additionally, the number of attacks this skill deals increases by 1 for each enemy afflicted with [Poison] (8 total attacks max).
The number of initial magical attacks becomes 4, and the max total number of attacks becomes 9.
The magical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 230% of her ATK.

“Feast your eyes as the world’s greatest gunslinger delivers a performance you’ll never forget!” Increases the chance to hit of the ally with the highest ATK by 25%, and decreases their chance to evade by 25% for 1 turn. These 2 effects are treated as 1 buff. “Enough with the tricks—it’s time for the real show to begin!” A large firework then explodes in the night sky, its sparks raining down on the enemies ruining the festival. Afterwards, this skill deals 4 physical attacks equal to 200% of Cordie’s ATK to enemies at random.
The number of turns of [Increased Chance to Hit] and [Decreased Chance to Evade] become 4. The physical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 330% of her ATK.
The targets of [Increased Chance to Hit] and [Decreased Chance to Evade] become the 2 allies with the highest ATK.

A series of fireworks shoot up into the sky, dealing 1 physical attack equal to 200% of Cordie’s ATK to 4 random enemies. “Now, I’m all fired up!” The atmosphere of the festival sends Cordie to cloud nine. If the number of buffs she is enhanced with is 1 or more, the physical attack’s damage is multiplied by 1.5.

Illya’s heart refuses to waver in the face of adversity, increasing her ATK by 20% (cannot be dispelled).

Iris’s feelings for the Duke hidden deep inside her heart become her magic power. Taking her fate into her own hands, Loki willfully draws The Chariot, increasing her SPD by 10% (cannot be dispelled).
Additionally increases her chance to deal a critical hit by 10% (cannot be dispelled).

No matter how tough things get, Soltina believes that if she hugs her stuffed bear, her big sis will save her. If Soltina is inflicted with a debuff, and the number of debuffs she is afflicted with is 2 or more, this skill dispels all debuffs from her. This skill activates 1 time every 4 turns.

Soltina proclaims, “I’m going to save you, Big Sis! I won’t rest until I do!” At the start of the turn, this skill grants 2 layers of [Multi-Barrier] to Soltina (cannot be dispelled). In becoming the queen, Amleth must be the light in the face of adversity—even if the hands of death are what await. At the start of each turn or when Amleth is attacked, the lower her HP is decreased, the higher her ATK is increased (30% max) (cannot be dispelled).

The max amount her ATK can increase by becomes 80%.

Written across Amleth’s face is the determination to overcome every obstacle and fulfill her promise. When she takes damage that would reduce her HP to 0, she survives with 1 HP. This skill activates only 1 time per battle.

A healing light pours down on Fenrir’s friends as if it were snow. When an ally is attacked or after they evade an attack, if their remaining HP percentage becomes 50% or lower, this skill restores HP equal to 5% of that ally’s max HP to them. This skill activates 1 time every turn.

The increase in her chance to deal a critical hit becomes 6%, and its max increase becomes 90%.
Florence is determined to uphold her oath and protect her allies. Increases her ATK by 20% (cannot be dispelled).

The feelings Arianrhod had when she first aspired to become a knight fill her with power, increasing her chance to inflict a debuff by 20% (cannot be dispelled).

This lunch is a specialty at the inn Theodora works at, and eating it increases her max HP by 20% (cannot be dispelled).

Sabrina’s love for her mother and her childhood dreams become her power to live. At the start of each turn, this skill increases her max HP by 3% (20 times max) (cannot be dispelled).

Now’s the time for the seeds of love Granny planted deep in Freesia’s heart to blossom. She strengthens her basic attack. When she deals a basic attack, this skill has a 30% chance to restore HP equal to 10% of Freesia’s ATK to her.

Until Amour finds her happy ending, she won’t let this fairy tale come to an close. If she is defeated, this skill revives Amour and restores HP equal to 30% of her max HP to her. When Belle feels the stench of death approaching, her flames of vengeance burn hotter—hot enough to burn even her pain away. If her remaining HP percentage is below 50%, she is attacked, and takes damage that exceeds 30% of her max HP, the exceeding amount of damage is cut by 100%.

Additionally strengthens her basic attack. Mertillier has applied everything she learned from many years of homunculus research onto her own body. Increases her chance to resist a debuff by 30% (cannot be dispelled).

A fate loved by “death” erodes even the soul. If Luke attacks and deals a critical hit, this skill increases the damage the target takes by 5% (5 times max).

Luke fights against the fate of death that looms over her. That determination becomes her power. At the start of the battle, this skill increases her chance to resist a critical hit by 30% for 4 turns.

Dezzy is half-asleep, but keeps poking her beak at the enemy. When Soteira is attacked, this skill has a 30% chance to inflict [Bleed] on the enemy that attacked her for 1 turn. Each turn, at the start of the action phase, [Bleed] deals damage equal to 20% of Soteira’s ATK.

Mimi performs her favorite dance routine. Her moves are full of energy and she feels really paw-some. Starting from the 3rd turn, at the start of each turn, if Mimi has not taken any damage for 2 turns, this skill increases her ATK by 40% for 3 turns (cannot be dispelled).

Even after being abandoned, betrayed, and succumbing to despair, this maiden has always believed her beloved will come for her... Her frail wish gives her yet another ray of hope... As an educator, Sophia can’t afford to look shameful in front of her students. When she is inflicted with a debuff, this skill decreases the number of turns of all debuffs she is afflicted with by 2. This skill activates 1 time every 4 turns.
When she is inflicted with a debuff, additionally decreases the chance to inflict a debuff of the enemy that inflicted her by 20% for 1 turn.

An educator’s duty is to teach and guide. Sophia’s conviction as a home tutor makes her hidden power come into full bloom. Increases her max HP by 15% (cannot be dispelled).
Additionally increases her chance to resist a critical hit by 15% (cannot be dispelled).
The increases in her max HP and chance to resist a critical hit each become 30%.
At the start of the turn, this skill increases her Counter by 55% for 2 turns. This skill activates 1 time every 4 turns.

“Fighting’s such a drag. I want everyone to work their butts off so we can just get this over with.” Upon hearing its master’s wish, the sword also grants its power to her comrades, increasing both the DEF and P. DEF of Sivi and 1 adjacent ally by 25% (cannot be dispelled).

The amounts only Sivi’s DEF and P. DEF increase by each become 100%.

Until their mission is accomplished, the sword will continue warding its master from danger. If Sivi is inflicted with a debuff from an active skill, and the number of debuffs she is afflicted with is 2 or more, this skill dispels all debuffs from her. This skill activates 1 time every 4 turns.
Additionally decreases the damage she takes by 15% for 3 turns.
The decrease in damage she takes becomes 30%.
Veela hears stories from the rain. That’s why she knows where to find the enemy. Increases Veela’s chance to hit by 20% (cannot be dispelled).

The increases in her chance to hit and chance to inflict a debuff each become 40%.

Veela tells herself, “It’s gonna be okay, because Lou is Vee’s best friend in the whole wide world...!” If Veela is attacked, and her remaining HP percentage falls below 40%, this skill dispels all debuffs from her. This skill activates 1 time every 4 turns.
Additionally grants Veela [Shield] equal to 300% of her ATK for 2 turn.
The number of turns of [Shield] becomes 3.
Chiffon experiences true happiness at last... A warmth that she has never known before cradles her wounded heart. Increases both her max HP and DEF by 15% (cannot be dispelled).
Additionally, at the start of the battle, grants the ally with the highest ATK other than Chiffon [Shield] equal to 150% of Chiffon’s ATK for 1 turn.
The amounts her max HP and DEF increase by each become 30%.

“No matter how painful or scary things get, I’ll hang on, I will...” Chiffon’s perseverance becomes a power that protects her. If she is attacked and takes damage that exceeds 10% of her max HP, the damage is cut by 20%. At the start of each turn, the potency of the damage cutting decreases by 2%. “I gotta g-g-get them...! B-Before they kill me...I gotta kill them first!” The excessive delusions running through Lea’s mind make her even more aggressive, increasing her ATK by 15% (cannot be dispelled).
Additionally increases her critical hit damage by 15% (cannot be dispelled).
The amounts her ATK and critical hit damage increase by each become 35%.

“They’re laughing... Th-They’re laughing at me... I’m sure of it...” A prisoner to the laughter that only she can hear, Lea has lived each day avoiding the gazes of others. At the start of the battle, this skill grants [Stealth] to Lea for 1 turn. [Stealth] makes Lea unable to be the target of enemy attacks that are dealt to 1 target. However, she can be the target of attacks that are dealt to the target directly in front of the attacker.
The number of turns of [Stealth] becomes 2.
Additionally, if Lea is attacked and takes damage that exceeds 25% of her max HP, decreases the damage she takes by 15% for 2 turns. This skill activates 1 time every 4 turns.

After many years of continuous practice, a spell of Stella’s own creation transforms from mere words into true magic. At the start of the battle, this skill grants Stella [Shield] equal to 400% of her ATK for 3 turns (cannot be dispelled).
The number of turns of [Shield] becomes 6.

“The boss’s light will always protect me...” At the start of the battle, this skill increases Stella’s DEF by 25% for 10 turns. If she is defeated by the attack, this skill will not activate.

“The two of us can overcome anything.” Time after time, when Artie’s heart is on the verge of shattering, that inseparable presence gives her the strength to pick herself back up. Increases Artie’s max HP by 15% (cannot be dispelled).

The powerful magic power that once created that evil sword turns into a power that protects Artie. With her dying breath, a witch used a power that could have possibly destroyed the world to save one girl. Strengthens Prayer of the Saint. The size of [Shield] becomes equal to 200% of her ATK.
Strengthens Wailing Lightning Claws. Additionally, if a target is defeated by this skill, increases Cerberus’s critical hit damage by 30% for 2 turns.
Strengthens Wailing Lightning Claws. The physical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 520% of her ATK.
Strengthens Wailing Lightning Claws. The amount her critical hit damage increases by becomes 60%.
Strengthens Kikimora’s Downpour. The number of turns of [Decreased Damage Dealing] becomes 2.
Strengthens Kikimora’s Downpour. The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 580% of her ATK.
At the start of the battle, increases her SPD by 30% for 1 turn.
Strengthens Ice Coffin. Additionally, before dealing the magical attack, increases her chance to deal a critical hit by 25%.
Strengthens Ice Coffin. The number of turns of [Silence] becomes 3.
Strengthens Ice Coffin. The increase in her chance to deal a critical hit becomes 40%.
Strengthens Explosive Nemesis. The physical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 230% of her ATK.
Strengthens Explosive Nemesis. The number of physical attacks becomes 10.
Strengthens Explosive Nemesis. The physical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 240% of her ATK.
Strengthens Angel of Love. The damage from the enemy’s attack is cut by 85%.
Increases her chance to hit by 40% (cannot be dispelled).
Strengthens Limiter Release. The direct attack’s damage becomes equal to 450% of her MAG.
When Ophelia is attacked with a physical attack, this skill restores HP equal to 35% of the damage taken to her. If she is defeated by the attack, this skill will not activate.
Strengthens Eyes Led Astray. Additionally increases her chance to resist a debuff by 30% for 3 turns.
Strengthens Eyes Led Astray. The increase in her chance to resist a debuff becomes 50%.
Strengthens Blitzkrieg Operation. The targets of this skill become the 3 enemies with the highest ATK.

Strengthens Elastic Defense. The damage from the enemy’s attack is cut by 60%. The potency of damage cutting decreases by 2% for each time she deals a critical hit (the potency of damage cutting will not drop below 40%). The amount her ATK is further increased by becomes 4% (40% max).
Strengthens Volley Fire. The physical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 300% of her ATK.
At the start of the turn, this skill increases her Counter by 55% for 2 turns. This skill activates 1 time every 4 turns.
Strengthens The Will to Guide. When she is inflicted with a debuff, additionally decreases the ATK of the enemy that inflicted her by 40% for 1 turn.
Strengthens Time for a Lesson! The number of physical attacks becomes 8.
Strengthens Fortifying Blade. The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 1170% of her ATK.

Strengthens Fortifying Blade. The increase in damage all targets deal becomes 30%. The increase in damage each target deals becomes 54%, 72%, 84%, or 90%, growing higher according to the number of times they were attacked this turn (4 times max).
Strengthens Life-Stealing Strike. The targets of the physical attack become 4 random enemies.
Strengthens Undine. The targets of the magical attack become 4 random enemies.
Strengthens Undine. The magical attack’s damage becomes equal to 480% of her ATK.
Strengthens Nixie. The magical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 420% of her ATK.
Strengthens Bow-Wow-WOW! The amount all targets’ ATK increases by becomes 20%, and the amount all targets’ DEF increases by becomes 70%.
Strengthens Spirit’s Aegis. The amount a target’s critical hit damage increases by becomes 30%.
Strengthens Happiness. The size of [Shield] becomes equal to 200% of her ATK.
Strengthens Shut Up, Shut Up!! The decrease in the target’s chance to evade becomes 50%.
Strengthens No Looking, No Laughing!! The max amount the physical attack’s damage can increase by becomes 1800% of her ATK.
Strengthens Shut Up, Shut Up!! The number of turns of [Decreased Chance to Evade] becomes 3.
Strengthens Spell of Chaos. The chance to inflict [Silence] becomes 40%. If a target’s STR is lower than Stella’s STR, the chance to deal [Silence] to that target becomes 80%.
Strengthens Sovereign of the Stars. The chance to inflict [Silence] becomes 80%.
At the start of the battle, increases her SPD by 25% for 1 turn (cannot be dispelled).
Strengthens It’s Do-or-Die! The amount all targets’ M. DEF is decreased by becomes 40%, and the increase in the damage they take becomes 20%.
Strengthens Evil Sword’s Creator. The amount of damage that exceeds 5% of her max HP is cut by 90%.
Strengthens Sword of Calamity. The magical attacks’ damage becomes equal to 200% of her ATK.
Strengthens Life Reaver. The targets of this skill become 5 random enemies.
Strengthens The Power Over Death. The amount Fia’s 2 adjacent allies’ HP increases by becomes 50% of Fia’s max HP.
Strengthens The Power She Left Me. The amount her HP is restored by becomes equal to 30% of the damage taken (15% of her max HP max).
Strengthens Special Service. The size of [Shield] becomes equal to 500% of Richesse’s ATK.
Increases Special Service. The increase in all targets’ chance to resist a debuff becomes 100%.
Strengthens FlabbyCaptain! CHARGE! The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 590% of her ATK.
Strengthens Cerulean Tempest. The targets of the physical attack become 5 random enemies.
Strengthens Ultramarine Requiem. The number of initial physical attacks becomes 7.
Strengthens Cerulean Tempest. The physical attack’s damage becomes equal to 400% of her ATK.
Strengthens Rest in Paradise. The targets of this skill become 4 random enemies.
Strengthens Rest in Paradise. The amount of ATK absorbed from the target becomes 30%.
Strengthens Rest in Paradise. The damage from [Poison] becomes equal to 5% of a target’s current HP.
Strengthens Blooming Thunder. The increase in all targets’ chance to hit becomes 50%. The decrease in their chance to evade becomes 50%.
Strengthens Let’s Liven it Up! The targets of this skill become the 2 allies with the highest ATK.
Strengthens Blooming Thunder. The number of physical attacks becomes 5.

Memo: CharacterMB
CharacterDetailVoiceMB

Text: What shall we start with today, Master?
Master...! A-Ah... Umm... W-Welcome home, Master.
Please leave it to me to take care of everyone, Master... As this estate’s handmaiden...I-I mean apprentice handmaiden, I will serve everyone to my upmost ability.
I’m making a list of things we need before I head to town on some errands... If there is anything you want Master, please don’t hesitate to let me know!
Try all you want, but a witch’s efforts will never be acknowledged. I know everything might be pointless, but...do you think it’s foolish of me to still want to keep trying...?

Your staff is “the staff that will restore the world?” What does that mean? Hmm... I don’t quite understand, but that sounds really impressive! O-Oh, you mustn’t push yourself too hard though... Please, do be sure to take care of yourself.

A handmaiden always accompanies their master... That’s why, no matter how difficult the road ahead may be, I will accompany you till the very end, Master. So, please...do let me continue to attend to you for many more days to come...okay?
Happy birthday, Master. I put my cooking skills to the test, and prepared a full course feast of all your favorite dishes! Come on, everyone’s waiting for you!
Thanks to everyone’s efforts, we’ve emerged victorious!
M-Master... If you’re going to scold someone...please...scold me...
This appears to be a job for your handmaiden!
The world needs your power. Come on, let’s go!
Oh—it feels like forever since I last saw you. Have you been busy lately? It’s okay, though—I’m just glad you’re back.
Let’s give today everything we’ve got. We’ll do what we can—one thing at a time.

Oooh... That cake looked sooo good... But, I’ve eaten nothing but delicious treats ever since coming here, and now my stomach’s paying for it... Uuuu... But...I can hear that cake calling out to me...
The more adversity we face, the brighter this sword will burn. That is my power—one that will cut straight through every obstacle and lead us towards the future.
