Hey, it’s great to get fired up about work...but resting once in a while is just as important. Hey, come over here. There’s this cake I just bought. Iris won’t hear a word about it from me, so let’s take a short break.
The closer our hearts bond together, the stronger I become... While I know that this is the power of the Staff, it’s still kind of embarrassing.

It’s your birthday today, isn’t it? Happy birthday. I bought some cake to celebrate. I never thought the day would come when we’d be here celebrating your birthday... But, it would be wonderful if we could do this again every year from now on, right?

I was fine before we met because I was traveling the world, but ever since coming here, I’ve...uh...put on a few... Hey, you eat the exact same food as I do, so why haven’t you gained any weight...? Huh? You stay thin no matter how much you eat? How in the...?

Right now, the world’s brimming with sadness. When we save everyone, and they fill the world with smiles once more...if they all smile together, wouldn’t it form a light bright enough to illuminate the entire world? That’s the power of bonds—the power you hold that will save the world.

When I was growing up, I was told I was the child of miracles who’d save the world. But in the end, I couldn’t save anything. The power of miracles isn’t what’s truly important. But thanks to you, I can now gather my courage for others, put my best foot forward for my loved ones—all these things I couldn’t do before. That is the real magic that will change the world.

Hah... It wasn’t supposed to be like this. After everything that’s happened, I have no right to be happy. I know that, but when I’m with him, I can’t help but feel... Hey, you guys. What should I do? Is it really okay for me to be...happy...? ...Huh?! H-How long have you been standing there?!

If I said you would need to sacrifice a life to save the world, what would you do? If God’s miracle comes at the price of one person’s soul...my soul...what would you...? Hehe, just kidding. It’s all in good fun, so don’t worry about it. Because I have a feeling you would actually save me...
Thank you. I owe it to you for helping me get stronger again.
This gentle power you give me is not meant for killing...but for saving. Hehe... It suits you perfectly.
When we first met, I knew I wanted to be like you—a kind person whose strength had true meaning. It would make me so happy if I was getting even a little closer to achieving that goal.
The stronger I get, and the more it feels like I can do anything, I get scared. I can’t help but worry that I’ll make that same mistake again...

I’ve stopped tormenting myself about the past, like...wishing I had this power back then... If I face forward and just let everything go, even my regrets will become my power to change the future. The one who taught me that was you.
Thank you, everyone. This is our victory.
My blade shines with the light of my resolve...!
I have been waiting for you, my lord.
Where have you been, my lord? So much work has piled up since you left. You must take care of it at once!
Let us make every effort count, my lord—for your people...for the world.

Tax collection, water management, city maintenance... There are many more matters that demand your attention, so please have everything done as quickly as possible. I shall assist you in any way I can.
Your hair is in complete disarray, my lord. Please excuse me... This will do. You are a leader, so please remember the importance of making yourself presentable.
You mustn’t overexert yourself, my lord. May I suggest we stop for a moment and have some tea? I shall make all the necessary arrangements, so please relax until my return.
You took me in despite knowing I was a witch. Ever since that day, my life has been bound to you. No matter what hardships await us, I shall never leave your side, my lord.

Happy birthday, my lord. Now then, here is the next document... Hmm...? Why, yes—all your work must be completed. That goes without saying... But, when you are finished, we can enjoy some cake with everyone.
Am I worthy of being your attendant, my lord...? With all the work, fighting, and daily affairs I assist with... No, I’m not there yet. I must strive to be better...!
Monica, bring these bags to that room over there... Hey, wait! Don’t bring them all at once! If they’re too heavy, bring them one at a—aaah, look out! Is everything okay?! Are you hurt?!

It is great that more people are staying at the estate as of late...but they run through the halls, and leave everything a mess... Seriously, who do they even think cleans around here? ...I should make them all my apprentices and re-educate them on common courtesy...

A...vacation? Ah, no... Thank you. It’s just, I don’t know the first thing about taking vacations... Ah, I shall stay nearby and see how work is progressing so I know what needs to be done when I return... That’s no different than working? Oh...you’re right...
My lord...I’m glad that you were there for me... Huh? What’s gotten into me all of a sudden, you ask...? Hehe, it’s nothing. Now then, let us get back to work!
I shall let none of your kindness go to waste, my lord.
Thank you. I promise to work harder than I have ever done before!
I shall put my body on the line if it means repaying this debt I owe you.
Just by having this power, I should be able to protect you from any threat that comes our way... That is what I was born to do...!
I find happiness in the fact that you need me by your side. But...I never would have expected you to trust me for as long as you have... That truly makes me...happy.
Victory is ours. But, you mustn’t let this get to your head, my lord.
Ugh... My deepest apologies, my lord!
Welcome...hehe. Did you come all this way just to see me?
Your Grace, where did you run off to...? If you’re not around to keep me company, I may just vanish into thin air... I’m kidding... Hehe.
If you beg like that, then I have no choice but to get serious... Your wish is my command... Hehe.
Perfect timing, Your Grace. I read your fortune earlier, and I’m afraid what I saw wasn’t very encouraging. So for the entire day today...I’ll stay by your side and protect you... Trust me. Hehe.

Should one know their future, it would surely be their undoing. If they knew misfortune was in their cards, they would retreat into their shell. Whereas if it were prosperity, they would fall victim to sloth... But it’s just fortune telling after all—no future is set in stone. Don’t forget that.
For someone so young, you sure do lack stamina... Come on, why don’t you take a break and start again later... Oh, you’re already sleeping... I’ll take care of the rest then. Sleep well.
Are you that curious about me? Hehe, I see... I’ll be glad to bare it all just for you... Are you ready to expose a woman’s deepest secrets?
Happy birthday, Your Grace... For your present...would I be enough to satisfy you? Hehe...

To this day I have read the fortunes of many...but it’s my first time reading for someone like you. I see The World—both upright and reversed... To think both paths await you...hehe. I hope you continue to entertain me, Your Grace.
You would like to hear about the Pope? If you keep The Moon upright, and have The Hierophant and The Chariot reversed...you’ll understand who she is.

Why is the Pope hunting witches? Hmm... I only know her as she was in the past, so I haven’t the slightest idea. Sorry I can’t help... The Pope I know is different from the one you do... I have no way to answer that...
The Tower and The Magician—those were the two cards I drew before fleeing the Church. I felt I had to do something should either of those destinies come to be... That’s the least I can do to atone...

The Pope is neither a friend nor benefactor of mine... As the sole person that knows who she was in the past, I simply want to save her... I prefer who she was back then... So please lend me your power, Your Grace...
I wonder what your intentions truly are, with you having your way with me like this... Hehe.
Fortune telling is different from prophecies. No one knows if a reading will come true or not... The future isn’t set in stone, after all... A bit boring, isn’t it?
Destiny is like a spiderweb—endless possibilities strung together, all leading towards the future. Should the same future await no matter which thread you follow...would you still press on?
No future is certain. Hope... Despair... You’ve grasped everything on your own... Fate isn’t something settled by mere words... So keep pressing forward. I...will always be watching you from behind.
Hehe. Where do you think you’re going, Your Grace? You’ve set me on fire, so you have to take responsibility for your actions... For if I show you what I’m capable of, you’ll be chilled to the bone.
Whew, that was a good workout...but we’ve gotten so dirty.
I saw the signs...but in the end there was nothing we could do...
Could this be your sweet spot?
Long time no see, Mister! Oh, please be sure to go visit my big sis too, okay? She seemed really lonely while you were gone.
Let’s give it our all today!
Smells good, doesn’t it? The bread’s just about done baking. Would you like one when they’re done, Mister?

The Inquisition captured my big sis and tortured her in the cruelest ways. That’s why she... People call us witches because we can use strange powers...but other than that, we’re just like everyone else... So then...why...?
You’re working way too hard, Mister! You should relax in your room from time to time, like my big sis does!

Getting to be together with my big sis again...feels like a dream. You’re the one that made this dream of mine a reality, Mister, so if there’s ever anything I can do for you, just say the word, okay?
Happy birthday, Mister! Oh, right! It may not be cake...but I baked some birthday bread for you! I hope you like it!
This stuffed bear is more precious to me than anything!
Lately, I feel like I’ve gotten stronger, but...what do you think? You know, even Granny Rosalie praised my skills!
My big sis isn’t just kind, she’s also really cute! Just the other day, she came into my room and—huh? You heard this story yesterday?
Big Sis! Didn’t I tell you thatI’d do the cleaning? Just sit back and relax... Huh? You wanted to spend time with me? Jeez...when you put it like that... Hehehe.
Being here with Mister, my big sis, and everyone... I might just be...no, I’m definitely the happiest girl in the world right now, hehe!

Mister, when you save the world and bring peace to the land one day, I believe that everyone will be able to live happily, regardless of whether they’re a witch or not. After all, you’re the one leading it.
Wow...! This’ll let me protect my big sis even more now!
Are you sure you’re okay with someone like me? Thank you so much!
I need to keep getting stronger and stronger! For my big sis...! For everyone...!
O-Oh goodness... Is it really okay for me to accept all this...?! Thank you so much!
Mister, thank you so much. I... Ehehe...I’m so happy, I don’t know what to say.
With the way I am now, I feel like I could even become the bright sun that shines down on everyone!
We did it, Big Sis! We won!
I was waiting for your return, Your Grace.
I speak for your people when I say, I am not impressed with you neglecting them for so long. But nonetheless...welcome back.
It is our duty to work for the people. Let us strive to fulfill that responsibility, Your Grace.
This sword is a testament to my bond with Ophelia. We made a promise—to take our swords and end each other’s lives should we ever stray from our paths...
My throne feels as if it sits atop a mountain of corpses. But I have no regrets, for I believe the path I followed to be the righteous one.
Watching you work, I feel I can sympathize with Ophelia when she worries about me... This is not something I should say...but for everyone’s sake, why not take some time off so you can recover?
Everyone here is full of life and laughter. It appears there is much I can learn from the way you lead your people.
Happy birthday. I wish that you and your country will be blessed with all the more prosperity.
Once this fight is over, I will restore Vyde to the beauty it once was... That is my duty as queen. I am the one responsible for the calamity that befell my kingdom, after all...
Sonya said she turned into a witch out of admiration for me...but should I do something to take responsibility for what she has become...?
I consider Ophelia the knight I can trust my life with...and the friend dearest to my heart... Even to this day.

Ophelia? Excellent timing. Please come here. Care for a game of chess? I need something to get over this feeling of bore... O-Oh, Your Grace? My sincerest apologies...! W-Well, how about it? Would you fancy a game with me?
Your Grace...I am confident you will understand...the solitude that encages rulers of countries...and the value of those we call friends.
I am certain...after Ophelia and I return to Vyde, we will look back on our time here. When that day comes...will I have walked the right path as queen...?
...This sensation. It is as if power is seething within my body.
You have my thanks. I will not let this power go to waste.
I am beholden to your trust. I swear to repay this debt on the battlefield.
How amazing... I have gotten so strong, and yet this may not even be close to the apex of my power.
No matter how strong I become...saving every life out there will be full of trials and tribulations. But, I must do what I can...
I will never betray any of the hope and trust you have in me. I promise that to you here and now...my dear friend.
There is no greater medicine than hope... Now, let us press forward!
There is nothing either good or bad, but thinking makes it so... Though, ’tis mortifying all the same.
The time for regrets has long past!
M-Master?! Thank goodness you’re home...! I’ve been here waiting for you this whole time...
Are we going on a trip today? I’ll get ready right away!
Master, shhh! You’re gonna wake Cerberus up. Hehe...I guess she fell asleep while playing hide-and-seek.
Cerberus and I were abandoned on that mountain when we were kids. They called us disgusting for being witches...
Master, I know you’re doing so much for others because you’re such a nice guy, but if you wear yourself out, I—everyone will get worried. Please take a break once in a while.
Cooking is my specialty, you know. I used to make food for Cerberus all the time, and she’d always say everything was delicious. Why don’t we eat together some time, Master?
Happy birthday, Master. Cerberus and I prepared a present for you. Here—some wild strawberry jam. It’s a little sweet, a little sour, and really delicious!
Cerberus is still a child, so she’s always coming to me asking for this and that... Even today, I woke up to find her curled up next to me... She’s just too much, isn’t she?
I’m all Cerberus has, so I gotta do my best for her. I don’t mind, though. That’s what big sisters do, right...? But, thank you for worrying about me, Master.
Right now I’m practicing how to use my powers. If I’m not ready when the time comes, Cerberus will get hurt again...
M-Master, why are you petting my head? I’m a big sister, so treating me like this doesn’t make me hap—oh no, my tail...! I-It’s not what you think...!

...It was my fault that Cerberus got hurt back then. I just wasn’t brave enough... That’s why I’ve decided, from now on, I’m really gonna spoil her. I don’t ever wanna see her looking that upset again.
We don’t have a home anymore. But, your country is so nice and warm, Master... So, if it’s okay with you, can we stay with you forever?
Umm...was I able to get a bit stronger?
Your power is so warm, Master. It helps keep me calm.
You mean, I had this much power in me, too...?!
With this power, can I be more helpful to you, Master?
Cerberus... Master... It’s my turn now. I’ll use this power to protect you two till the very end.
Master, you believed in me when I said I was gonna get stronger... I’ll do my very best to not let you down!
Time to muster up...all my courage!
Please call for me whenever you have need of my power.
You have returned... I made certain that your estate was well protected in your absence...
I have been tempering this body of mine to protect Fortina. So I assure you I will be useful on the battlefield.
Have you seen Fortina, sir? No, it is nothing urgent. Just...if I’m not with her...I cannot help but worry...
“Grand Master of the Knights of Longinus,” huh... I may have been brainwashed, but I cannot forgive myself for serving the Pope, of all people...
It is unwise to overwork yourself... I will take over from here, so please get some rest, sir.
In some ways, you remind me of Fortina. You both possess strong hearts, and...are incredibly rigid once you have your minds set.
I have been informed that today is your birthday. Happy birthday, sir. Now, please follow me—Fortina awaits with a cake she has prepared especially for you.
As a child, a contagious disease left my life hanging by a thread... But, the one who saved me from that fate was Fortina...
When we were younger, Fortina and I vowed to one another—I would always be there to protect her, and she would trust me unconditionally... But, we both betrayed those promises...

Fortina seems to be getting along well with Arianrhod... I am glad, as there was no one close to our age back home... Perhaps next time I’ll introduce Ophelia, Luke, and Iris to her... That’ll surely put a smile on her face.

What do you think of me as “Grand Master Florence?” That’s not the real me—just false memories planted into my head... But, what’s real is that there are knights like Arianrhod who look up to me by that name... What a mess...
Umm... Thank you... You brought me back, and for that I can’t thank you enough. Hehe... There are two people I owe my life to now. Actually, you did more than just save me. You—no, forget it.
You desire to build the perfect world. I’ll devote everything I’ve got to make that dream a reality. I’m certain that you—that we can find our way to the future you desire... Don’t you agree?
Please leave the front line to me, sir... I will crush each and every enemy that dares challenge us!
The old me is no more... This time, I will use my power...to protect those who cannot fend for themselves.
The debt I owe you for saving my life shall be repaid... Thus, I swear on this lance...all enemies who stand in your way shall be impaled by my steel...
To this day, I haven’t forgotten the vow I made with Fortina...and I never will. I’ve fought long and hard...for the strength to keep that promise.
You’ve taught me true strength...and I’ll use this power to prove it. I swear on this lance that my resolve will no longer be shaken...
This time, I’ll protect you till I breathe my last. I’ll always have your back...and in return, I’ll trust that you’ll have mine. Now, let’s join forces...to seize the future we desire.
I will not go easy on you!
If you value your life, surrender now!
Master~! I’ve been waiting for you!
Alright! Time to kick some more butt, today! This Viking’s ready for anything!
As a Viking, I need to take good care of my handaxes! It’s almost as important as eating a delicious meal!
Queen Amleth saved my life! She’s the one I admire most in the entire world! I wanna be a Viking as cool as her one day!
If you’re tired, then let me help you out! Hehehe, there’s nothing these arms can’t handle!
Master, I’ll massage your shoulders, so just sit back and relax! I’ll make sure to pound them with all my might to get those knots out—Wait, why are you running away?!
Happy birthday, Master! How does a special all-you-can-eat meat buffet sound?!
Ugh... I’m so hungry... I hope meat’s on the menu today...and tomorrow... Honestly, everyday would be nice, hehe!
A good Viking sails many ships, fights mountains of battles, and, of course, eats pleeenty of food!
The auroras of the Kingdom of Vyde are sooo beautiful! Would you like to go and see them with me someday, Master?
No matter what happens, if you just live your life, everything’ll work out. Just eat, sleep...and before you know it, a new day will be here!
Master, you’re so wise and kind... You kinda remind me of Queen Amleth... Oh, I know! I think you’d look great in a black cape—just like Her Highness!
I have two heroes now. The first is Queen Amleth, of course. And as for the second... It’s you, Master! Hehehe...!
Time to unleash my full Viking power! HOO! HAA! What do you think, Master? Am I as cool as Queen Amleth?
Hehehe...! Master, you’ve got quite the belly! You’d definitely make a fine Viking!
I...can’t believe I’ve gotten this strong... Alright! Now I’ll be the one to protect you, Master!
When we join forces, Master, I feel we can conquer the Seven Seas...! We’re the strongest Vikings in the world!
Ugh... I guess I didn’t eat enough...
I’ve got a surprise for you!
Ah! M’lord! Moddey’s come to get you~! Hehe, aren’t you lucky?
M’lord! Jeez, where were you? Have you been eating well? Sleeping well? I might be good at waiting, but don’t make me worry so much!
Now then, whatcha gonna do today? If you ask reeaally nicely, I might just be able to help you.
Hah...I can’t relax if I’m not taking care of something. Hey m’lord, how about you rough yourself up a bit so I can take care of you?
Even if everyone forgets about the people who sleep in graves, I’ll remember them. That’s a gravekeeper’s job, after all!

You’re working way too hard, m’lord! If I don’t say anything, you’ll never rest! That’s a big no-no in my books! I guess it can’t be helped... Wanna use my lap as a pillow? Act now and I’ll even throw in some head pats, hehe!
You’re really nice, m’lord. I like nice people. Ah, not like that though. Did ya misunderstand, hehe?
Happy birthday, m’lord! This calls for a huge celebration! Hehe, got any requests?
M’lord, are you a dog-person or a cat-person? I’m a dog-person, of course. I used to have a big, black dog named Laila! She was a really good girl!
You’re way too hard-working, m’lord. Y’know, it’s okay to let yourself be doted on from time to time. Want me to give you some nice head pats?
A gravekeeper’s job is a busy one, you know. We’ve gotta take care of the trees around, and clean the graves... It’s the perfect job for someone like me who’s good at taking care of people.
Don’t worry m’lord, I’ll be sure to take good care of your grave. Do ya want some flowers? A nice wreath? Moddey here’ll...h-huh...? Hehe... Wh-Why am I...crying...?
M’lord! Hug attack~! Hehe, so warm... I’m warm, too? Hehe, you better remember this feeling, okay?
I know everyone has to depart at some point...so we’ve got to enjoy the time we do have to the fullest! Having said that...hug attack~! Hehe, don’t run away!
Heh heh heh heh~! Have no fear, the big strong Moddey’s gonna protect you!
You’re gonna keep giving me all this stuff? Hehehe, guess I gotta repay you by devoting myself to you even more!
Wow...to think I’d be able to get this strong... Makes me wonder what would’ve happened if I had this much power back then... Hehe...this isn’t like me, huh?
If I wasn’t with you, I’d never have made it this far. Hehe, seems I’ve learned how cool you really are.
I thought I was the one who was taking care of you, but all this time it’s been the other way around. Mmm...that’s not fair... But...thank you...
Hah hah~! You can praise me now.
Rrrgh... You’re really gonna get it next time...!
Do you want some more? Hehehehe!
Snack time, snack time. What should I eat~? A cake or a cookie~? Gotta be sweet~! Hehehe-ho-haha~♪
Welcome back! Huh? Where’s my souvenir?
Let’s go all out today with maximum smileage!
Maximum smileage! Ah, my lord. I was rehearsing my smile just now... The tiniest amount of stress can rip my happy mask right off...so I gotta be careful...

“A nasty curse invoked by the sacrifices of 10 witches will destroy the world... Ya don’t gotta remember that, but ya got nothin’ to lose if ya do...” Hm? Is something wrong? Nope, I didn’t say anything. Honest!

When you’re tired, you need sweets! C’mooon, everyone knows that! So you’re in for a special treat, my lord—I’m gonna let you pig out on some of my favorite snacks...! Thanks for always working so hard.
“Every nice guy has their limits. But you accept me—accept us, mask and all...” Hehe... That’s what I love about you, my lord! So keep taking care us from here on out, okay? Hehehe.
Happy birthday, my lord! Birthdays are when you can eat as much cake as you like. Oooh I’m sooo jealous... Can you share just a tiiiny piece with me...? Pretty please~?
“Ugh... Don’t assume there’ll be a next time...”
What’s on today’s agenda, my lord?
If you’d been absent any longer, I’d have to come get you myself.
Alright, time for work. Let’s be productive out there.
A true knight is also an enforcer of clean rooms. Here, I’ve taken care of your laundry.
No pain, no gain. Training is hard, but it will pay off in the end.
One should know how to take proper care of themself. So why don’t you take a break? Here, you can use my lap.
Why do I wake you every morning? W-Well...it’s my duty, or rather... J-Just let me do what I want, okay?!
Hey, today is your birthday, isn’t it? Mmm...I guess for today I should be sincere with you... Happy birthday.
Those who live earnestly are often ridiculed... Don’t you think that’s unfair?
I wanted to be someone who does what’s right. As it is now, I don’t know if that’s what knights do, but I know it’s what you do.
I wanted to be like you—strong, kind, unwavering, and cool... Would it be too late if I tried starting now?
I’m trying too hard? No, not even close. If I can’t do this much, I’d be unfit to accompany you. And besides, I don’t want us to merely defend each other...I want us to stand side by side.
I want to fight alongside you. So please...share your burden with me. My sword will always be yours.
This feels great. With this, am I worthy of standing alongside you?
We’re a step closer towards our goals...huh? Where’s your usual pride, you ask? Haha, please! I couldn’t have done this alone. It’s all thanks to you.
This is the result of our efforts...but a special prize awaits to those who gave it their all. So...come here. I’ll lend you my la—huh? Why do you look so upset?
Protect the weak and crush evil—that is the justice I believe in. Let’s go...and seize the future we desire.
Alright~! Ahem...I mean, there’s nothing to it.
I’ll train harder then try again...
The result will speak for itself!
Long time no see, my lord. I-I’m happy that you’re back!
Alright...! Let’s do our best today! Oh, you haven’t forgotten anything, right?
I may not look it, but I actually used to work at an inn! There, I grew to quite like bookkeeping. I was actually doing some organizing just now!
Mmm...our next stop will take two days to get to, so I need this and that... Oh...it might rain though... Ahh...there’s so much I have to plan for.
Wow...you have so much work to do... Is there anything I can help with?
I want to become someone who never shies away from what they believe to be right. Someone just like you, my lord.
Happy birthday, my lord! Today, let’s go shopping... Oh, or maybe you’d rather me cook you a nice meal? Your wish is my command!
I’m going to have to work hard if I want to have a chance to keep up with you, my lord!
Even though I’m still weak and hesitant...I want to become stronger so that I can pursue what I believe to be right.
Have you ever regretted anything, my lord? I have—all because I was weak. And no matter what I do...I just can’t seem to forget about it.
Weak and useless, I came to you wanting to change. Have...I been getting better? What...do you think of me?
Everyone is fighting for the things that are important to them... I’ll work even harder to become someone who can proudly fight by your side. So please, keep watching me, my lord!
With this much power...everything’s gonna be just fine!
Thank you very much! I can still get even stronger!
It’s my turn to answer your expectations this time. Let’s do it!
I can say it with confidence now. I have become stronger, and it’s all because you have been with me... Thank you so much, my lord.
M-My lord! I-Is it okay if I stay here with you...?
...Ah! M-My lord! I-I was waiting so long for you to come home...! I’m so glad you’re back...
Ah...umm... L-Let’s do our best today... Ah...I-I’m sorry... F-Forget I said anything...
Uuu... This is so hard... Ah...! U-Umm...I...was sewing. I used to be really good at it... But...since my hand’s turned into...this...I don’t think I’ll ever be able to sew like I did before...
I...can’t look at look at myself in the mirror. Everytime I see my...horn...it reminds me of what I’ve become...and that I’ll never be able to go back to being normal again...
U-Umm... M-My lord...? M-Maybe you should stop and rest for a little bit... Everyone’s really worried about you. I...umm...I’m also worried about you...

The Church was hunting me down because of this horn and these claws. The whole time I was running...I was so scared...so lonely... I thought those nightmarish days were never going to end... If I hadn’t met you, my lord, I...
Today...is your birthday, right, my lord...? U-Umm...I-If you want...here. It’s nothing special but...I made you a good luck charm. Heheh... U-Umm, my sewing turned out kind of okay this time...
Umm... Y-You...must be scared of my horn...and claws, huh...? O-Of course you are... Normal people don’t have these, after all...
Just now, Sonya...she pointed at my horn and claws...and said they were...cool... Th-That’s the first time anyone has ever said that to me... So I-I’m not sure...how to react...
My lord, guess what! Just now, I was talking with everyone and—huh? I’ve...been smiling a lot more lately...? Ah...eheheh... I have...haven’t I?

This might not exactly be the best place to say this...but right now...I’m...really happy. Ever since I turned into...this...I never felt like I belonged anywhere... But now...I can proudly say it—this is my home!

I’ve made some friends, and have so many things I’m looking forward to...hehe. It’s thanks to you and everyone here that I’m able to experience all this happiness, my lord... Umm...! I...I promise I’ll try my very best, okay? I’ll do everything I can...for you!
M-Me...? A-Are you really okay...with someone like me...? I-I...umm... I’m...really happy...
H-Hehe... You’ve made me stronger again... I’ve got to...try my best to repay you...for all your kindness, my lord...
I’ve...used these claws to fight together with everyone, huh...? I used to hope my hand would turn back to normal one day... But now...these claws...kind of feel like an important part of me.
My lord...! Oh, thank you thank you thank you for always doing so much or me...! I still have a long way to go...but I hope...you’ll let me stay here by your side!
O-Oh no... Wh-What should I do...?!
I’m not scared... I’m not scared...!
Ah, you’re back. Let’s get you caught up.
Well met, sir. Where are you off to survey today? I eagerly await your report.
Ah, it’s you. I was just drafting a letter for the officer in command. They send their regards.
I’m not unaware of the hardships you must face, sir. Even as a simple soldier, I can see how the stress weighs upon you.
Why don’t you get some rest? A tired mind can slow your thinking down.
Time always seems to slow in your presence. I appreciate the rare chance to be so at ease.
Today is your birthday, is it? Well, that’s certainly cause for celebration. It comes but once a year, after all.
I keep imagining what might have been had you never appeared... I wish I could escape such thoughts. Will you help me find the strength?
Tremors... I should be accustomed to battle by now, yet here I am...trembling. Please, stand by my side and help me face my fears.
My beliefs? Ever since that day, I’ve been so focused on protecting what I have, I’d never even stopped to question them.
You truly have some fine companions, sir... I only hope you count me among them.
I used to find myself frozen on the battlefield, terrified of losing those I cherished. But not anymore. No, because I... I know you’ll never die.

After the death of my mother, I couldn’t bear the thought of losing anyone else I held dear. But I now know that you will return from any hardship. You’ve helped me move beyond my fear, sir... Thank you.
I may not be able to free myself from my past, but I can still work toward a brighter future.
Your presence puts me at ease... With you by my side, I feel I could take on an entire division.
You have my thanks. It’s high time I commit and stand to make a difference here.
To find the courage to put faith in others... Yes, I must...if I ever hope to move on.
Death comes not for you, sir, and believing as much has freed me from my fear of loss... May we always fight side by side.
Sir...you took me in and placed your trust in me from the very start. You have in me an unwavering ally, ready to face whatever hardships await. And above that...you have my gratitude.
Hello, my lord... Here you go—your flower for the day.
This autumn daffodil means, “I can’t wait to see you again...” Here you go. It’s your welcome back gift.
Hmm... I wonder which flower I should give out today...?
I’m picking what flower to give out today. Red flowers can brighten someone’s mood, but yellow ones can give them some needed energy... Which one do you think I should go with, my lord?
If I could make any wish come true, I’d want to properly tell Granny, “Thank you.”
Are you okay, my lord? If you want, here... Have some of Granny’s Special Revitalizing Herbal Tea... It might help.
Flowers have all kinds of meanings, and are filled with so many feelings. I hope one day...I can convey how I feel not only through the flowers I give out, but with my own words as well.
Happy birthday, my lord. Here...I made this bouquet out of your birth flowers... Would you...accept it?
It’s thanks to Granny...that I have a future...
I’ve lived with Granny my whole life...so it’s my first time meeting any girls my age... I hope I can actually make some friends...

Hehe...I just made two new friends in the garden—a girl with a pointy hat, and a girl with colorful flowers on her dress. We’re meeting up soon to show our favorite flowers to each other. Want to join us, my lord?

Granny’s love is what healed the pain in my heart... Now, I want to do the same for everyone who’s suffering with grief and despair...together with these flowers born from the seeds Granny left behind.

It’s said that when a flower dies, it leaves seeds behind...as if leaving proof that it was alive. People aren’t any different... I mean, the seeds Granny planted in my heart are definitely growing inside me... Gentle seeds...called love.
You know my lord, my dream is to become a cute grandma. One who’s kind and loved by flowers, just like Granny... C-Can you stay by my side to see if I can actually make that dream come true?
It’s time for the bud in me to blossom...!
I was able blossom so beautifully... Thank you, my lord.
You heal people just as flowers do, my lord. Anyone who looks at you is filled with joy, and their hearts are put at ease... I hope one day I can heal people just like you do...
Granny taught me that flowers give people smiles and heal the pain in their hearts. That’s why I put love into the flowers I give out...praying that the people who receive them can find happiness.
Up until now, I’ve given flowers to all kinds of people. So, for the first time...I want to be given flowers from someone... My lord, can you pick some out for me?

Every flower eventually dies, but the feelings contained within them lasts forever... Thank you for the flowers, my lord. I’ll always be next to you, blossoming so that I bloom more beautifully than any flower you’ve given me.
The nasturtium symbolizes “victory...” Here you go. Keep it as a memento of this battle.
Long time no see... Were you with someone else up till now...?
Can I go with you today...? I’ll be useful, I promise...
Even though I’m sure you have things you need to be doing, you’re spending time with me... Hehe, I’m so happy...
Born into a noble family, I never had the opportunity to experience true love... But now, with you...hehehe...
Last night, you were tossing and turning in your sleep... That hardly ever happens... Aren’t you working a bit too hard...?
Your knight is so strong and dependable... Hah...I wish I could be like her. I’m really jealous that she always gets to be by your side...
Happy birthday... Hehe, let’s celebrate it again next year...and the year after that, and every year to come, okay?
Aaaah...my prince, you look so handsome today... W-Wait, why are you backing away?!
Being the gentlemen that you are, I’m sure you’d say “yes” to any girl...even though you’re the only one for me... Hey, what do I need to do to have you all to myself?
At first, I was thinking about keeping these feelings to myself... But I decided not to...because I wanted to make sure you noticed me... Hehe.
I’d probably do anything for you... Ah, I guess I really am a witch after all. Hehe, so please keep an eye on me so I don’t do anything naughty, okay?
Destiny can be so cruel, yet also so wonderful... It made me a witch, but that’s how I met you. Let’s stay together forever and ever...! Even after we die... For all eternity, hehe.
I want to give you my everything—my heart, my body, my feelings...every last bit of me. I don’t need anything if it means I get to be with you, hehe.
Hehe, I’m a bit stronger now.
If I become as strong as your knight, can I also stay by your side?
Thank you... Now we’re even closer, hehe...
This much attention...for me...? I’m not dreaming, right...?
Ahh...I can’t hold back much longer... Do whatever you want with me...!
Hehe..all these warm and fuzzy feelings—you really are my Prince Charming. I’m gonna stay by your side forever...
Are you saying I’m not good enough...?
Hehe, thanks for waiting, my lord!
I was getting tired of waiting, my lord~!
Alright! Let’s give it our all today, my lord!
Huh? Oh, this crown? It’s nice, isn’t it? I match with Priscilla.
...So sleepy... Huh? A way to keep myself awake? What is it...? Bleh! Not that! Anything but Skuld’s medicine!
My lord, you look like you could use some help... Is there anything I can do? Manual labor is my specialty, you know!
Hmm... Hey my lord, you’re actually pretty popular, aren’t you? Hm, you just kind of give off that vibe.
Happy birthday, my lord! Hey, let’s have some cake!
Zara may not look it, but she’s actually really nice! She’s shy so she’d never admit it...but that just makes you want to say it to her even more, doesn’t it? Hehe.
A lot happened back in the village...but thanks to my friends, it wasn’t all bad. Sucks I can’t ever go back, though...
Back then, I made my choice. No matter what, I won’t give up. I’ll save Priscilla and keep my promise.
Let’s keep at it, my lord. If I’m with you, not even the strongest enemies stand a chance!

You know, I was told that I’m beautiful when I shut up. It’s strange though—I don’t look any different when I’m quiet. What do you think, my lord? Can you take a closer look at me? Ah, why are you running away?!
I love it here. My lord and all my friends are here. Every day is so much fun! Heheheh...
Oh oh, I know what’s happening! I’ve gotten stronger again!
Hey, can I show Priscilla and the others? They’re not gonna believe this!
Hehe, I’ve always wanted to get stronger... And now I think my dream’s come true. Thanks, my lord!
Wow...I can’t believe it! To think I could still get stronger, hehe! And it’s all thanks to you, my lord~♪
I always wondered what this whole magical power thing was. But thanks to you my lord, I understand now. This power...is for protecting my loved ones!
Haven’t seen ya in a while. Been doin’ good?
If ya ever need my help, all ya gotta do is ask.
Ya praisin’ me for helpin’ Miss Val? I don’t need to be treated like some kinda kid...! Helpin’ out this much is nothin’...
Do I like kids? Nah, not really... I’m just used to takin’ care of ’em... Haha. If those punks were still alive, they woulda been this age...
Jeez, you look like crap! Ya gotta take better care of yerself!
Ya remind me a lot of Miss Val... Like how yer a nice guy who takes on everyone’s problems... I guess that’s why I can’t just leave ya alone. I don’t ever wanna see anyone I care for suffer again.
Yo! Today’s yer birthday, ain’t it? Happy birthday.
I was tossed in a garbage dump not long after I was born... Then Miss Val found me. I was a dirty punk covered in food scraps, but she brought me home without even a hint of resentment on her face...
One person alone can’t make a difference. Even if I was there when the orphanage burned down, I dunno if that woulda changed what happened... I wonder what woulda happened if you were there though...

Ya probably dunno this ’bout Miss Val...but she was a really sweet and lovin’ person. She always said evil people don’t exist, and we should trust the hearts of others... Then those lowlives trampled all over that trust...

Hehehe~♪ Oh, happy? Heh...me? I think yer imaginin’ things... Miss Val and I are just goin’ out on a trip, hehe... Why would I be happy over somethin’ as small as that? Haha... I ain’t a kid, ya know.

This mansion has even more brats than I expected... Hm? Hmm, nah. It was ’bout the same in Miss Val’s orphanage. I always had my hands full lookin’ after all those brats...so this place just reminded me of ’em a little...

Don’t try to do everythin’ by yerself. Well, ya got a ton of things on your plate, so it probably ain’t easy for ya to ask for help... But if you’d have me, I’ll do some heavy liftin’... I mean, it’s because you’re...kinda like...m-my family.
Good stuff. Let’s keep it up.
Can’t believe how strong I’m gettin’... I hope this power’ll let me protect my friends now.
We can’t change the past... And that’s exactly why I don’t wanna lose anythin’ important to me anymore. So this time, I’ll use my power to protect everyone!
I couldn’t protect the punks at the orphanage, so I dunno how much I can actually do. But, I wanna live up to yer expectations with everythin’ I got. That’s what this power’s for.
If it looks like you’re goin’ down the wrong path, I’ll be there to stop ya. So push ahead down the path ya believe in. I’ll be followin’ close behind ya.
I always thought the world was a pile of crap. But because of you, it ain’t as bad as I expected... Alright, let’s get to it. Ya still got a lotta work to do, right?
It’s a pleasure to see you again, Master. Have you been well in my absence?
Master, where will we be heading to today?
Ah, we ran out of medicinal herbs. Shall I go collect some for you?
In another country’s field of medicine, it is said that they prioritize practical use over theoretical study. I hope that I, too, can use my practical knowledge to be of use to everyone.
Master, you musn’t sleep in a place like this. You will catch a cold.
The fact that I’m able to treasure people’s lives once more...is without a doubt all thanks to you, Master.
Happy Birthday, Master. Would...you like to accompany me on an outing sometime?
Have you been taking care of yourself lately? A proper lifestyle is quintessential for one’s health.
As I look at you, I am reminded of the past—of that lady whose kindness touched my heart.
I’m grateful to have met you, Master. Now, I’m able to use my knowledge of medicine to protect those I care about. I am forever in your debt.
My former master once said that a great wise man would one day appear and change the world... Now I am certain that she was talking about you.
Master... If there comes a day when I can finally put down my guns...will you... Ah, please don’t mind me. I will tell you once this battle comes to an end.
I must continue fighting to prevent any more tragedies. If that’s what it takes to ensure that you and those who come after you can live peacefully, then I will see it through till the end...
This power...! With this, will I also be able to save someone?
I may still be weak and inexperienced, but I will not let you die, Master.
I cannot thank you enough for putting your faith in someone like me, Master.
I will continue to devote myself to you and your great companions, Master.
Let us correct the atrocities that wrong this world. If anyone can succeed at this, it is you, Master. I will devote my entire being to supporting you.
We must continue moving forward. I will stay by your side, Master—no matter what happens.
Yet again, I was unable to save anyone...!
Fear not... It will be quick.
’Tis a pleasure to see you. Thank you for coming all this way, my lord.
Oh, my lord. ’Tis been many a day. I was relaxing here as I awaited your return. Would you care for some dango?
To ponder death is to ponder life... The people we meet blossom into our lives, bidding us farewell when their last petal falls. Such words are easy to say, but difficult to truly understand.

Ah, I see your attention’s drawn to this katana. Your face says it all... Hahah—you think it to be too large for me. Worry not, my lord, for I’m trained to wield it as if it were part of my own body—something I’ll gladly prove on the battlefield.

When I came to this land after my family betrayed me...I often resented this world for being as cruel as they were. But...there can be no rainbow without rain. If I hadn’t braved through the storm, I would not be in your service today, my lord.
How about stopping for a short rest, my lord? Long journeys needn’t be met with haste.

“A samurai’s life belongs to the one who truly values it...” ’Twas not long ago when I finally grasped the meaning of those words...P-Please allow me to leave it at that. I can feel my cheeks turning slightly...warm...
My word—is it your birthday? Such a joyous occassion! Shall I perform a dance in celebration?
With this, victory is ours, my lord!
A worthy adversary... Hurry—escape while I hold them back!
Tis time to turn the tide...!
Your Excellency, I await your orders.
When I’m not around...please take someone in my stead...
It’s peaceful... Reminds me of my village...
Your Excellency...you are working too hard. Please take a short rest. I’ll stand watch.
You’re an odd one, Your Excellency... I...mean that in a good way...
Rean is as restless as ever... She could learn a thing or two from Priscilla...
Would you like to train...together...? We’ll start with some sit-ups—500 of them.
Aaah... Skuld made me drink another weird elixir... Ugh...I feel sick...
If I had only made it to my village faster... Though...it’s not like I deserve to be forgiven by everyone...
Your Excellency... I’m honored that I get to fight under your command. I look forward to...many more years together...
My body feels so light... With this...surely...
My home...and my friends... This time, I’ll use my own two hands to protect them—even if it costs me my life.
My unwavering loyalty is yours, Your Excellency. No matter how difficult the mission may be...if it’s for you, I will see it through.
The target has fallen. Mission complete.
I’ll slow them down. Please retreat at once.
Oh, it’s you. What can I do for you today?
Oh, it’s you! If you plan on leaving for a long time, at least let someone know! Here I thought you had left me behind, and I was to be alone once more...
It’s time to once again go and help out as much as I can.

I was teaching Soltina how to use her powers, and lo and behold, now I have 10 students. Hehe, my hands have gotten quite full. Are they a bother to me? Not in the slightest. I take care of everyone—witch or not. For this is the kind of future that my master desired.
A witch’s power comes from her heart. That means if a storm rages inside her heart, she loses control of that power. When you save a witch, you do more than just that—you also save her heart.

Nothing good will come from wearing yourself out. You need to rest once in a while. Now come—just for today, I’ll let you pet me on the head to your heart’s content. Hehe...my old master used to do the same. He especially liked behind my ears...
You’re a duke, but I can’t sense much grandeur in you. You’re a good person full of nothing but kindness, and all you do is worry for others... Good grief, you needn’t resemble him that much...
I heard today’s your birthday. How delightful. You’re now one step closer to adulthood. You needn’t worry—growing older isn’t all bad. Just remember to stay diligent with your work.
Does this staff concern you? I suppose it would—it’s quite old with no magic power left in it, and a bit too large for me... But, this is all that remains of the bond between my master and I.

There are demons sealed underground—deep within the pits of Hell. Should they reemerge, this land will fracture, rise up, and ultimately be sent adrift high into the sky. That will truly be the end—the moment our world turns into a world of demons.

In all my years, I’ve done just about everything, and I’m always seeking new things to excite me. So, I had some mystery hot pot. Everyone threw in whatever random ingredients they wanted, and in the end we had no idea what monstrosity we created. The flavor was something new, even for me... Ah... It made for quite the delicious feast.

Don’t you ever think of sacrificing yourself. If you hold anyone dear, then that’s all the more reason to find a way to stay with them and live on. After all, no one will be happy if their survival comes at the cost of the one they love...

I’m called the Great Sorceress, but there’s nothing great about me. I’ve traveled the world, read every kind of book known to man...and the only thing I’ve learned is that the dead never return. I’m powerless. For as you can see, I am merely a small, weak girl...
Hm, not bad, if do I say so myself. Takes me back to my younger days.
Hehe... Perhaps I do have some power left in me after all?
How do I still possess all this power? In all my years, I thought I’d seen everything, but I suppose there’s still much I don’t know.
This strange sensation is unlike anything I’ve ever felt from Master. So this is your power—the power to bond with others as your heart pleases.

Master protected me, and since then I’ve never aged a single day. It’s only a matter of time before you all leave me behind... But until then, I will protect everyone. What? You needn’t worry... The loneliness is nothing new to me.
See? Even after 200 years, I’m still going strong.
It seems the enemy was just a little too strong for us...
Even now, Master is still with me...
Hi, my lord. What should we do today?
Welcome back, my lord! I just knew you’d come back. How have you been?
Oh, you ready? Perfect! Then come on, let’s go!
Pretty clothes are nice and all, but maybe I’ll wear something cute for a change... Hey, my lord, which do you think I should wear?
When I lived in the village, I never imagined the outside world would be this...big... And it’s all thanks to you that I get to experience it all, my lord!
Jeez, you’re still working? I guess it can’t be helped. I’ll give you a hand so...let’s go home together, okay?
I think it’s really amazing how genuine you are, my lord. I hope I can be like you some day.
Happy birthday. Hey...umm...do you want to go somewhere today? Maybe...just the...two of us...?
I lived in the village for so long, I’m not quite sure what to do here. I wonder what I need to do to become normal...?
In town today, I bought one of those hair accessories everyone’s talking about. What do you think? Being a witch, I’ve never really tried to accessorize before. Do...I look weird?
I’m already at a disadvantage ’cause I’m a witch, but to have all these rivals in my way too... Hah... W-Wait, my lord?! How long have you been there?! Huh? I wasn’t saying anything! Aha...ahahaha...

I need to become someone that doesn’t stand out like a sore thumb next to you. I mean...you’ve got your status to uphold and all... Having a country bumpkin like me around would make you look pretty lame, huh?
I may be a witch...and a country bumpkin, but I’m done with using those as excuses. After all, you accept me just the way I am. So...I’m going to do my very best to make you fall for me, okay?
You’re giving this to me...? I-I’ll treasure it.
You’re doing all this...for someone like me...? Thank you, my lord.
I’ve gotten pretty strong, huh? I’m still far from catching up with everyone of course, but with you here, I won’t let myself lose to anyone.
Hehe! Yay, you’re back! Now we can play together again!
What should we do today, Emma?
Me? I was admiring this shade of red. Red is sooo beautiful. I love red. Do you wanna look at it too—at this beautiful red apple?
This is Emma! She’s my best friend! Emma’s the only one who’ll always stay by my side and never break.
Hey! You have to take a break once in a while! If you don’t, you won’t be able to play with me!
You also like the color red, right Mister? That’s what I thought. Just like me... Hehe, I’m so glad! Aren’t you too, Emma?
It’s your birthday today, right? Happy birthday. Here, this is a present from me and Emma... It’s a deep red apple.
Do you like the color red?
Red is my favorite color. It’s flashy and bright... Hah...I looove it!
Hey, Mister. Will you dance with me if I wear a red dress? Of course, I’ll prepare a special red suit for you, and then we’ll match! Hehe, I hope you like it...right, Emma?

If you were stained in red, I think I’d love you even more, Mister. But when people are stained in red, they stop coming to play. So I’ll leave you for later, ’cause talking to you is just so much fun. Hehe, isn’t that right, Emma?
Why I’m not playing with my dolls today? Hehe, silly, it’s just the two of us right now... I don’t need my dolls—just you and me... That’s all I need... Hehe.
I want to wear a gorgeous, red dress to our wedding. You’ll wear a red tuxedo. We’ll be surrounded by dolls, and swear our eternal love... It’ll be so beautiful, hehe! You think so too, right?
Red, red! More and more red!
Hey look! Everything’s all red! Hehe, I’m so happy!
Look, I’m all covered in red! Don’t I look cute? Hey, why’re you running away?
Look at us go, Emma! Let’s continue covering everything in red! Oh, him? We’ll leave him for the very end... We’ve got to save the best for last, right?
I dress my favorite dolls in a special, red dress. I want to dress you in it too, but I wanna talk with you a bit more. So I’ll keep it for later, hehe.
Ah! Mister Apprentice, you’re back! I’ve been waiting!
I-I thought you weren’t coming back to see me anymore! It’s not good to slack off, you know!
So...what are your plans for today? As your master, I plan on tagging along...but...that’s fine with you, right?
See? If you water your plants and patiently raise them, flowers will bloom. With my power, this never happens...
If I remember corrently, there was a witch who liked flowers, right? M-Maybe I should go and try talking to her... I-If I do, uh, would you mind coming along, Mister Apprentice?
It’s not good to work yourself so hard like that! Like my master always used to say, “Resting is a part of training.”
Being next to you makes me...so relaxed... O-Oh, was I bothering you?!
Happy birthday, Mister Apprentice. At least for today, please prioritize yourself, okay? I...uh...I-I’m not so good at gift giving... Umm... M-Maybe I can give you a hug...? H-How does that sound?
I’ve always wanted someone to talk to... B-But...I just couldn’t bring myself to leave the forest...
Hmm? Why I call you “Mister Apprentice?” W-Well...that’s because...uhh... D-Do you not like it? S-Should I call you something like...“m-my b-bro...?”
H-Hey, Mister Apprentice. Will you consider becoming my actual apprentice? You could live here...and maybe...do the chores...?
You won’t leave me...right...? Oh, no, uh... S-Sorry, forget that! Ahaha...ahaha...
I never want to lose someone because of me again... So please...until this battle ends, let me stay by your side.

When this battle comes to an end...though I’m in no position to say something like that...but if it does, I’ve decided to bloom some flowers again. I’ll give them to my master for sure this time...and to you too, of course.
Hehe... Behold, Mister Apprentice! Your master’s gotten stronger!
Ah...I’ve felt this before... My body’s so...warm...
Even if I’m not able to change the future...will you stay with me?
With your help, I’ve finally forgiven myself a bit... Thank you, Mister Apprentice. Uh...I-I hope...we can stay together for a long time to come...

I won’t falter anymore, for I am Merlyn, “The Witch of the Deep Forest.” I’ll protect you and your loved ones from anything that may come. So don’t worry, my dear Mister Apprentice—you can count on me!
Mister Apprentice! D-Did you see that!
Oh, you’re here. Guess I gotta stop paying hookey then. You wanna know what I’ve been up to? Heh, not telling~
Well well well, haven’t seen your face around. You’ll make a great target... Hehe, I’m kidding. Although...for making me wait so long, I think I’ll have you do me a favor~
Now then, let’s work hard again today to put smiles back on people’s faces!
If I don’t pay attention to both of my pistols equally, one of them gets really sulky. You must be used to that sort of thing too, huh?
Trick shots, quick draws, long shots—there’s no trick that’s too hard for me. I’ve still got tons more up my sleeve though, so hope you’re ready to be blown away~♪
Hey, you’re looking kinda tired. Heh, you can’t fool my eyes. Here, I’ll give you one of my magnificent gun spinning performances, so sit down and relax a bit.
Y’know, this place is pretty comfy. It feels kinda like...my second home... Although, I guess it would actually be my third home... Hehe, either way, I like it here!
Happy birthday! Hehe, gotta pull out all the stops for celebrations like this! I’ve been saving this special trick just for today, so watch and be amazed!
Mmmm... Smell that? Don’t you just love the smell of gunpowder?

You might already know this, but I used to be in the circus. With how things are right now though, the circus is the last place people wanna be. That’s why we’ve gotta dissolve the Curse, so that they can smile again, right?
I really like...being watched... Ah, I meant I like it when people watch me perform! When I see them smile, my heart gets all warm, hehe~♪
Y’know, there really are a lot of interesting people here. They might just give the band of fun weirdos in my old circus troupe a run for their money.
When all this is over, I’m thinking of returning to the circus. So...if you want...you should come watch...with everyone. Y-You definitely won’t regret it! How ’bout it?

Hey, if I really go back home...will you be lonely? If you tell me you’ll be so lonely you won’t know what to do with yourself...you can stop me, you know? Then...maybe I’ll stay by your side forever. Hehehe~♪
Gotta keep these pistols in tip-top shape!
Yes...! Gimme some more of that~♪
Hehe, aww yeah! I just keep getting stronger! Now even the hardest gun tricks seem like a piece of cake~♪
I dedicate this trick shot to you for being so devoted to me... Hey, don’t move. Do you want me to hit you?
I feel like now I might actually become the world’s greatest gunslinger... Hey, you wanna take over the world together...? Hehe~♪

Anyone that tries to stop us...or take away the smiles of innocent people...I’ll use this power and shoot them all down... Haha, just kidding~! Now, come on! Act two of the great Cordie’s performance is about to begin! Hehe. I’ll let you watch me shine from the best seat in the house!
Did you enjoy the show? Don’t forget to leave your money on your way out♪
Uh oh... Wanna make a run for it?
Watch and be amazed at this trick shot!
Welcome home, Master! I was waiting like a good kid... Are you proud of me?
Master, if you need help, tell me, ’kay? You can count on me!
I’m not sleepy...just a bit tired... ’Cause Master’s lap is so comfy...
I’m so happy... I have a home...!
Master, you okay? Is it nap time?
Master believes me... I believe Master, too.
Master, happy birthday! I picked some flowers for you. Can I give them to you?
Master is my home. What’s “home” mean? Oh, I know! Umm, a warm place! Huh? It’s not?
I looked for my home for a realllyy long time. Then I met Master, so...I’m not sad anymore... Gimme a hug, please?
Master believed me. I believe Master too. Forever and ever...’cause Master is my...uhh... Hehe...it’s a secret~
If Master gets lost, I’ll go find you, ’kay? Uuuu, why are you petting my head?
You know, home is where you end each day at. Master is my home, and I’m Master’s home. So please, come home to me everyday, my... N-Nevermind.
Master believed me, so I was able to get really strong... Now it’s my turn. I’m always gonna protect Master. So please, always be my home, ’kay...? You know, home also means family.
I...got stronger. Are you proud of me...?
Look, I’m stronger! Master, gimme a hug. Please...?
Master believed in me, so I tried really hard.
Master is my home. Yup, I’ll never ever get lost again ’cause...you’ll stay with me forever, right?
Master believed me. I believe Master too. So, I won’t get lost anymore.
This time, I’ll become Master’s home. So make sure to come back to me everyday, ’kay?
Welcome back, my lord. How are you feeling today?
Welcome back, my lord. It’s been a while since I last saw you. Everything okay? If anything’s on your mind, I’m all ears.
Alright, I’ve got to give it my all at work today so that Little A and I can have lots of fun later!
Draw a circle here. Draw a circle there. And just like magic, we have a little bear! Hehe, doing this really makes me feel like a kid again.

Hmmm... Would you say it’s better to stay in this body, but lose all of my memories...or duplicate all of my memories into a different body...? Where do you think the essence of life is found—in the body, or in the mind?
Speaking from experience, the most effective way to improve productivity is to take periodic breaks. Having said that, which would you like—coffee or tea?
My lord, thanks to you I can enjoy each passing day with Little A. I’m grateful...from the bottom of my heart.
Today’s your birthday, my lord? Happy birthday! For your present... Hehe, I can create just about anything out there, so what tickles your fancy?

I didn’t want to become a witch. If I could get rid of these cursed powers, I would. That’s why I started this research. Life, the soul, magical powers... If I can figure out how they’re all connected, I should be able to find a way to turn a witch back into a human.

We must value every life out there. All those homunculi I created were living beings. That’s something I didn’t understand back then. Though...it’s not like I can do anything to make up for what I’ve done...

Little A’s going through a rebellious phase lately. She gets angry if she catches me with midnight snacks, berating me at how unhealthy they are. To think that she worries about me... Hehehe, I wonder if this is what it feels like to be a mother...

Hey my lord, I’m sure work ties you down, but can you free up a day for Little A and me? If you like, how about the three of us go out on a picnic? I want to create as many fun memories as I can while I still have the chance.
Isn’t this body just the cutest thing? I call it my crowning achievement, but what do you think?

Everything I do, I do for Little A. I don’t know how much time we have left together...but I’m sure my luck has run dry... So if anything happens to me, please take care of my dear Little A. You’re the only one I can ask.
Have I made another fascinating breakthrough?
What do you think? Does my ingenuity make me look cool?
Thank you, my lord. I’ve got to work hard to meet your expectations.
In all my research...I never would’ve guessed my magical power could progress to this stage. I guess there’s still much I need to learn...
At this stage...I’m sure I’m strong enough to protect both you and Little A. Don’t worry, I won’t work myself to the bone anymore... At least...I’ll try not to.
If I have this much power, I can stay with everyone for a little bit longer. I’ll prove how useful my expertise is, so please keep me by your side from now on.
I wonder if Little A was watching me.
I take full responsibility for this...
“Thou shalt execute every order with dignity.” In the event you need me, feel free to command me as you please...
Have you returned, my liege...? The preparations for your homecoming will be readied without delay.
“For the protection of the good and the innocent...” Come now, let us depart.
I was updating our records. There is so much to learn from looking into the past.
My name? Yes. I was raised as a knight and graciously bestowed the name “Luke.”
Forgive me for being forward, but overexerting yourself will prove harmful to your body. You should allow yourself to rest...

“The future is in our hands... It is by living that we have the power to protect it.” Hah...yes, my previous lord taught me that. Thus, I devote my sword to the futures of you and your loved ones, my liege...so that victory will one day be yours.
I heard that today is your birthday. Please allow me the honor to say...happy birthday.
If something needs to be done, use me as you will... I will be waiting for your command.
The Witch Hunt must be stopped at once... I cannot bear such an act of inhumanity any longer!
Arianrhod is full of potential... She’ll surely make a fine knight. I think I understand why Grand Master Florence thinks so highly of her.
You are also carrying a harsh fate on your shoulders... Should you be on the verge of breaking, call out to me. As your knight, allow me to share that fate with you.

Disaster awaits all who get close to me. Everyone dies... I had given up, resigning myself to this cursed fate. But things are different now. I will do all I can to protect everyone’s futures... Come what may, I will defy this fate...!

A knight’s greatest blessing is finding a lord to devote their life to... I was fortunate to have found two... My liege, this power is for ensuring you and everyone else have a future. I swear on my knight’s pride...that I will waver no more.
If I get stronger...would that prevent any more people from dying...?
My sword is yours, my liege... I will serve you even if it means my demise.
Your word is law... We believe you, and will follow you to the end... “Triumph and glory will be yours, my liege!”
No matter the enemy, I will show no mercy to anyone standing in your way... For the sake of everyone’s blessed futures...I will forge ahead!
I dread...that you will meet your end should you shield others from harm’s way. Thus, I pledge to guard you and the ones you protect...as your defender.

All this time I was afraid...of losing my honor as a knight... But now, my desire to protect you transcends honor...for it is my heart that wills it... I can use this power you’ve bestowed upon me to make your ambitions reality... That is my pride.
I dedicate this victory in your name, my liege...
I have sullied your great name, my liege...
In the name of my liege!
H-hey you...! Took ya long enough! Idiot! I-I’m not crying!
Alright, let’s get to work. If ya don’t work, ya don’t eat, right?
You can stare all ya want, but this is my bread. I ain’t gonna give ya any...
The chief would always tell us to “stay strong.” Now, I got you in my life, so I gotta work extra hard to live by those words. As the last of the Tribe, I’ll carry on what I learned from him.
Woah, you okay? Stop and take a break already. I’ll take over from here, okay...? Huh? Hmm... What the heck’s this crap...? Actually, I’m good. You can do it.
When everything’s back to normal, ya wanna come to my homeland with me? I wanna introduce ya to the chief and all my friends... And, I want ya to see the mountain I grew up on.
I heard the news. Today is your birthday, ain’t it? Happy birthday!
As the Mountain Tribe says, “Stay Strong!”
Hey! I just completed my newest elixir. Wanna be the lucky one to test it?
It’s been a while, huh? You been taking care of yourself?
If you ever need anything, I’m always more than happy to help.
Oh, this thing? It’s a sample of my newest elixir. Hmm, I should get Zara to test it...
How do I know those three? You see, I stayed in their village for a while. That’s when we met. Hmm... Those were simpler times...
You feeling sick? Take this—my newest elixir. It’ll take care of that fatigue of yours. And don’t you worry, it’s already been tested, hehe...
There haven’t been many who’ve piqued my interest, save for my younger sisters... Until now, that is. So you’ll tell me more, won’t you...? About yourself?
Hey, today’s your birthday, huh? Happy birthday. Here, you can have my special... Hehe, don’t worry, it’s just tea.
Long day, huh? Should I whip up an elixir for you? Hm? The taste...? Well...I promise it’s good for you.
Having had two older sisters myself, I’ve noticed that older siblings like to spoil, and younger siblings like to be spoiled. That being said, which way do you prefer I treat you?
Don’t you look tired today? How about I treat you to a nice shoulder rub... Come here.
Hey, I’m heading out to research some herbs. Wanna come...? Huh? No, Rean and the others aren’t coming... It’ll be just the two of us.
Mmm... I’ve been way too absorbed in this research... Ow, my shoulders... Hey! Give me a massage, will ya? When you finish, I promise to return the favor.
Heh, guess I’ve still got some growing up to do, huh?
I gotta put in the work to be strong like those three... Hey, keep that between us now, you hear?
Those three depend on me, so it’s no surprise I’m capable of doing this much. I hope you depend on me for more now too.
Hugging is apparently the best remedy to reduce fatigue. So come here...I’ll help you feel better.
Seeing you work so hard inspires me all the more to help. So anytime you need me, just call my name.
See? Nothing good comes out of being rough.
I don’t like it when things get rough, but...
How’re you doin’? I’ll be counting on ya today.
Been a long time, eh? Well, I’m glad you seem well.
Oh, hey there. Now then...let’s get a move on.
Jeez, it’s already this late!? I really have no sense of time when I’m painting... I’ve even gone and forgotten my own age! Not that it really matters, though.
Look at this skull...! Ain’t it beautiful? Dunno who’s it is, but I bet it’s gonna give me a nice, deep color.
Oh? You look so drained you could pass out any second now. If you keel over, you’re gonna become another addition to my paint collection, so you better watch out.
You really don’t mix in with other colors, eh? I like that—fits my style.
Today’s your birthday, eh? Guess I gotta paint something to celebrate.
It ain’t easy to express different eras, but that’s my job as an artist.
Now then, what should the subject of my next piece be? Maybe an animal for a change of pace...? No wait, I know something even better...
You’re like a paintbrush, repainting the world one stroke at a time. I bet the future you paint will be filled with happiness.
Everyone has times when they lose inspiration, right? If that happens, all you gotta do is take a deep breath. Then, maybe you’ll even come up with things you hadn’t before.

If you’re painting the future, then I’ll paint the past. I’ll make sure each and every one of my paintings reaches people in the future. I’ll be sure to put you in as well. Don’t worry, I’ll make you handsome.
When I’m with you, I just keep getting stronger and stronger, eh?
Wow! This is amazing! Gets the creative juices flowing. Thanks.
What a good feeling! Haha! Since you’ve put me in such a good mood, guess I gotta try even harder now.
Thanks for showing me a glimpse of a new world, full of colors. Now it’s my turn to color the road that you take.
I’m drained... Let’s go back already.
Yaaaaay! Welcome back, my lord! Dezzy here’s happy to see you, too...! I think!
Ah, there you are! Jeez, here I thought you left to start on your own adventure! Oh! But If you ever feel like doing that, let’s go and check out as many worlds as we can together!
Do you know the Tree of Life? Many worlds are born there, and I—oh! It’s snack time! Catch ya later~
My lord, get this! My staff has an awesome secret behind it. See, it’s actually a witch’s—ah. I forgot, so never mind.
You interested in this little cutie on my head? Her nammmeee’s Dezzy! She’s named that ’cause she’s the God of Destruction...! Ah! No don’t! If you wake her up, the world’s gonna end!!
Hey my lord, you know too much work is bad for you, right? ’Cause you’re actually—nah, that’s not something for me to say. No siree.

There’s something weird about you my lord...! Huh? Well, you go out of your way just to have me next to you. I don’t think there are many people like that... Yup. You’re the weirdest guy I’ve ever met! Hehehehe!
Happy birthday! For your gift, I’ll reveal the world’s deepest and darkest secrets—no, wait. Instead, how about I let you smother yourself in Dezzy’s fluffiness?!
Everyone here’s got something bugging them, huh...? Hah...I just love listening to their stories.
Huh? I don’t lie! I only speak the truth, the whole truth, and nothing but the truth. So you can trust me! Come on...pretty please!

Until now, I’ve traveled to aaaaalllllll these different places, but I’ve never been to one as comfy as this. Huh? What kind of places have I been to? Well, that’s for me to know, and you to find out.
My lord, I’m sorry for not being very strong. The truth is, Dezzy and I have hidden pow—aah! Dezzy’s gonna wake up! That’s enough for today!
Hehehe... My lord’s heart is so pure. So as a special present, I’m gonna tell you my secret. But there’s a catch—you can’t turn back once you hear it. Sound good...? Okay then, listen carefully.
Huh? I’ve got even stronger?! For real?!
Wow, my lord...you’ve made me this strong...?! You’re pretty amazing...!
I didn’t think I could even get this strong... Maybe now’s the time to—huh? Oh! No, I wasn’t saying anything!

I’m so happy I came here... I love this place more than anywhere else I’ve ever been! It’s like I finally have a place that I actually want to love and protect. You know, I’m still not very strong but...when things get really dangerous, I’ll protect you all with everything I got.
Did we just win? I know! I can’t believe it, either!
Run awaaay! Come on, left right left right!
Ah, you’re here! Welcome back, Master! Meow...? Did you get taller or something...?
Where are you going today? Mimi wants to come with you, meow!
Just you wait—Mimi’ll be a super paw-some girl someday! And then...Mimi can eat all the fish she wants!
In Mimi’s old home, there was a really paw-some girl! She was good at dancing and everyone loved her! Mimi really wants to see her again. Master will definitely like her!
Purrrr... Mimi’s tired. Haaaah... Time for a nap...
Being with Master makes Mimi all cozy. Mimi will be with you fur-ever!
Birthdays? Dunno what that is, but if it’s the day Master was born, it must be a special day!
Meow...Mimi’s so hungry... Hah...I wanna have some fish bones... What? Hoomans dont eat them? Weirdos!
Ah, Master! My friend here is lost. Let’s help her out, meow! Hey! Tell me about your master... Meow... Me-meow...? Meow...! Meow...meow, uh huh... Meow? Can Mimi understand cats? Can’t you, Master?
Purrr...Master’s lap is the best place to relax... Ah...it’s so warm, and comfy... Hmm...Mimi’s getting sleepy... Purrr... Hmm...MEOW!
Hey Master, Any plans today? If you’re free, then dance with Mimi! I thought up a dance routine that the two of us can do together! Come on, let’s dance, meow!
Master always shows new things to Mimi. Yummy things...fun things...purr-dy things... Mimi was a stray cat, but thanks to Master, Mimi can have so many wonderful experiences. Thank you!
Someday, when Mimi becomes a paw-some girl, I’ll let you eat as much good food as you like, Master! So...please stay with Mimi fur-ever and ever! Meow!
Oh my god! Has Mimi gotten more paw-some?!
Being a witch is nice and all, but Mimi also wants to be a dancer...
Meow! Soon, Mimi will be the most dazzling dancer around. Just you wait!
Is this fur real?! Meow! Mimi can be this paw-some, too...? If Mimi becomes more paw-pular, will Master feel lonely? Hehe!
Watch, Master! Mimi will now perform her purr-dy magical dance! I wanna enchant Master, so I practiced really hard... Meow? What’s “enchant?” I dunno! Meow!
Master! Thank you for helping me get so purr-fect! Master gave Mimi so much, so Mimi will make every day paw-some for Master. So please, stay with me fur-ever!
Long time no see. I’m ready to go when you are~
Let’s give it our all today, Master!
Heh heh... Look at this beauty! Been a while since I’ve gotten this big of a catch. Hey now, I didn’t steal this, okay~?
I may be a swindler, but I don’t just fool anyone, you know. After all, it’s just as hard for the one that’s fooled. Huh? Don’t fool them in the first place? Okay, I’ll stop...! Probably.
Keep at it and your shoulders will turn to stones. Let’s loosen up! Relax...relax~
Master, I love you—what? I’m totally serious. No lies here.
Oh? It’s your birthday today, Master? Is there something you want me to do for you? All you gotta do is say the word! Just for today though, okay?
Who knew enjoying life could feel this good. Thank you.
You really do like to hang around me, huh? I can’t tell if you’re just really gullible, or if you’re actually a good guy...
I lie and lie, and lie... But I guess I don’t need to do that anymore, huh? Hey, don’t doubt me like that. After all, I believe you, Master, so it’s only fair you do the same.
I’m a genius swindler and you’re a genius lord of virtue. Hmmm, are you just good by nature...or were you raised to be good...?

Master, which would you rather have—the harsh reality, or white lies? Though, either way, I’d still cover up the truth if it really was harsh. I may not look it, but I’m actually really good at lying.
You really are a good guy, huh, Master? I used to hate being around people like you... Actually, I still hate it. Aahh, my chest hurts! Don’t get any closer to me—I might actually fall for you!
Woah! Look at all this new power!
Heheh, looks like I got stronger.
Thanks for always doing so much for me, Master.
If Master believes in me, guess I gotta do the same.
Master, please don’t let yourself be fooled by anyone other than me, okay?
Mmm... You’re giving me this much...? You’re serious... At this rate, I’m gonna wanna actually help you...
Hey, my lord. How’re you doing?
Long time no see. Let’s get going then.
Woah, what lovely weather. On days like this, I just wanna go outside and dance my heart out. Hey, you wanna join?
Hey, I was just going through my stretching routine. I’ve gotta stay in shape, you know. Can’t have that cat-girl seeing me slacking off, now can I?
My dance doesn’t come from this continent, so that’s why it has a pretty unique rhythm. Or...that’s what I was taught anyway... I’ve never actually seen it performed before.
You’re looking pretty tired... I-I’m not gonna look after you if you go and pass out, you know.
The western continent...! Ahh...I really wanna go! H-Hey, ahaha! Don’t give me that face! I’ll stay with you until this battle ends. I also have someone I’m looking for too, after all.
Happy birthday. Just for today...umm...I guess I could put on a special performance just for you...
You’re the lord of a country, right? You’d better tell your people about my dance, okay?
Hmm... You’re better than I thought. I don’t hate hard workers like you.

The world is full of Curses and enemies, yet you refuse to give up... Jeez, you’re just like that cat-girl... Alright then, I’ll stay and dance by your side till this is all over. Let’s give it our all.

An ocean of sand, a brilliant silver moon... There are all these legends about my homeland, but I think it’s best if I go and see it with my own eyes. Even if it turns out to be something completely different, I’d still be satisified.
