When I was dancing at the bar, it never even crossed my mind that I’d travel like this...or that I’d be saved by such a nice person like you. Hehe, I sure am lucky. You’re lucky to have met me too, right?

Leaving the continent and traveling west is my dream. But you have your duty as a lord... Hah, I never thought I’d feel any regret leaving this place... I-If I ask you to come with m—n-nevermind... For now, just let me dance by your side, ’kay?
I’ve learned some new dance moves, so please look forward to them.
Thanks. Being with you gives me so much inspiration.
This dance is just for you. So don’t look away, alright?
Letting me shine like this... You really are something!
All this...just for me...? S-Stop it...! If you give me any more, I won’t be able to leave you.
Y-You really...? Wh-What do you think you’re doing, giving so much attention to someone like me?! You know what? I’ve decided—you’re coming with me on my journey.
I look forward to all the good we can accomplish today, Your Grace.
It has been a long time. I am relieved to see you have been keeping yourself healthy.
Let us make every effort count so we can perform our good deed for the day, Your Grace.
How are you doing on this lovely day, Your Grace? Please, have a look at the garden. The flowers are blooming so beautifully!

Perform one act of kindness every single day. We will be rewarded with a place in Heaven for all the good we do... Mm...Grandma taught me that when I was a child. I am sure she is there now...with Mother, and everyone else I knew and loved...
Are you feeling tired? You always do your utmost to take care of us, so please...make sure to get some rest from time to time.
Everything will be fine. As long as you believe, I have complete faith that we will emerge victorious.
Happy birthday. The two of us are able to share moments like this because God’s love shines down on us.
For me, becoming a witch may have been...a blessing in disguise. This power may seem cursed, but with it I am able to do even more good for the people who need my help.
Curses...creatures...the Church... What should we do so that the people of the world can live in peace? There must be something we can do...
You truly are a wonderful person, Your Grace. You beam with joy as you selflessly save anyone in need of help... I am certain a person of your benevolence is worthy of a place in Heaven.

Your Grace, what kind of place do you imagine Heaven to be? For me...it is a place where hundreds of lovely flowers bloom. And...one where we can enjoy every single day with our loved ones... Hehe, I guess it is not much different than here.
One day...if I fail to return from battle, please do not mourn for me. I shall merely be going to Heaven a little earlier so I can welcome you at its gates.

Your Grace, when I think about how I can continue to live alongside you...I am overwhelmed with happiness. When I go to Heaven—no, I shall stop talking like that...for what is important to me right now is this time I share with you.
I thank you from the bottom of my heart, Your Grace.
I shall work hard so I can live up to your expectations.
I have to use this power to do even more good deeds...!
O-Oh goodness... Am I even capable of mastering such immense power...?!
To think someone like me could become this strong... Oh, Your Grace... What a wonderful person you are!
Please make your escape, everyone! I shall be with you shortly!
Ah, my lord. How do you do?
...Oh? Is that you, my lord? I have not heard from you in quite some time. Have you been well?
Mmm...ahh...! The sunlight just fills my heart with the desire to sing.

Hm-hm-hm-hm-hmm~♪ Hmm... Lalala-lala~♪ Hmmm... Whichever shall I choose? Which one do you fancy more, my lord? Ah, and please—I would be most greatful if you could refrain from saying, “Both of them.”
“Primavera”—it is a name of honor, and only The Luminary of Song is permitted to adopt it as her own. I inherited this name from Mother...though I am uncertain if I am as radiant as she ever was...
Hm? I hear a melody of fatigue emanating from you, my lord. Why not take a moment to rest? I shall prepare some tea at once.

There is a love song that I am to perform solely for the person dearest to my heart...but no one has ever inspired me to sing it...until now. So, would you do me the honor of listening? This love song is all of my feelings blossomed into a shimmering, red rose, and I offer it...only to you.
Happy birthday. I hope your day is nothing short of wonderful. La-lalalala-la~♪
I received these powers at the cost of my eyesight. Everyone may say what happened to me was ill-fated but...I consider myself blessed. I mean...it is better than losing my voice, is it not?

Mother was such a dazzling songstress. Poison took her voice away...and that caused her to become a witch. Yet, she stood on stage till her last breath. Even as she was facing execution...she never once lost her radiance...

Ah, my lord. I am about to hold a small concert in the square... So would you do me the honor of being my escort? As thanks, I shall have a special seat arranged for you. Now if you would, please take my hand and lead the way.

Oh, rain. Perhaps we can expect showers this evening? Oh? You ask if I can sense these things despite not being able to see? Why, yes. I trained my other senses to make up for my blindness. Even now, listen...chicks have hatched in the garden. Would you like to go see them together?

Until her final moment, Mother reigned over the stage as its most radiant songstress... But when she was executed for being a witch, I looked away in disgrace...even wishing to not see anything anymore... This blindness must be retribution for that...

On the day that light returns to my world, I shall go and visit you immedietly. I want to take in every sight you have ever laid eyes on for myself... And then, I want to take a closer look...at you...
I have new music to perform! Now, without further adieu... La~♪
La-lalala-la~♪ I must sing more magnificently! More beautifully!
La-lalalala~♪ I shall now perform a new song...inspired by this melody you have gifted me with. It is a song about peace—the peace you wish upon the world.
I will not allow your show to be turned into the likes of a tragedy. I shall use this power to turn despair into hope...as the songstress of miracles!
My lord, would you like to join me in song? When you and I—when our hearts become one and sing in unison, I feel...something new will be born. So please, allow me the honor of taking the lead.

This withered land needs flowers, and damaged hearts need music... These troubling times are what make me want to sing songs of prayer... Songs that instill hope into the bright future you lead us towards... I pray my songs will reach everyone... La-lalala-la~♪
Hehe. I am glad you enjoyed the show. I hope to see you again soon.
I sense darkness encroaching upon us... Something awful has happened, hasn’t it?
Hey there, Senpai... Don’t worry, I still remember you.
You must be my Senpai, right...? Phew, you’re just as my book says. I was excited to meet you.
Good luck with your day. I’ll be over here, so if you need anything just let me know.
Me? I’m reading my book. My experiences from a week ago are written in here. Though...I’ve probably already told you that, huh?
Haha...I seem to be having a lot of fun on this page. It’s such a shame I don’t remember any of it...when it happened just a while ago. Look, you’re in it too.
You sure are a hardworker. It’s not like you’re going to lose your memory, so there’s no need to rush. Why don’t you take a break once in a while, like these butterflies over here.
...It must be boring to be with someone like me. I’m gonna forget everything we talk about by next week, you know...so don’t you think it’s pointless?
Happy birthday, Senpai. Hehe, it was written in my book. The previous “me” must’ve thought it was an important date. The current “me” thinks so too, of course.

Why I call you my “Senpai?” Uhh, give me a second... Oh, here! It says, “Refer to people who are older than you as ‘Senpai’ so you won’t mistake their names.” Pretty smart of the previous “me,” don’t you think?
Haha...did I really write this? It sounds like I’m having a lot of...fun...
To tell you the truth, I don’t want anymore new memories... I enjoy reading through my past, but...the happy memories are just too painful for me...
Hmm, you want to know what I’m writing? Hehe, it’s a secret... Just kidding, I’ll tell you... I’m writing about you.

Don’t get any closer to me. I...I don’t want to be a burden to you. Please... No matter how nicely you treat me, I’m eventually going to forget it... No matter how much I like you...I’ll...I’ll forget this feeling...

Senpai, your scent makes me feel nostalgic... It’s the first time I’ve smelled it, but it’s really soothing for some reason. Hmm... Do you think this means that there may actually be things I can remember...?
I better write down that I got stronger. Uhh, what’s the date today?
Fine, I’ll write it down. “Yet again, my silly senpai makes me stronger.”
Are you really okay with this? I’m going to forget all this gratitude I have for you, you know! Silly Senpai...
I’m probably going to feel jealous when I read this over... Hehe, thank you.
W-Wow... You’ve already made me this strong... Thank you... I’m really...happy...
Hey Senpai, if I forget you again, will you... Ah, forget it. Because even if I forget you, I’m sure I’ll fall for you again and again, right?
Great job, everyone. Guess I should write about this before I forget.
I’m gonna have to write a detailed entry about this defeat...
You’re not worth being in my book.
My lord...! I thought I wasn’t going to ever see you again...
Hah, it’s such a lovely day today, isn’t it, my lord? The flowers seem happy as well.
I’ｍ pruning these plants so the flowers can grow big and strong. If a branch withers, I have to cut if off but... Ohh, it must hurt, huh? I’m sorry...
Mom and Dad taught me how to grow flowers. I wish they could’ve taught me so much more though...
U-Umm...! I’ve actually started growing herbs...and studying how to make herbal teas... Since my lord has seemed tired lately...I-I thought...maybe I could...
There are flowers I’ve never seen before in foreign countries...? That sounds so nice... When the world is safe again, will you go and see them with me?
My lord, today’s your birthday, right? I’ve prepared a bunch of flowers for you... Will you accept them?
The cursed flowers looked just like the ones I used to grow with Dad... I loved those flowers, but now they scare me...
My lord... Umm...this flower... I thought you might like it... You...probably don’t want it...right? O-Oh...! Th-Thank you...
These days when I look at my flowers, all I can ever think of is whether or not you’ll like them. Hehe.
This flower’s the one that lady asked for, this one’s for that girl, and this one’s to decorate your room... There’s so many flowers, hehe... It makes me so happy.
I like growing flowers, but right now...there’s also someone I like just as much... Huh...?  You...like me...too...? Wh-What?! R-Really?!
You know that flower I used to love...? I’m thinking of growing it again... I’m still scared but...if you’re here with me, I think I can do it... So...could you...help me?
All of this for me...? Thank you.
I’ll do my best to bloom the prettiest flowers.
I still don’t like fighting... But if it’s for you, I’ll do my best.
Look at this beautiful flower! The variety of flowers I can grow is getting bigger!
If I had this power back then, maybe I could’ve saved... Ah, no, it’s nothing...
You’ve been so nice to me... I’ll never forget your kindness.
Give me back my mom and dad!
O Lord... Please guide us along the path of righteousness... Oh, Your Grace. Would you like to join me in today’s prayer?
Oh, Your Grace... I have not seen you in quite some time. Have you been well?
O Lord... Please bless every soul who stands in the face of adversity with courage and wisdom.
Oh, Your Grace... Hm? Florence is searching for me? Oh dear, I must go at once! Thank you very much for telling me!
Water, light, food—everything in this world is a gift from God... Now, let us join hands in prayer as we give thanks to the Lord.
There is no need to hurry through this trial. Take it slow and move at your own pace, Your Grace.
I am sure the future you guide us towards will be teeming with kindness, Your Grace. Please continue to light our way... I pray the path you tread will be full of blessings...
Happy birthday, Your Grace. Florence and I have prepared a cake just for you! So please, come and join us!
Miss Loki dresses like a nun, but is she a member of the Church? I have never met her before...but I would love for a chance to speak with her.

A disease threatened Florence’s life, but overcoming that trial made us the closest of friends. And now this last trial has made our bond grow stronger than ever. It also has led me to you... The Lord guides everything...showering us with His gifts... Thanks be to God.

Hah... I was doing laundry in the garden when it suddenly started to rain... But with Monica’s help, everything was put away safely. That said, I am sure rain is a blessing—another gift from God. O Lord, thank you for nourishing our lives with Your rain.
Your Grace, would you happen to know of Arianrhod? Recently, she is all Florence has been talking about, so I was wondering what kind of person she is... Ahh, so that is who she is... Hmm~
I have always lived devoting everything to God. That will never change, but...I now have one more person I would like to devote my life to. Hehe, do you know who that is?
I am a servant of God, so I cannot marry... But at the very least, please allow me to stay by your side and watch over you. Even after this is all over... Always, and forever...
This is thanks to the guidance of the Lord. Now, let us go in His name.
God does not subject us to trials that we cannot overcome... This is all a part of His plan.
The Lord is my shepherd... He has tasked me with lending you my power, so I must heed His words.
You need my help, and that alone fills me with power. Please allow me to continue praying at your side.
Even if the time comes for my spirit to return to God, my heart will always be with you... I will cherish you forever, Your Grace.

O Lord...please shine your light and guide our way... Fear not, Your Grace, for I am sure the future you are building will be filled with love and kindness... I will always be with you, so that we may live together in your gentle world.
O Lord, we are eternally grateful...
Fear not. Have faith in our victory...
Let us go and save this world...
Hiya Master! You’re not gonna pet my head today?
Ah, Master! I’ve been waiting here just like you asked me to! Are you proud of me? Are you, are you?
Mmm...ahh...! It’s another great day today, huh Master?
Master...! Shhh! Big Sis and I are playing hide-and-seek right now. Do you wanna hide together?

I hurt Big Sis—I made her experience all those scary things... Everything’s all my fault, but Big Sis is still so nice to me. Hey Master...is there anything I can do for Big Sis that’ll make her happy...?
You okay, Master? You look like you’re suuuper tired... Well, if there’s anything I can do to help, tell me, okay?
Hey Master, do you like giving out headpats? ’Cause I reeaallly love it when you give me headpats. It makes me feel sooo safe... So you’re more than welcome to give me some more, y’know! Hehe!
Happy birthday, Master! Big Sis and I made some jam for you! Come on Master, this way! You’ve gotta try some! You’ve gotta!
Master’s town has so many new and exciting things in it! The list of things I wanna do never ends!
Master! Do you need me for something? Do you, do you? Huh? Shopping? Count me in!

Hey Master, hey Master! Just now, I found something reeaalllly cool! Wanna see? Look! It’s a giant bug! Here, I’ll give it to you as a pres—huh? You don’t want it?! Why not~? It’s so cute... Mmm... Master’s so weird, isn’t he, Bugsalot?
Uuu... I was trying to study, but I can barely keep my eyes open. Hey Master, can I take a nap? It’ll just be for a few minutes, I promise! Huh? Why can’t I~? Master, you’re a big meanie...
Master! Look, look! Iris gave me a bath! Now I’m all squeaky clean! Huh? Hurry up and put some clothes on? But I’m still wet, the clothes’ll—Wah! Master! You’re so pushy~

Hey, Master...? Umm...can we sleep together tonight? I had a bad dream. In it, I did something horrible to Big Sis... If you’re here though...then I won’t be scared...so...please? Ehehe, yay! Then...could you...hold my hand until I fall asleep...? Your hand is so...warm... Ahh, I love holding hands with...you...
Master, look, look! I’ve gotten stronger!
This is just the beginning! I’m Fenrir’s little sister, after all!
I’m gonna try suuuuper-duper hard for you, Master!
Thanks to you Master, no matter how much I race the others in the garden, I never get tired! Alright! Time to go blast through my record again!
I...used to be really scared of my power... But not anymore, ’cause I’ve got you and Big Sis here with me now!
With this power, I’m gonna protect Big Sis for sure this time. So...could you watch over me, Master...? I want you to see that I really can do this.
Don’t leave me here all alone...!
You’re here again? That’s fine...I guess.
Hmm~ I’m right here, and yet you’re still working, huh? No, it’s fine. Whatever.
Since my frail body kept me holed up in my room, I got pretty hooked on romance novels. ’Cause in the world of stories...I got to experience as many happy romances as I wanted...
What’s so fun about looking at me? I can easily name 10 other people that are cuter than me. I-It’s not like...I hate it or anything, though... Hmph, just do whatever the heck you want...

Aren’t you working too much? Shouldn’t you think about taking a—Huh? You’re going to take a nap? Fine, good night... Jeez... Sure, just totally ignore me. I see how it is... ...You’re always such a hard worker, so...get lots of rest, okay?
If you hadn’t come for me, I’d still be at the bottom of the lake. That’s why...I’m thankful to you... Really thankful... Th-That’s all though, okay?!
Happy birthday. Since it’s your special day, I guess I’ll be nice and celebrate with you. By the way, you do know when my birthday is, right?
I don’t get what you see in me. I have a bad mouth, I’m not cute... Even I know I’m a pain in the butt... Hah... You really do have strange tastes.
I never had any friends to talk about love, so I’ve been having a lot of fun recently. But...you know, you sure could win an award with how many rivals you have...

Everyone always says to just move on and find a new love. But if moving on is that easy, then you weren’t really in love in the first place. The love I had...may not have been as pretty as others’...but the fact that I loved him...was real...

All witches are bound to die in dark, dreadful ways. Falling in love with someone just means you’re asking for more pain. Maybe...falling in love with someone despite knowing that...is some sort of curse then.

Hey, can I borrow the kitchen? I was reading a few books on cooking, and...I wasn’t ever able to make anything for my big brother, so... Don’t get your hopes up though. It’s my first time, so it’s bound to taste like crap... What’s with that stupid grin on your face? You’re really weird, y’know...

My big brother isn’t here anymore...but I won’t forget about him. Instead, I’ll find a new love. “Do you have someone in mind already...?” Who knows. If you want to find out, why not take a guess? It might be someone closer than you think, hehe.
I’m sure you just want to use me for my power. Fine by me—I’m used to it.
Are you like this with everyone...? Oh...I...see... H-Hmmm~
So, a witch’s power comes from the heart, huh? Then explain this, Mr. Hotshot—why do I feel power well up inside me whenever I think about you?
You sure do have a few screws loose... But...thank you. I’m really happy.
That was kind of a letdown.
I guess it can’t be helped.
Oh...my lord. Is this room...too cold for you...?
Ahh...I’m so glad you came... I thought you...might’ve gotten fed up because of me...
I need to make sure I don’t cause trouble for anyone today... Umm... I’m sorry...
The bread that Sol bakes is always so delicious. It’s been a while since I’ve had some, but she promised to make me some soon! Hehe, I’m so excited.
I’m sorry... Huh? I haven’t done anything wrong, so I don’t need to apologize? I-I’m sorr—ahh... Oh...
Umm... Are you being sure to take breaks from time to time? You seem like you’re just as much of a hard worker as Sol is...so I... I’m sorry... I should mind my own business...huh...
My lord, you and Sol are always so nice to me... I wanted to repay you two somehow...so I started learning how to cook, but everything always turns to ice... Why am I so useless at everything...?
My lord, umm...I heard it was your birthday today, so I...got you a present... Huh? Your birthday was...yesterday...? N-No way... I had it all ready to go and everything...
I feel most at ease when I’m in my room. There...I can’t cause trouble for anyone...
I heard that a witch’s magic come from their heart. If so, then my ice must be for locking myself away. In there...I can’t feel anything—no pain, no despair, not even the hatred I have for myself...

Hi, Sol. I came to help you with the cleaning... Huh? You don’t need any help? Th-Then at least let me dust this vase... Ahh...it fell over... A-Ahhh...all the water’s frozen on the floor... Ahh...I’m so sorry... I just...really wanted to do something with you...

That dream still haunts me sometimes... Endless...unbearable pain...that won’t disappear even after I’ve woken up... I’m sorry... Please...let me stay here next to you for a moment... A moment is all I need... I’m sorry...

Is...it really okay for me to stay here...? Everyone else has something they’re good at, while I have nothing... Someone like me has no right to stand beside you... Oh... You...really are kind, my lord...

It’s all thanks to you that Sol and I can be together again, my lord. No words can even begin to describe how thankful I am to you. If there is ever anything I can do for you, please let me know. I screw up a lot...but if it’s for you...I’ll try my best.
Oh goodness... You really don’t need to do this for someone like me... I’m sorry...
I’m sorry you went through all this trouble for me, but...I really think you should give everything to Sol... I don’t deserve it...
Are you sure you’re not making a mistake...? These are all for me...? I see...
I’m so happy... Thank you, my lord...
This is the first time anyone has ever expected anything out of me...so I’m not sure what I should do...
I still don’t have confidence in myself...but I’m going to try my best... For Sol...and for you.
I’m sorry...but we need to keep moving forward.
I’m sorry... It’s all my fault...
If you think there’s still something I can do...I’ll lend you my power.
You’re better off dead... Hm? Oh, it’s just you. It’s nothing... I was just talking to myself. Those words weren’t meant for you... Sorry.

Oh, it’s you. Perfect timing... You know that missing child everyone wouldn’t shut up about this morning...? Did you try the shed in the courtyard? Children love cramped places after all... My children did, too...
Give me that. I’ll take care of the rest... Your pack of misfits here won’t shut up if you push yourself too hard.
I’m grateful to Belle. That child overcame all odds to save me, so now I can be by her side. I’m...also grateful to you.
...I heard today is the day you were born... Happy birthday...
My hatred has yet to disappear. I can’t forgive what those monsters did... I will never...forgive them...
Seems Belle has an awful lot of trust in you... You take care of her, you hear?
Hah... Ah, it’s you. That girl Nina keeps wanting to go out, even though she’ll just end up lost. Someone has to watch her... If you’re also a parent, you need to do your job properly.

This burnt scrap of paper? This is...uhh... Ahh, yes. It’s a portrait that my children gave me a long time ago... It’s the only thing I have to remember them by... And here I thought you’d laugh at me for holding on to such a keepsake.

Why did I build the orphanage? Isn’t it obvious...? To protect the futures of the children who would die if left alone... Huh? We’re one in the same? The hell we aren’t... There’s no way you could be the same as...someone like me...

There was a time I believed this world to be full of love—that everyone had the capacity to be loving and kind... I can’t bring myself to naively trust people like that ever again. But, there’s something different...about you.
I’ll use this power to make those monsters pay...!
These flames demand power... I need more... More!
Flames of hatred and rage—that is my power... I must now make them burn hotter...till all is consumed...
I will burn everything down...then the world will atone for the agony my children had to suffer. But first...I have to do something about the enemies who stand before me.
Tragedy will be repeated. Hate gives birth to more hate, shackling everyone in misery. One must overcome hatred somehow... I know that...but I just can’t stop.
If it looks like you’re about to walk the same path as I have, I’ll stop you in your tracks. So the best you can do is push forward. It’d be a pain if I had to burn you, after all.
I failed to protect everyone again...
I see you like playing with fire!
You’re a pain in the neck!
Flames of vengeance... Burn them all!!
As a puppet, I do not possess any emotions. But, I want to know... This feeling inside my chest... I want to know what it is.

When the professor collapsed, there was such a painful pressure in my chest. My mind became empty, and I...could no longer stand... Is...this what people call “sadness...?” If so...I never want to feel that emotion again...
If you overexert yourself, then I, too, will be troubled. Please take frequent breaks. Homunculi can be fixed, but humans cannot.
When I’m with Professor Mertillier, for some reason my heartbeat gets faster. When I’m with you, a similar thing happens. Why is that?
I heard today was the day you were created. It is a day that should be celebrated. Happy birthday.
How can the sky be both blue and transparent at the same time? It’s very strange.
The professor always calls me “cute,” but I still do not understand what “cute” means. Do you think I am “cute?”

Just as iron rusts and decays, my heart rusts as well. The rust latches onto it, cracks it, slowly destroys it... My entire body shatters into tiny pieces... When I regained consciousness, the laboratory was completely destroyed. Rust—that is my Curse. A Curse perfect...for a puppet like me.

I love you. Let’s get married. I want to be with you forever. ...These? They are words the professor taught me. I do not understand their meaning, but apparently saying these to people will help me understand the feeling behind them. I’ve got to go find people.
Everyday, I see, hear, and learn so many new things. I’m very aware of how much coming here has changed me. This...feeling inside me... This must be what people call “happiness.”
My powers have been further enhanced.
I promise to use this new power effectively.
If possible...I want to use this power...to be of use to people.
We have won. Should...I be happy?
Just as the professor has taught me.
Ah, you have arrived, Your Grace. Now please, follow me.
Your Grace... Where have you been all this time? No one has seen you in ages, so I was worried that something terrible had happened.
I look forward to the work we can accomplish today, Your Grace. Should you have plans to patrol the area, please leave your protection to me.
You say...I am too serious? Admittedly...Queen Amleth also says that of me. I don’t believe there is anything unusual about my behavior, though...
The true purpose of this sword is not to protect one’s master. However, that is exactly what I desire to do with it... I am certain that Queen Amleth will grant this wish of mine.

I apologize if I am being too forward, Your Grace, but I think it would be best if you take a moment to rest. The way I see it, you are working yourself far too hard... It is as if I am looking at Queen Amleth right now.
The way you rule your country seems...different from Queen Amleth’s, yet you are both strikingly similar where it matters... It is quite strange, indeed.
Happy birthday. I shall stand guard over you today, and am prepared to repel every single insect that dares cross your path. So please, enjoy the day to your heart’s content.
Sonya... I heard...she lost her family because of my crystals... Yes...because of me...
Are you tending to the affairs of the kingdom, Your Majesty? If I may, please allow me to assist... What? Cleaning?! S-Such a task is beneath you! Please leave all chores to me!

I did something so horrendous, yet I am still alive... Even if I were to devote the rest of my life to atoning for my sins... Hah... Will there ever come a day when...I can truly redeem myself for what I have done...?
I have served at Queen Amleth’s side since we were children. She is everything to me. If Her Majesty still deems me worthy...when all this is over, I wish to serve her once more.

...Your Grace, how much do you know of Queen Amleth? Whenever you have a moment to spare, I would be more than happy to share her life story with you... Yes, when she was just an infant, her first word was “Opeeya”—my name. And then when she was five...

...I know that I will live on regretting every atrocity I have ever committed. Nevertheless, for Queen Amleth’s sake, I must keep moving forward... Coming here has allowed me to realize that... I am forever in your debt, Your Grace.
It appears that I have become stronger.
Training is of the utmost importance...especially for someone as weak as me...
All patronage shall be repaid through work and effort. Such is the ambition of the royal guards.
Is this magical power...too great for me to control...? No, I will never allow something like that to happen again...even if it costs me my life...!
...This may be the first time I can truly believe in this power of mine. I am indebted to you, Your Grace.
As strange as it sounds, I feel that my heart is finally at peace with itself. Perhaps this truly means...I have gotten stronger.
We claim victory in your name, Your Grace!
Ugh... Leave the enemy to me, everyone. I shall provide cover as you escape!
Let’s see if you can survive this!
Stand down, everyone! This one is mine!
You’re here. Now then, your orders. I’m ready for what needs to be done.
You’re late... If you intend on deserting us, I’ll have you relinquish your authority to me.
I hear no cannons or pistols, smell no gunpowder, see no muddy water... Never thought I’d wake up to a morning where this all felt normal.

This pistol’s the Model 1805 Magic Blitzer—a modest weapon that any witch can handle. The grip, slide, trigger—everything’s customized specially for my hands. I used this pistol to... No, forget I said anything.

Maintaining my pistol’s just as important as maintaining my glasses. I can’t aim when I can’t see... It’s god-awful being nearsighted. When I lived in the Internment Zone, anti-riot gas did quite a number on my eyes.

Hey, you’re overdoing it. A soldier’s duty is to rest whenever they can. Plus, no self-respecting commander should ever look weary in front of their subordinates. Understood? Now, stop what you’re doing, and go for a walk.

It bothers me that you’re lacking in the muscle department, but I can accept trusting you as my superior. The most important quality for a commander to have is, “The strength to never say die.” Mm—there’s no mistake about it. You have it, alright.
Today’s your birthday, right? Happy birthday. It’s good you’re not getting older while fighting in the trenches. I just hope everything stays that way.

Supply trains are important. You do know what an army marches on, right? Well...it doesn’t look like my meals will consist only of canned food while I’m here. Look, someone’s at it baking bread again... Hm... Smells delicious.

Galia was once divided in two—the North and the South. They were forced into unification, but all that did was trigger a civil war. This is the third time that’s happened... If a fourth were to break out, I just hope it doesn’t happen until well into the future.

Natasha’s been helping me tend the garden recently...but this is actually my first time touching soil to grow life. Until now, I’ve mostly held a shovel when I needed to dig trenches or graves... Those were darker times. Yes—this is all very refreshing for me.

I thought you and your allies would be the ones to bring about my end. But...it wasn’t blades or pistols that you held out towards me—it was your hands... That was why I decided to entrust my life to you.

The Witch Corps was a colorful lot. Everything about them was different—their personalities, birthplaces, abilities... Our only common ground was that we came together seeking a place to belong to. If they had met you earlier...they’d definitely be here now, laughing and smiling.

As long as you’re still alive...I’m sure witches will be able to truly live their lives with happiness one day. If I can...I want to see the moment that happens with my own two eyes. It’ll make one hell of a story to tell them, right?
This shadow looming over me has started to fade... From the looks of it, I can still fight.
Hmm... This power to fight... Guess the only way to know how to make use of it is to go and try it out myself.
...If you’re putting this much trust in me, then I guess I have no choice but to respond.
It’s been a long time since I’ve felt this refreshed... Forgive me, everyone. But...is it okay if I relish this feeling for just a little longer?

I’m sure...I’m stronger than how I was “back then.” But—no. That’s why, I will not let anyone else die under my watch. Next time, the only ones this pistol will shoot down...will be the enemies before us.
The greatest danger lies in the moment of victory. Do not let your guard down.
Hurry, retreat! I’ll hold them back as long as I can!
Welcome back. My students were searching everywhere for you.
...You’re late. Take your seat at once.
Now then, shall we begin class?
I just finished grading tests from the other day. As many mistakes as there were, I could feel my students’ motivation to try and answer each question. This is a very good trend.

I was an underachiever who was inept at studying and athletics... My parents hired many home tutors, but they all would just give up and leave...except for one. That tutor never gave up on me. I can only hope to be the same way...

You should avoid wearing yourself out. Why don’t you take a short break? There’s no shame in asking others for help, after all... Hm? Where do you think you’re going? You need to listen when I’m talking to you.

As similar as getting angry and scolding are, they’re different. Anger is an emotion, but scolding is a form of affection... So if you try doing anything reckless, I’ll scold you... Now settle down and pay attention. This will be on the test...

Happy birthday. I heard you’ll have a party tonight, but there are many people here who aren’t from Fran. Etiquette varies from country to country... That said, let’s hurry and begin our lesson. There’s so much we need to cover about the other nine countries... Hm? Now where are you going?

My reason for being a home tutor? Perhaps...it’s because I want to do everything I can to watch over each student. I understand what it’s like to feel alone and inferior... That’s why I decided to be a home tutor who students can confide in no matter what.

Have you seen Miss Illya, my lord? No, I don’t have any business with her...but earlier, she asked me, “Does it look like I’ve gained weight?” And when I said, “It does, indeed,” she ran away without so much as saying a word... Was something bothering her?
Ah, my lord. I was just taking a short break. Miss Skuld gave me an elixir the other day that treats exhaustion... Hm? How does it taste...? Bitter, I suppose. Is something wrong with that?

I did not live in that town, so if I wanted to run away, I could have. But as an educator, I couldn’t just let everything be. After all, I refuse to teach my students that hurting and looking down on others are what honest adults do.

You want to see me smile, you say? I’m sorry—expressing emotions is not my forte...especially smiling... Long ago, a student made a similar request, and I tried to do it. But judging from that outcome, I know you’ll end up crying... Are you sure you want to see?

I’ve been conducting facial expression exercises, my lord. Today, allow me to show you what I’ve accomplished... See, maximum smileage... Hah... It seems that was the incorrect way to smile, but... So that’s how you do it, right? I feel like I’ve gained something special... Huh? This is the correct way to smile?
Patience and diligence can move mountains... Don’t you agree?
Success requires suffering... As an educator, I’m more than capable of handling that...

Perhaps you have what it takes to be an educator. With your ability to captivate others and guide them towards the correct path... No, forget what I said. That’s my duty, after all. Please fulfill the duty that only you can fulfill.

Just how long will it be until I’m able to understand the language of cats? At this rate, my student will end up feeling doubtful about me. I can hear her now...“Meow? You can’t understand cats, Miss Sophia?” Ugh... I must hurry and learn...
What was I able to do against my unseen enemies? I must’ve been able to do something, but I had no idea what that something was... What would you have done, my lord? What should I have done...?

I hate rumors...but even I was at the mercy of such rumors. In the end, they’re all but empty ideas. It’s impossible to teach what one has never seen before. Now that I’ve met you, I feel I finally understand what I should really teach. Hehe... Am I happy because I’ve learned something?
Everyone, take what you’ve learned today and prepare for next time.
Forget searching—I just wanna sleep the day away... Wh-Whaaa?! Did you just hear that...? Ahaha...

Ahh... Nothing beats chilling out... Now, I can forget about everything—especially this sword...and just relax the day away... Mmm...ahhh... If only time would just stand still... Huh?! My lord?! How long’ve ya been there?!
Nrrgh... Not yet... Any chance I can relax for just five more minutes? None? Okay...

There’re sooo many snacks here in Fran! My rural island doesn’t really have fancy snacks like these, so it feels like I’m in a whole new world! Hehe. I don’t even know what this crispy apple thingie’s called, but boy is it delish!!
Even while I’m searching day in and day out, my life’s slowly coming to an end... That’s why I gotta hurry and find this sword a master... Nrrgh... Why me, though...?

Even you wanna take a break once in a while, don’t ’cha, my lord? Once I find this sword a master, I wanna take it easy too. I’m so gonna kick back, relax, and fully enjoy some quality me time... Hehehehe...

I’m sure this sword’d suit ’cha perfectly, my lord. Much more than someone like me, at least. Huh? You already got your staff? Oh! Well, just hear me out now—you, the staff in one hand, the sword in the other. What ’cha say?
Happy birthday! Of course I got ’cha a present. Here’s your brand new swor—oh. You can’t hold onto it...? Shoulda known... Can ya try again next year...? I-It won’t hurt ’cha to try...

Ahh...what I’d give for a nice dip in a hot spring... My island’s west of the continent, and it’s got this huge hot spring... Or rather, that’s really all my island’s got going for it—just a hot spring and a legend of a cursed sword. Seriously.

I feel I’ve asked everyone under the sun holding a weapon to take this sword away, but I’ve had no luck. The Queen? Nope. Our knight friends? Nada. Y’know, I even asked a witch with a lotta shiny swords just now, but yup—another dead end. Oh, she prayed that I’d find the sword a master though... Hehe...that brightened my day...
Anyone this sword chooses to be its master can hold it like me. But if the sword doesn’t choose ’em, it’ll slip right through their fingers. So weird, isn’t it...?

I dunno why, but the knights here’ve been telling me to hold the sword correctly... Can ya blame me, though?! I’ve never even learned how to hold one in the first place! ...Still, I feel the sword’s telling me that I’m doing a good job! No, really!

I’m sure there’s someone out there worthier of this sword than me... I don’t know—I just feel like some good-for-nothing who has no business swinging it around... Still, why me...? Well, if ya say I was chosen by the sword...I’d feel a bit better. Just an itty-bitty, teensy-weensy bit better, though.

...I don’t ask for much, so I wonder if there’s a strong, kind, rich gentleman out there who’ll never get mad at me for slacking off, take care of all the chores while helping me track down a master for this sword, and find it in his humooooongous heart of gold to take me in... My lord...could it be...?
Did I just get stronger? Oh, I guess the sword does feels sharper.
Dangit, I’ve gotten stronger again... I’m losing more and more of my precious me time...
Now that I’ve gotten stronger today, it’s off to bed I go. ...But, going to bed’s not gonna calm me down... There’s something telling me I’d better go and continue my search...
Huh? I-I’m not a Viking. Oh, this armor? When I picked the sword up, this armor just kinda put itself on me... I think it’s probably some kind of curse too...
For some reason, I feel absolutely pumped...! Alright—gonna work my butt off some more today!! ...Oh, actually never mind. For a second there, I really thought I wanted to do some work...

Nrgh... I just wanna leave this sword with someone and get some shut-eye...!! Ahh, but not just anyone will do, right? It’s gotta be someone worthier of this sword than me. Hah... As much of a hassle as it is, today I’m gonna continue my search!
We won...?! Phew... I can relax for now...
If Vee becomes a fish, would she be able to swim in the rain too?
...Umm... Ah, it’s you, Mister! Long time no see~! Vee hasn’t seen you in a while, so she almost forgot about you.
The water’s going pitter-patter with laughter. It says, “Today’s gonna be sunny.”
You’re asking what Vee’s doing? Right now, she’s wanting to become a snail. She’s wanting to liiiie down and go sloooow.
There are lotsa witch girls here who are just like Vee, huh? They won’t call her weird, right? Hopefully Vee can make lotsa friends...
You’re tired, Mister. Vee can tell. Your water’s going gurgle-gurgle. Come here... You’re always working so hard. Vee’s proud of you. Good boy. Now, 1-2-3-4, throw tiredness out the door~!
No one can see the red fishies swimming around Vee. They’re so cute and pretty though... Hey Mister, can you see them...? Wah...! Hehehe~ Vee knew she’d like you, Mister.
Today’s your birthday, Mister? Happy birthday! ...You’re asking Vee how she knows? Well, all the waters are celebrating. They sure love you, don’t they, Mister? Vee does too. Hehe.
Everyone in the village called Vee a weird kid, but she had one friend—Lou. She was Vee’s one and only best friend.
Mimi said that a cat’s favorite food is fish. She had a huge smile when she said fish are yummiest when roasted on an open fire and eaten, bones and all... Is Mimi gonna eat Vee too...?

Huh? You brought some water for us to drink together? So, you mean... N-No, it’s n-nothing, just... Rrngh, everyone’s watching, y’know... Just what are you thinking, Mister Dumb-Dumb...? Vee hates you.
There was someone cooking in the kitchen, so Vee helped them out. It brought back some good memories, so when Vee told them they were like a grandma...they got really mad. Vee was so scared...
Vee loves baths. She gets a little, aaahhhh, and then really, hhhoooo. Heh, just thinking about baths makes Vee wanna warm up... Is it bath time yet?
Today a friend’s gonna come and hang out. Vee promised to show them around to many places in town... Vee looks weird, doesn’t she? Really? Oh—it’s about time to go. Alright, see you later!
Vee feels a little bubbly-bubbly. If she keeps this up, will she be able to swim in the sky too?
The fishies are happy too. They said, “Thank you.”
Mister, your power makes Vee feel like she’s floating in water. She feels so safe.
Are you happy now that Vee’s stronger? If you’re happy, Mister, then Vee’s happy too.
Hey, um... Vee’s chest has been feeling warm and fuzzy for some time now. With one look at you, Vee’s water feels kind of... Rrnngh... Why is Vee getting so hot...?
Easy-breezy, right? The fishies are happy too.
W-Welcome back, Master. I’m so, so glad... You didn’t abandon me, after all.
I’m going to follow you forever and ever and ever, Master. I am!
Just stay put, Master. I’m not gonna let you out of my sight. I won’t! I’m gonna stay here and keep watch, because...b-b-because if I let you go off too far from me...you might not come back...

My former master told me to stay and wait for him, and I did. I did wait. I waited for so long. ...But he never came back, and... Master, if you’re gonna leave me behind you have to tell me, okay? If you don’t...I’ll...I’ll wait for you forever...
You look very extra tired, Master! That’s what your face is saying, it is! You should hit the pack for a little bit...! I’ll watch over you the whole time, so you don’t need to worry about a thing.

For a long, long time, I didn’t know there was anything in the world that wasn’t scary or painful, I didn’t... But then I met you, Master, and I learned so many new things. Compassion, joy... I’m really, really happy that I met such a very extra kind person like you, Master.

Happy birthday, Master! Today is a very much special day, it is! I know everyone will want to spend time with you today, so don’t worry about m—huh? I can come along, too? Yes! I’d love to! I really, really would!
Snff... I’m...I’m fine. I’m not crying. I’m not... It’s just... I...I woke up and you weren’t here, Master...hck... C-Could you please make sure to wake me up, next time, Master? Snff...

Master...I know you said I can’t come with you, I know I can’t, but can I please, please just wait outside the door for you? No? ...B-But why would it be embarrassing? T-The rest room? Aww, but I always watch over you when you rest! I promise, I’ll make sure no one interrupts your nap!

My former master never taught me anything. He didn’t. He’d always just say, “You don’t need to think...” and “Get back to work...” That’s why it took me a really, really long time to learn to speak. ...I’ve worked very extra hard to teach myself, and I can do it now, but...you’d tell me if I was talking weird, right?

Snff...hck... I’m fine, Master. ...Really, I am. I’m ready, s-so let’s just get it over with! ...Huh? Y-You’re going to put me in that pot and cook me, right? Why else have all that hot wat—huh? So...you call this...a baaatttthhh?

Master! It’s bathtime! It is! It’s time for very extra toasty, comfy, bubbly water! We’ve gotta splash in the bubbles together, Master! I even brought this really, really nice hat that Belle made me to keep the bubbles out of my eyes! Come on, let’s go, Master! Let’s go!

Are you going out, Master? Have fun outside, okay...? Yep, I’ll be waiting for you right here. It’s alright, I know you’ll definitely for sure come back. I know you’d never, ever, ever leave me behind...so I’m okay on my own now. I am. But...try to not to stay out too too long, okay...?
M-Me? Do you mean me? Thank you...
I’m going to try even harder from now on! I bow-wow will!
Wh-Wha—!! I’m...I’m...more bowawawah?!  Master, what should I—! ...I-I’ve gotta calm down. Right, calm down. Okay, this calls for my Bow-Wow-Wow Special! Hehe! Oh, this is very extra good, it is!

I still get scared of people sometimes... I can’t help watching their hands, even though I know that no one here is gonna hit me. ...Hm? It’s kinda strange, but... I’m never scared of your hands, Master. Never ever ever. You really are very extra strange, Master.

There’s so many things I never knew before I joined you, Master. Beds, and baths, and snacks and things...so many new things. And everyone...they all took the time to show me everything. I really love all my new friends, I do. ...And Master, I love you, too. You’re my very most favorite person ever.

Master? Could... Could you pet me lots and lots and very extra much? Hehe...that’s right. I’m not even a little bit afraid, anymore. Not of you, Master. Your hands are always gentle... I’m so, so happy I was taken in by someone as kind as you, Master. I am.
We... We won? Really?! We did?!
Snff...hck... A-Am I going to be abandoned, again?
Ahh... Ahh, m-my lord...! Hehehe... I-I was w-waiting for you...
...! M-My lord! Aaah... You’re back... I-I-I was w-worried I wouldn’t be able to see you again... Heh...hehe... Thank goodness... Thank goodness...
L-Let’s...uh-um... Let’s g-give it our all...today... Ah—you’re not m-mad, are you? Heh...hehe...
Ah...umm... S-Sorry. I-I know I’m clumsy...but...uh...I wanted to see if I could help you, my lord... I-Is there anything...I-I can do for you...?
U-Until now...e-everyone has always...talked behind my back, bullied me, betrayed me... B-But, you’re d-different from them, my lord... Th-That makes me h-happy. Hehe...
M-My lord...um... I-I was just thinking...about how you should rest a little... Ah—I’m sorry! I’m sorry! I-I was being too pushy, huh...?
Ah-umm... M-My lord... I-I... Ummm... A-Ahh... Hehe... Hehehe... Hehehehe...

I-I heard...it’s your b-birthday... Oh, ah... H-Happy birthday... Th-This gift’s for you... Y-You probably won’t like it since I was the one who ch-chose it, but...if that’s still o-okay with you... H-Here...
E-Everyone here’s s-so nice... B-But, if anyone becomes my f-friend, and they start h-hating me, w-w-what should I do...?
I-I can relax when I’m by myself, b-but...I h-hate being...lonely... Th-Th-That’s why, ah-umm... B-Being with you, m-my lord, makes me...s-so...umm...h-happy... Hehehe...
Th-That girl... She just looked at me... Ahh, someone else...hates me... ...Huh? Sh-She doesn’t...?
My lord, hehehe... I-It’s been a while since w-we first met, huh...? I-Is it okay...if I think of y-you as...my friend? Hehe...my friend.

Hey, my lord... A-Am I doing anything that bugs you...? I-If I am, let me know, okay? Just be honest with whatever it is and I promise to make it right... That’s why, please...I want you to keep watching me...

Hehehe...hehe... My lord...I can tell just by the look on your face. I feel the same way, too... You know, I have complete trust in you...but if you stab me in the back...I wonder what I’ll end up doing... Hehe...hehehe...
Wh-Whaaa...? I-Is it o-okay for m-me to have this...?
Y-You’re giving me more...?! A-Are you sure...?!
M-My lord... Th-This makes me...happy... Hehehe...
I... I-I’ve made my mind up. I’m gonna put my trust in you, my lord. I-I mean, you did make me this strong... Hehe...hehehe...

It’s the first time this has ever happened... The first time that someone has never betrayed me. Hey, my lord... You’ll be my friend forever...and ever, right? Mine and mine alone... Ahahahaha! Ahahahahahaha!
Thank you for believing someone like me, my lord... Hey...have you noticed? The only thing you haven’t done for me...is betray me. I’m ready for it...whenever. Heh...hehe...hehehehe...
That’s what they get for laughing at me... Hehe... Ahahaha!
N-No way... I-It’s all my fault, isn’t it...? Uuu...
Shut up, shut up, shut up!!
No looking, no laughing—just go away!!
Heh... So, you’ve finally graced us with your presence...
...You! ...Augh!! I hope you know there’s gonna be hell to pay!
If you’re set on this path, I won’t stand in your way... Now, let us depart. As we brave this unending crusade, the final requi-requie...! Uuu, hold on... Let me start over.

Uh, Boss...? Um, I wanna learn how to use magic. You think there’s anyone who can help me out? Huh? Rosalie, the Great Sorceress herself? And, Professor Mertillier? Alright, I gotta hurry and... Ah...actually...can you, um, come with me...? Please?

I’m searching for someone. Could you lend me a hand? ...Huh? “What do they look like?” Well...she’s wanted by the Church, looks really cool, dons an eyepatch...and is shrouded all in black! Yes! To give you a better idea...she’s like a nomad wandering under the stars!! Huh? What do you mean you don’t get it?!
Now’s the time for rest, for we know not when we’ll next be called to battle. Fear not—I shall stand guard. Nrrgh... Go to sleep!

M-My umbrella’s really versatile, y’know. It’s safe against whatever falls from the sky—whether it’s raindrops or spears. So, Boss...um...why don’t you join me under my umbrella? For safety! And privacy! D-Don’t read too much into it, though! Well, maybe just a little...
Um! I-I just wanted to w-wi...WISH! I-I mean...w-wish you...h-ha...happy...b-b-birth...day...!
When I was about to be trampled by a wild horse, the one who saved me...the only one who even tried to save me, was a witch. Ever since that day, I’ve known that witches are heroes.

This outfit’s pretty cool, huh? I actually made it myself... Huh? Yeah, I make all my clothes. It’s not that surprising, is it? Lots of people make their own clothes. It’s pretty normal... Hehehe... I’ll have you know flattery’ll get you nowhere! Oh, look, a flower. ...Want it?

Hah! Take that! Oh, hi, Boss... I was just getting in some magic practice...or trying to, anyway. I just wanna be a proper witch like the others as soon as possible, then I can actually help... But, fear not—I’m not giving up! After all, heroes aren’t built in a day! I got this.

“I want to be...” is a wish, and “I have to be...” is a curse. Once the weight of your dream starts to crush you, it no longer is a dream. I’m gonna hold onto my “I want to be,” and make sure my dream never sours into a curse... With my magic, I’ll save the world, and y-yo-you... Uuu... I can’t believe I said that...

To me, witches are heroes... Even now that I’m older and understand the fate that awaits them, that hasn’t changed. So, just you watch, Boss... I’m gonna show you, for sure... I’ll be an invincible hero, and protect the whole world with the magic you gave me!

A witch’s power comes from the heart, huh? I guess that means when my power awakened...it must’ve been because of how much I wanted to protect you... Hehe, the boss turned me into a witch... Hehehe, the boss turned me into a witch...! Hehehe!♪
The time has come to unbind the power sleeping within me.
My thanks, comrade. Your continued patronage and encouragement are...er, I mean, have been...no, wait... Uuu, I keep messing up the longer lines...
Heh-heh-heh, you’re granting me more power...? Sure hope you know what you’re getting yourself into.
I think I’ve gotten a little stronger. At this rate, the day I become the hero destined to protect everyone might be just around the corner! HOO!★

You shine in such a strange way, Boss... My light’s weak and brittle, and the littlest things make it lose its luster. But your light... It caresses me, and helps me rekindle a little bit of my own shine... Boss, I...I really like your l-li-ligh...light...

Um, I... Thank you. I just wanted to tell you that...because I hadn’t done so yet. I-I wanted to do it properly...to...to say how I really feel, in my own words, and that I...I really am grateful...and how much I lo...lo...I l-lov... Uuu, I guess I’m still not ready yet...
Wait, what?! W-We won?! ...Er, I mean...AHEM... Looks like we’re just out of their league.
Ugh, this sucks! I’m going home...
Please go down, please go down, please go down...!
...! Long time no see... I’m happy... You’re still alive.
Remember... Strike while the iron’s hot... Now then, shall we begin?
Unacceptable... This iron’s inadequate. It won’t be able to stand heat... Oh, my lord... How long were you...? When I get absorbed in my work, I stop noticing anything around me... I’m ashamed...
Why don’t I use my hammer to fight? Preposterous... This is a tool for forging weapons... Fighting using smithing tools—inappropriate. Blades too... Using one’s wares to fight—third-rate.
I’m worried... You look very tired. Get rest... People are very...fragile, after all...

Thank you. I’m terrible at speaking to people... But, you actually wait for my words to come out. That makes me very happy... I’ve got to get better at speaking... Because, I want to talk a lot with you, my lord...
Cheers... Today’s a great day... Happy birthday... I’ve only ever made weapons, but maybe I can make a model of a cake. You want?
...Warning. My conversations—terrible... You might feel uncomfortable... I’m not the best person to talk to... Better off finding someone else...

I thought a strong weapon could save someone from dying, so I kept making weapons. Strong weapons that could protect their owners... But, I was wrong... In the end, weapons are only tools for murder...

I’m confused. Everyone pats my head...a lot. That’s a disrespectful way to treat someone older... Huh? Me—the same age as Soltina? ...Incorrect. Older. Illya and Belle? Nnrrgh, older... I’m closest in age to Hathor and Lunalynn. ...Hm? Is that so surprising?

Are you making sure you’re reforging your weapons? It takes time, but keep at it, and you’ll bring out your weapons’ power. ...Ah! That reminds me. I think there’s a way to cut down the time it takes to reforge... I don’t know much about it, but maybe Richesse does.

I thought quickly winning a fight would end it. So, I created that sword—that horrible, murderous symbol of power. I’m sure that’s what I wished for back then—for more people to be killed... That’s why, I can’t say I’m completely innocent...

Richesse has always walked in front of me, leading me by the hand... This whole time, I thought that was good enough for me. But, now I know it’s not. I want to walk alongside her—not behind...so I can feel proud when I call her, my partner...
Power stirs inside me... What is this...?
I’m shining like a finely sharpened blade... I’m grateful... Thank you, my lord...
Thank you. I’ll be sure to meet any expectations you have in me... That’s common courtesy...says Richesse...
Even with hands this filthy, if I can still create something...I’ve got to do it... With these two hands, I’ll forge a weapon that’ll change the world...

A weapon’s just a thing that exists. But, treat it with affection, and it’ll surely return that affection to you... I also want to return your feelings in that way... To do that, I’ve got to hone my power even more...

As long as people fight, they’ll want weapons. So, it’s time for me to stop running...from my past, and my sins. I’ll create a legendary weapon that’ll cut a path to the future, and end this war... I’ll be okay. If you and Richesse are with me, I won’t break... Not anymore...!
...Why do you even bother with someone like me?
Hm? I don’t think I’ve seen you in a while... So that’s why everyone here’s been so restless. Now, why don’t you quickly finish whatever you’re doing, and put everyone’s minds at ease?
You don’t have to go out of your way to talk to me. I prefer being alone... Socializing with others really isn’t my thing.

It kinda feels like I can’t go a single day here without a game of 20 questions. “Are you eating properly?” “Wanna go shopping with me?” “Do you like flowers?” Are you the reason people here can’t mind their own business?

I know you’ve been watching me, but do you have to do it in such a weird way? It is pretty funny though. ...Oh, this red soup? I dunno—spicy foods kinda do it for me. Without any kick, it just feels like something’s missing.

You always tell me to take good care of my body, and yet you never get any rest. So, stop right now and take a break. If you don’t, I’ll use this sword...on myself...and make you watch...over and over... Good. That’s what you should’ve been doing from the beginning.

A dinner party? To bring everyone closer as friends? Ughhh, what a drag... The last thing I need are friends. You guys go and enjoy yourselves—I’ll be fine sitting right here. ...Argh, fine. You win. I’ll go. I can’t say no with you looking at me like that...
I hear it’s your birthday today. Happy birthday. ...Why do you look so surprised? Even I’ll at least wish you a happy birthday. It’s not like I hate you or anything.

Hey, you. Say someone dies feeling satisfied after doing every single thing they’ve ever wanted to do. Would you call that “happiness?” ...I thought so. Happiness is something I’ll never be able to find for myself...

Why are you freaking out like that? Oh, this is just a scratch. It’ll heal in no time. “...Not treating it will get it infected?” Ugh, like I said, that kind of thing won’t... Fine. I’ll bandage it up, so stop worrying, okay?

Hey, why are you paying so much attention to me? There are plenty of other people here who need you. Treat me with kindness all you like, but I couldn’t care less about making friends anymore... Go and show that attention to someone else.
I wouldn’t call it a hobby of mine, but I don’t mind listening to music. Just sitting here and listening makes me happy. Or rather, music makes my heart throb, and I’m kinda into that.

See this? It’s a flower that someone gave their entire life away to make bloom. A flower that’ll allow me to die. I didn’t wish for her to make this flower... But, if it’s what saved her heart, then I’ve got no choice but to accept it, right?

With this flower, I can die anytime I want. But strangely enough, when I think that, my thoughts about dying vanish. So, I’m gonna live with you until it’s your time to go. You’re weak, so saving you might just be worth it.
The only thing I can do is not die. Nothing more, nothing less. There’s no point in making me stronger.
You still haven’t given up on me? To think there’d be oddballs like you out there... What’s this world coming to?
I’ll be your shield as often as you need me to. It’s easy—all I do is stand in front of the enemy. No need to worry—it’s painless. All the pain disappeared a long time ago.

I won’t die anyway, so it’s fine if I get hit whenever I attack. That doesn’t stop you from berating me though, telling me to take better care of myself, or whatever. Attacking while protecting myself at the same time’s something I’m just not cut out for.
Normally people want to get stronger in order to protect themselves. But since I can’t die, that’s something I just can’t wrap my brain around. Get stronger...get stronger again...then what?

I kinda feel I understand now. Getting stronger means becoming able to do more. So, for someone like me who can’t die, I’ll be able to find more reasons to live. That’s why...I wanna say thank you...for giving me a reason to live.
We’re done already? Hm, well that was easy.
You guys go get a head start. I’ll catch up after I let them kill me.
I’ll put in a little more effort.
Let’s just get this over with.
Well, if it isn’t my favorite customer! I haven’t seen you pop in for a while, so I was sure you had... Oh, no. Forget I said anything.
Alright, time to get out there and make some money.

Nrrgh, where did they go...? Oh hey, my favorite customer! I was doing a head count of the flabbycatties, but one’s missing... C’mon Boss, this isn’t good! You gotta actually watch...huh? What exactly are these things? They’re exactly what you see—just ordinary, run-of-the-mill flabbycatties.

If someone seeks help, deliver what they need. That’s my golden rule. I’ve seen many deaths that could’ve been prevented if supplies had been delivered sooner. So, I became the Merchant of Death, knowing full well what it means to keep one side of a battle alive.
Huh? You’re looking a bit burnt out, my favorite customer. If you’re buried in so much work that you need a helping paw, the flabbycatties and I got you covered... Of course...for free!

Merchants like me got a trick for surviving—we never stay in one place. We gotta be ready to run away at a moment’s notice. But, I feel safe next to you, my favorite customer. Hehe... It’s nice having a place to go home to.

Happy birthday, my favorite customer! I’m running a special birthday sale just for you~! There’s cake, everyday essentials, and even a coupon you can redeem for one date with yours truly. So, what’ll it be?

A war orphan like me doesn’t have many paths to choose from. I’m a part of war whether I like it or not. That’s why I decided to become a battlefield merchant. I’ve seen so many lives that would’ve been saved if they just had supplies...

Do you know about runes? They’re crystalized masses of magic power, and they strengthen different abilities depending on their source of power. But, if you leave them as mystery runes, you won’t be able to see what power’s inside... Basically, what you get depends on Lady Luck.

Artie’s a skilled blacksmith, but she can be a bit unstable at times... Make sure you treat her nicely, okay? You’re the only one other than me who she’s taken a liking to, after all. Oh, but, remember, I’m her partner, got it?

Wait, are those sugar cubes?! Oh, no, I don’t want any... Those just happen to be the flabbycatties’ favorite food... Oh, be careful though. Sugary snacks make them multiply. Also, fruit makes them gigantic, and candy makes them tiny, hehe, just in case you wanted to see for yourself~

Which do you think is evil, a weapon or a person? A person can’t protect themselves with a weak weapon, so I fully understand Artie’s feelings about wanting to creating strong weapons for peace... She just made a mistake in choosing her buyer, not in choosing what to believe in.

Soon, the world won’t need the Merchant of Death. And you, my favorite customer, are gonna make it happen, right? Oh, but, then I’d have to look for a new job, huh...? Well, I guess I’ll just make that your responsibility, my favorite customer~ Huh? You’re fine with that? Seriously?!
Thank you, my favorite customer. I guarantee you’ll get your money’s worth.
Well now... If I don’t provide you with quality service, I’m gonna have a price to pay, hehe.
Thank you as always, my favorite customer. From now on, I’ll put in even more work, so keep your expectations high. Oh, but business is business—the only one who can outperform me is me.

What’s that, my favorite customer? Are you interested in a flabbycatty by any chance? Um, well, Smile can be a bit cold... Oh, Angry, the one by your feet, can get quite rough, so forget about them! For first-timers like you, I recommend Twins. This flabbycatty’s just so friendly and down-to-earth~!

Hey there! Welcome to the Fran branch of Richesse’s traveling shop! It’s an exclusive VIP shop where only the chosen may enter. Yes...this hidden chamber of secrets is reserved solely for you, the Duke of Fran, and myself... Hehe. Oh, sorry, did you actually believe me?

If someone seeks help, deliver what they need. That’s my golden rule... Brave this cursed world, and deliver peace and hope to people stricken with fear. That’s something I should do—something I can do. Of course, I got you to help me, right my favorite customer~?♪
Uh oh... Gotta close up shop and hightail it outta here.
Things are about to get reeeal flashy!
Ah, the wind feels quite pleasant...
We’ve had quite the long vacation, sir. Have you had your fill? Or, would you like to relax a little longer here with me?
Have you done your warming-up exercises? Tediousness is no excuse for skipping them. You’ll be out of your element in the water, after all.

Ah, sir. Have you seen Moddey? Apparently she’s never been in the water before, so I thought it would be best to teach her how to swim...but any moment I try to get her under the water, she ends up running away... I do hope she can overcome this predicament...
Sir... I’ve heard this entire stretch of land belongs to Primavera, but is that true? I did have the impression she was a lady of prestige...but certainly not to this extent...
Fatigue’s written all over your face, sir. Is it from accompanying the children? Their energy can indeed keep one’s hands full. Take this opportunity to rest. I’ll see to the children in your stead.

Pardon me, sir, but...are you fine being here with me? Surely, there must be others you would rather spend time with... I see... No, it’s nothing. I just never thought there’d come a day where you and I could relax and just listen to the sound of the wind... Hehe. You’ve given me a memory I’ll always treasure.

So, today’s your birthday. Ah, yes—supposedly there’s a cafe up ahead with a view of the whole lake. Its beautiful sunset makes lovers from far and wide see it as a sacred place, and any two who go together are bound to get marr...ah... Th-That wasn’t my intention. My apologies.

This outfit, sir? I bought it from Richesse. If I’m not mistaken, it’s called a “swimsuit,” and can be used for underwater operations... If you’re interested in one, I recommend seeing Richesse. She had a wide selection to choose from.
Ah, sir...here you are. Um... If you have a moment, why don’t we relax and have a chat? We should take it easy now before this chance passes us by...

Is there anything you have trouble dealing with, sir? There’s nothing like that for me, per se, but there are things I must conquer. Flames, the stench of gunpowder... All these things, I must eventually overcome. After all, my mother doesn’t wish for me to just cry and do nothing.

You said we came here to rejuvenate our strength, but are you getting proper rest, sir? We need to spend times like this wisely on ourselves. Don’t simply idle about—rest until you feel completely refreshed. Even my drowsy commanding officer often said refreshing oneself is important work.

Moddey ran away again. What exactly am I doing wrong? I’ve even tried adopting the soft, gentle tone Valeriede uses when speaking to Nina, like, “See, there’s nothing to be scared about. Come on now.” ...Hm? This is how Valeriede always speaks to Nina.

Once we finish our vacation, our fight will resume. Does that worry me? Not in the slightest... If I were alone, the illusions of my past would likely still be haunting me...but now I have comrades who I must protect. I’ll show you I can grow even stronger, so that one day, I can protect you too...
I may have overcome my trauma...but this new me still has plenty of growing up to do.

Aversions and shortcomings—no one understands them better than I do. It certainly would be upsetting if someone else lectured me about what to do about mine...just like what I did to Moddey... I owe her an apology...
I thought I’d made Moddey angry with me, but apparently I was reading everything the wrong way. Well, it’s true that I offended her to some extent...but I also caused you to worry. Forgive me.

For my first time taking charge of others, I barely kept myself together... The experience has made me more sympathetic towards the hardships you face. It must’ve been hard for my commanding officer too. It truly was trying... One became lost again, and again, and... Huh? She’s a special case?

A witch’s power comes from the heart. There are memories that shackle me... My mother vanishing into the flames, the screams of souls being burned alive... The moment I decided to bear those shackles and move forward, a new power awakened within me... With this power, I know I can protect my comrades, and you.
I’m the one to blame... Forgive me.
Keep your hands off my comrades!
An attack like that won’t work on me anymore!
Nnrrggh... Moddey feels kinda... C-Can you please not stare at me?!
Ah!! Finally! Just where in the world have you been, m’lord?! I’ve been here putting up with all this embarrassment, waiting to get going, so I expect you to show up too, okay?!

Nnrrgh... Why does this swimsuit gotta be so darn tiny...? It’s practically underwear...! Huh? I look cute in it? Wh-What the heck?! Of all the things you could’ve said, m’lord... You’re really asking for it!

Why are you letting me borrow your coat, m’lord? So I don’t feel embarrassed? Oh, th-thank you... Nnrrgh... It’s me who should be taking care of you though... Hmph. Just you wait, m’lord. Next time, I’m gonna take care of you even more!

Am I getting magic power from the summer, or something? I feel being adventurous with my outfit lets me say things I’d normally be too embarrassed to say... To tell you the truth, my ever so kind and gentle lord, I like you... Hehehe! Oh, the look on your face! Betcha believed me, didn’t ’cha?

Aren’t you hot, m’lord? Here, I got you a cold drink and a towel. If there’s anything else you want... You wanna take a nap? I knew you were gonna say that, so I also made sure to have a parasol and beach chair ready for you. And, I’ll even throw in a snuggle with yours truly if you want. Hehehe!

You know how a witch’s power comes from the heart? Well, if their heart goes through emotional changes, their power and soul will be affected. That means, if their heart is crushed by negative emotions, their power will distort, and cause the witch to rage out of control. Betcha didn’t know that!

Happy birthday, m’lord! Moddey here’s gonna give you a special gift just for today. You can look at me in my swimsuit as much as you like! Whatcha say, you lucky guy? ...W-Wait. You really are... Uuu, on second thought, stop looking!!

Since long ago, waterfronts were places lost spirits could easily find their way to. That probably explains the fog. Lost spirits feel so much pain from longing to see someone... Maybe that’s why they’ve always flocked to loud, crowded places.
One time I slipped and fell into a river, but Laila was the first to jump in and save me. She was such a good girl, always by my side, always protecting me.

It’s. So. HOOOT! Ugh, I can’t take this anymore! This heat’s gonna melt my ears and tail right off...! I’m sure a dip in the water will make the pain go away...but it’s so scary... M’lord...you gotta do something...!

How can everyone walk outside in those shameless outfits like it’s nothing...?! Sabrina’s wearing a swimsuit, Hathor’s outfit basically is one, and Belle’s practically naked...! Am I the weirdo for feeling embarrassed...?

Since I’m always doing my best, you want to take care of me anytime I’m having a bad day? Are you sure? Actually, ever since Dad and Laila passed away, every day’s been... Gotcha! Didya think I was crying? Joke’s on you! Hehehe. ...But, when I really am feeling tired, I might just take you up on that offer.

A gravekeeper’s job is to ensure the departed are resting peacefully in their graves. But, it’s also nice to make them smile while they’re still with us, right? The only gravekeeper who can take care of someone from the cradle to the grave is me, after all. So, m’lord, want me to take care of ya until it’s your time to go?
A long time ago, I almost drowned in a river...so me and water still kiiinda don’t get along... Aha...
Hmph! ...I-I can do the doggy paddle, y’know... Laila taught me how...
This floaty ring is the best thing ever! Now, I’ll be safe and sound even if I can’t swim... Huh? Ah! Don’t let go! I’m still practicing!
Huh? There’s something in the lake! What in the world is that?! It’s like a small, floaty umbrella! I’ve never seen anything so cool!

Dan-da-dan~! Now I can swim all by myself. I got my floaty ring, and I know Laila’s always watching over me, so I know I’ll be A-okay. Come to think of it, can you swim, m’lord? If you ask nicely, Moddey here might just be able to teach you.

Thank you, m’lord. We had so much fun playing in the water together, I can barely remember I was even scared of it. To show my appreciation, I’ll be sure to take care of you a whooole lot more from now on, okay? Hehehe!
Hah hah~! Piece of cake! ...Huh? N-No! Anything but water... Anything!!
Oh nooo... There’s a hole in my floaty ring...!
Hey there! Are you also looking for a place to cool off? Then, look no further. Come on over!

Look who finally decided to show up. You made me wait for so long, I’m practically an ice cube now. For the apology you owe me, I think I’ll have you take me around and enjoy the festival~ I still haven’t had my fill, y’know.

Hey, have you seen Vera? One second, she was saying, “I can sense where people are, so I shall be fine.” And the next, she was gone. Vera probably left for the festival, but with all the people out there today, I was gonna suggest we go together... Huh? Vera’s Vera. You know, Primavera~!♪
You’re asking what I’m doing? Hehe, weeell...why don’t you take a guess? Answer correctly, and I might just give you a super special once-in-a-lifetime present~!
The silence after a festival makes me feel kinda lonely. For some reason, it just doesn’t sit well with me... I know. There’s no festival that lasts forever, but still...
Hey, you’re looking kinda tired. We don’t get many vacations like this, so we gotta take this chance to relax more. I just love how nice and cool this spot is... Hehe. Wanna join me?

Are you fine with me being the center of all your attention? Hmmm~ Guess that means I’m your favorite, huh? Hehe. You’re my favorite too, y’know. No, really... You’re my number one, especially when it comes to...hehe♪ Now, what did you think I was gonna say, hmmm?

Happy birthday! Your special day’s about to get even more special, you lucky dog, you~! “Why?” Well, just for today...I’m not against the idea of you having me all to yourself... Huh? I’m not teasing you. Why would I do that?
It’s great to relax like this once a while. Just empty our minds, and do nothing... We gotta take advantage of vacations whenever we can, y’know~

Hey, have you ever worn a yukata? It’s my first time, and I just can't figure out how to move in this thing. Shizu makes moving in a yukata look so easy, and she does it while looking so pretty too... Just what is her secret?

Nrrgh... This sash’s making my stomach hurt... What am I supposed to do with this, what’s it called, “obi?” If I just untie it, I’m sure I’ll feel a little more comfortable... Huh? I shouldn’t...? C’mon, it’ll be okay! There’s no one here but you and me~ ...It’s not gonna give us any problems, right?

You wanna know tips for shooting? Well, that was out of the blue... Oh! You’re looking at that shooting gallery! Well, I guess it is a bit tough, huh? No worries, though. I’ll teach you how to beat it, step by step. Treat me to something nice in return though, will ya?

I heard Vera and some other musicians are going to sing a requiem tonight. Apparently, the sight of them singing while facing the lake is so beautiful, hundreds of people come to watch them every year. Wanna go watch with me? Or...do you hate going places with me? Hehe, just kidding.

Hey you, talk about having the best timing! I met a troupe of traveling acrobats in the city, and we’re planning to put on a show in a few minutes. Wanna come along? Having you in the audience will help me perform in tip-top shape... “Why?” Hehe, you wanna know? The answer is...my little secret♪
Aww yeah! Just what I needed!♪
You must be expecting something amazing from me, huh? Guess I gotta work even harder so I don’t let ya down.
I’m gonna use my brand new trick, and this new power you’ve given me, and show just how much stronger I’ve gotten. Make sure you keep your eyes on me, ’kay?
What’cha think? Would you say I’m looking even more stunning than before? I’m doing my best to look good in this yukata thing... Huh? What’s wrong? Cat got your tongue?

Vera’s got Minivera, and Ivy’s got Emma... If only I had a sidekick of my own too... Well, what’cha say? Hehe, I’m just kidding. If I keep you all to myself, I’ll only be painting a huge target on my back.
