Memo: 使用していない

Text: Get rewards based on damage you deal in battle!
Join forces with guild members and get extra guild rewards!
Level Link’s new feature is unlocked! Boost your Party Lv!
Challenge the Cave of Space-Time on Hard Mode!
Tower of Souls is unlocked! Use 1 type of Soul and climb it!

Having specific characters will activate arcana!
Increasing characters’ rarities will strengthen the arcana!

The cursed land is turning back to normal!
So this is the power of the Staff’s Successor—
your power...

You probably still don’t believe a word I’m saying,
but you have the power to save this cursed world.

...?! It can’t be... The Church of Longinus’s
“Witch Hunt” has made its way here?!

I’ll take down all the enemies who attack us.
So, in the meantime, please take care of the battle preparations!

The Church’s knights are no pushovers.
Make sure you’re properly prepared.

Monica’s a handmaiden who’s a bit timid,
but you can rely on her to heal your party.

I may still just be an inexperienced apprentice,
but I will do my best to live up to your expectations!

You heard it from Iris.
We will protect you no matter what comes our way.

Iris is not only your attendant,
but also your personal guard.
If you add her to your party, she’ll overpower
the enemy with her incredible strength.

Leave everything to me.
I shall protect you, even if it costs me my life.

It’s just as Rosalie says.
If we calm down and prepare ourselves,
we’ll come out victorious.

Rosalie said she’s just a small, weak maiden,
but she’s actually an amazing witch who many call
the Great Sorceress.

We somehow managed to win,
but the enemies have gotten stronger.
Still, we can’t afford to stop now...

We needn’t hurry. Haste makes waste.
You’ve become used to wielding the power of the Staff,
so now you should be able to help us level up.

As you envision the one you wish to level up,
reach out and touch them.

Amazing—I feel power surging from deep inside my body!
So this is your power.
As it so happens, we’ve also gotten ahold of some new gear, so let’s hurry and equip them.

Perfect!
The enemies are bound to get
stronger from this point on.
But with your power,
no one will stand a chance against us!

The town’s been ravaged by the Curse,
but it’ll really return to normal...?!
Amazing!​

Well, well... It seems you not only have the power to
dispel the Curse, but also the power
to rebuild an area affected by it.
Now, touch the town with your hand.

Next, envision how the town would look
once you’ve restored it.

To think you’ve already mastered the Staff’s
power this much...
It’s certainly no coincidence that this era
would see someone of your talent emerge.

Up ahead may be another town that
you can heal with your power.
When the time comes,
please do everything you can to help.

For no matter how much pain they may be in,
just having a place to go home to
is enough for people to persevere...

Now you can use your power to see into
everyone’s memories.

Because of “The Witch Hunt,”
every witch in the world has been persecuted.
Even girls burdened with the sufferings they’ve
experienced in the past...

As kind as you are,
you’ll probably want to avert your eyes.
I can’t force you to look at them, either...

But, I want you to get to know these girls
as much as possible.

No matter how much pain they are in,
just having someone at their side should be enough
for them to overcome it.

Alright, let’s push on ahead.
It’s only a little further until we reach the Witch of Qlipha.

Shall we get going?
The next country is “The Woodland Nation—
the Principality of Brook.”
It’s a nation afflicted by a Curse that shrouds the land in ice, hindering anyone who dares enter.

Looks like you’ve unlocked the ability to invoke.
The battles from this point on will get even tougher.
But with your power, we’re bound to find new allies
who’ll help us.
Let’s go and give it a try.

I see you’ve found a new ally to join us.
Now, let’s return to the estate for a moment.

Looks like there are some mission rewards
you can collect.
Let’s check them out.

Wow—you’ve already achieved so much.
I knew you had it in you!
Go ahead and collect them all.

Here’s the next mission.
Let’s head out and clear it.

Huh...? Your staff is glowing...
I wonder what’s making it do that. Let’s go and find out.

Wha—?! Where are we?!
We’re somewhere different all of a sudden...!

Wait—could this be the “World of Trials?”
The illusionary realm said to guide
the ones chosen by the Staff...?!
I can’t believe it really exists...

Anyway, let’s press forward.
I think something might just be waiting for us there...

I thought this was just a big cave at first,
but it feels like the inside of a tree...

The space inside here is warping,
so it’s a dangerous place that takes on
a different form every time we enter...

But, if this really is the “World of Trials,”
then there should be something here that can help us.
Let’s proceed with caution.

Something’s happened in the World of Trials.
I feel a massive amount of power...

This is one tall tower.
I wonder how high up it goes.

But, each floor in this tower contains a large room...
This entire place feels familiar to me...
Maybe this world...is what our world will look like...

Let’s go.
If we make our way to the top,
we might be able to find something.

Looks like you can now join a guild.
Our enemies will keep getting stronger from this point on.
So, let’s join forces with as many allies as we can!

Something’s happened in the World of Trials.
I feel a strange power...

Check out this fountain... The water’s surface is
showing us someplace different.
From the looks of it,
we can travel to other worlds from here.

But, this fountain is another place
created by the “World of Trials,” right?

Who knows what kinds of trails are waiting
on the other side...
But, if we let fear stop us, we never will.
Let’s go and take the plunge.
Select a world to start an expedition.

I guess each world has different conditions set that
determine the rarity or Soul of the characters
who can enter.
Go and select who you want to send on this expedition.
When you’re ready, let’s head out.

Looks like everyone made it back safely.
What a relief...
Alright, let’s check out the rewards we’ve collected!

Something’s happened in the World of Trials.
I can sense hundreds—no, thousands of people...

In ancient times,
whenever warriors crossed swords,
their battles were seen as an offering to God.

Over the years, people stopped believing in God,
and their devotional traditions faded away with time.
But, it seems like the people of this world are still here.

Maybe God’s still seeking it out—
the radiance of life that overflows from souls laid bare.

Let’s set up a defense party that can fight for us,
even when we’re not around.

Something’s happened in the World of Trials.
I sense something, but what...?

I heard the people of this temple
worshipped the Tree of Life.

It gave birth to life, souls, the land—everything.
The Tree itself is the creator of the world.
That’s what the people of this temple believe.

More rewards are granted at specific times—
when the Tree’s power is at its peak.
But, apparently the inside is protected by
powerful guardians.
It’s dangerous to go alone,
so let’s all work together and take this challenge on.
Looks like your staff has obtained a new power.
Now, you can access Level Link!

Using your power to bond people together,
your allies can now share their power with each other.

Rather than hear me explain it,
it’ll be much quicker if we just test it out.
This should make the power of your allies
grow by leaps and bounds!

Something’s happened in the World of Trials.
I feel the strongest of powers coming together...

This is the renowned Legend League...
It’s the arena of the gods,
where only those who have ascended to the tops of
their worlds are allowed to enter.

If what the stories say are true,
then only one of the many assembled here
will earn the right to call themself the Disciple of God...

We won’t know if that’s true unless we see it with our own eyes.
If we can enter, by all means, let’s do it!
Looks like any unneeded gear can be smelted from here.

If you decide to smelt, you’ll obtain Fragments.
You can exchange Fragments for new gear at the Shop.

The variety of gear will be updated every day,
so you should probably check in frequently.

Looks like you can upgrade gear here.
Let’s give it a try!

Looks like you have some runes that
you can mount onto your gear.
Let’s try and put them on.

Runes are crystalized masses of magic power,
and they strengthen different abilities depending on
their source of power.

To mount a rune,
you need to construct a slot onto your gear.
Can you select where you want to construct?

Now, let’s take the rune you chose and mount it.
After constructing a slot, you’re free to mount or
remove any rune from it as you please.

Looks like you can awaken characters here.
If you raise our rarities, we’ll get even stronger.
Go and select the character you want to awaken.

Awakening needs the power of allies.
Go and select characters that meet the requirements.

Now we can awaken characters.
Let’s try it out right away!

This is a place where rampant, negative emotions gather.
Souls who have lost their way join together,
taking the form of a witch who has
lost control of her powers.

The more you attack, the more souls you can free.
Even one person can make a difference,
so please lend some help.

It’s overflowing with incredible amounts of energy here.
Looks like it’s a special place where we can obtain power from the Tree of Life.

But, it appears that other guilds are also making
their way here.

Only the most superior of guilds can come,
hence why everyone looks so strong,
but that doesn’t mean we’ve been outmatched.
It’s time to show just how strong we really are!

Let’s launch attacks on bases and capture them.
We can earn rewards based on how many we capture.

Bases are comprised of churches, castles, and temples,
with the temple in the center of the map yielding
the best rewards.
Guess this is the temple we need to set our sights on.
Go ahead and tap Base to take a look inside.

What amazing energy...
This place is overflowing with the power of life—
the likes of which I’ve never seen...

Looks like this is a special place that bridges
different worlds together.
There’s a massive amount of energy here,
which means a lot of powerful people are on their way.

But, we have nothing to worry about.
We’ve come this far by uniting our powers as one.
It’s time to show everyone just how strong we are!

Looks like you can augment gear from here.
You can take holy and dark powers
and bestow them onto your gear.
Go and select the materials required for augmenting.
The materials you can use are gear with holy or dark effects, and Dark Perfume.

This will augment your gear.
A piece of gear’s holy and dark effects depend on
the body part it’s for, so try augmenting other gear, too.

Looks like you can reforge gear here.
Let’s give it a try right away!

Reforging can rebalance a gear’s stats.
Let’s get started and test it out.

Now each stat’s numerical value has changed.
Let’s try reforging again and again so
a character’s best stat gets even stronger.

We were so close.
Just a little more and we could’ve won!

Even when you’re not here,
we never stop fighting to save the world.
You can see every detail about our battles from here.

Here’s the loot from our battles.
Tap the rewards and see what kinds of items
we’ve obtained.

As we save more people, and our population grows,
so will our rewards.
If we push forward, we’ll also see more rewards from enemies. So, let’s keep going.
Let’s use these rewards and level up immediately!
Looks like you’ve amassed some more rewards!
Let’s level everyone up right away!

We lost...but that’s okay.
If we just upgrade our gear, we can get even stronger!

Look inside your Item Box for runes, Master!
If you mount them onto our gear, I think we can get stronger!

The enemy is quite strong... Oh, that reminds me. Do you know about augmenting?
It can set free the power hidden away inside gear. You should try it out for yourself.

Ugh... My deepest apologies, my lord... It looks like we are in need of retraining.
Let’s awaken some characters and raise their rarities.

Is the gear reforged and ready to go, Master?
Let’s take good care of everyone’s gear so we can win the next battle!

If they do not appear on the 57th pull, their pull rate on the 58th pull will rise again, and will do so for each consecutive pull until they appear, with the 70th pull’s pull rate being 100%.

・If the set character is changed, the risen pull rate will carry over as long as the new set character is part of the same Soul group.
・There are 2 Soul groups: [Azure, Crimson, Emerald, Amber] and [Radiance, Chaos].
*Changing the set character within the same Soul group will not reset the pull count, and each Soul group’s pull count will exist separately from one another.

*Changing the set character within the same Soul group will not reset the pull count, and each Soul group’s pull count will exist separately from one another.
